Abathur.name: Abathur
Abathur.title: Evolution Master
Abathur.searchText: Abathur Zerg Swarm HotS Heart of the Swarm StarCraft II 2 SC2 Star2 Starcraft2 SC slug
Abathur.description: A unique Hero that can manipulate the battle from anywhere on the map.

basic.name: Symbiote
basic.shortTooltip: Assist an ally and gain new abilities
basic.fullTooltip: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.

basic.name: Toxic Nest
basic.shortTooltip: Spawn a mine
basic.fullTooltip: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.

heroic.name: Evolve Monstrosity
heroic.shortTooltip: Minion or Locust becomes a powerful Monstrosity
heroic.fullTooltip: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

heroic.name: Ultimate Evolution
heroic.shortTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it
heroic.fullTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

trait.name: Locust Strain
trait.shortTooltip: Spawn locusts that attack down the nearest lane
trait.fullTooltip: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 16 seconds, have 316 (+4% per level) health and deal 46 (+4% per level) damage with each Basic Attack.

mount.name: Deep Tunnel
mount.fullTooltip: Quickly tunnel to a visible location

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

heroic.name: Evolve Monstrosity Active
heroic.fullTooltip: Activate to cast Symbiote on Abathur's Monstrosity.

level1.name: Pressurized Glands
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Spike Burst range and decreases cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

level1.name: Envenomed Nest
level1.shortTooltip: Toxic Nests deal more damage
level1.fullTooltip: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

level1.name: Reinforced Carapace
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Carapace Shield
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the Shield amount of Carapace by 30%.

level1.name: Survival Instincts
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Locust Health and damage
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Locust's Health by 100% and damage by 60%.

level4.name: Adrenal Overload
level4.fullTooltip: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain 25% increased Attack Speed.

level4.name: Needlespine
level4.fullTooltip: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

level4.name: Prolific Dispersal
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Toxic Nest by 30%, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, and add 2 additional charges.

level7.name: Vile Nest
level7.fullTooltip: Toxic Nests Slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

level7.name: Networked Carapace
level7.fullTooltip: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

level7.name: Calldown: MULE
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 90 Health every 1 second.

level10.name: Ultimate Evolution
level10.shortTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it
level10.fullTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

level10.name: Evolve Monstrosity
level10.shortTooltip: Minion or Locust becomes a powerful Monstrosity
level10.fullTooltip: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

level13.name: Spatial Efficiency
level13.fullTooltip: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.

level13.name: Soma Transference
level13.shortTooltip: Spike Burst heals for each Hero hit
level13.fullTooltip: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

level13.name: Bombard Strain
level13.shortTooltip: Locusts gain a ranged attack, increased duration
level13.fullTooltip: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack and their duration is increased by 75%.

level16.name: Envenomed Spikes
level16.shortTooltip: Spike Burst Slows Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also Slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

level16.name: Adrenaline Boost
level16.shortTooltip: Carapace increases Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

level16.name: Volatile Mutation
level16.shortTooltip: Heroic summons radiate damage
level16.fullTooltip: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die. Enemy Heroes hit heal the clone or Monstrosity for 75% of the damage dealt.

level16.name: Locust Brood
level16.shortTooltip: Spawn a group of Locusts
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

level20.name: Evolutionary Link
level20.shortTooltip: Ultimate Evolution target gets a Shield
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Ultimate Evolution by 50%.  As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

level20.name: Evolution Complete
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Monstrosity's Basic Attack damage by 100%.

level20.name: Hivemind
level20.fullTooltip: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and Shielding.

level20.name: Locust Nest
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

basic.name: Stab
basic.shortTooltip: Shoots a spike that deals damage to the first enemy it contacts.
basic.fullTooltip: Shoots a spike towards target area that deals 119 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy it contacts.

basic.name: Spike Burst
basic.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deals 120 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

basic.name: Carapace
basic.fullTooltip: Shields the assisted ally for 150 (+4% per level). Allied Heroes are healed for 22 (+4% per level) Health per second while the Shield is active. Lasts for 6 seconds.

mount.name: Deep Tunnel
mount.fullTooltip: Order your Evolved Monstrosity to quickly tunnel to a visible location

heroic.name: Cancel Symbiote
heroic.fullTooltip: Cancels the Symbiote ability.

Alarak.name: Alarak
Alarak.title: Highlord of the Tal'darim
Alarak.searchText: Alarak Ascendant Protoss SC SC2 StarCraft Star2 Starcraft2 II 2 Legacy of the Void LotV Covert Ops CO
Alarak.description: A combo Assassin that can move enemies around and punish mistakes.

basic.name: Discord Strike
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and silence enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 175 (+4% per level) damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

basic.name: Telekinesis
basic.shortTooltip: Push enemies towards a location
basic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Create a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

basic.name: Lightning Surge
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and an additional 100% damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore 70 (+4% per level) health for each Hero hit.

heroic.name: Deadly Charge
heroic.shortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
heroic.fullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

heroic.name: Counter-Strike
heroic.shortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
heroic.fullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

trait.name: Sadism
trait.shortTooltip: Each point of Sadism increases Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing against enemy Heroes by 1%  Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.
trait.fullTooltip: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.  Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Unleash Deadly Charge
heroic.shortTooltip: Charge Recklessly
heroic.fullTooltip: Unleash Alarak's Deadly Charge.  Issuing a move order while this is channeling will cancel the cast at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

basic.name: Lightning Surge
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and an additional 100% damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore 70 (+4% per level) health for each Hero hit.

trait.name: Unleash Deadly Charge
trait.shortTooltip: Charge Recklessly
trait.fullTooltip: Unleash Alarak's Deadly Charge.  Issuing a move order while this is channeling will cancel the cast at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

trait.name: Deadly Charge
trait.shortTooltip: Deal increased ability damage to Heroes
trait.fullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.  Sadism  Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.  Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

trait.name: Counter-Strike
trait.shortTooltip: Deal increased ability damage to Heroes
trait.fullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  Sadism  Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.  Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

level1.name: Ruthless Momentum
level1.shortTooltip: Reduce cooldown at high Health
level1.fullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Telekinesis from 30 to 20.  Telekinesis's cooldown recharges 75% faster while above 75% Health.

level1.name: Sustaining Power
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Lightning Surge healing
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

level1.name: Extended Lightning
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Reduce Sadism, empower Lightning Surge
level1.fullTooltip: Reduce Sadism by 10%.  Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.  Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

level4.name: Chaos Reigns
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes to increase Discord Strike damage
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 100 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

level4.name: Negatively Charged
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Increase Lightning Surge center damage
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%.  Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 4%.

level4.name: Show of Force
level4.shortTooltip: Ability combos deal bonus damage, grant Sadism
level4.fullTooltip: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 65 (+4% per level) damage and increase Sadism by 2%, stacking up to 20%.    Sadism gained from Show of Force is lost on death.

level7.name: Dissonance
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

level7.name: Hindered Motion
level7.fullTooltip: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 3 seconds.

level7.name: Applied Force
level7.shortTooltip: Reduce Sadism, increase Telekinesis distance, range
level7.fullTooltip: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

level10.name: Deadly Charge
level10.shortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
level10.fullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

level10.name: Counter-Strike
level10.shortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
level10.fullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

level13.name: Blade of the Highlord
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 2% stacking up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Blade of the Highlord is lost on death.

level13.name: Pure Malice
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

level13.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
level13.shortTooltip: Mark and damage Hero to increase Sadism
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds.  Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

level16.name: Lethal Onslaught
level16.shortTooltip: Discord Strike grants Sadism bonus to Basic Attacks
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

level16.name: Lightning Barrage
level16.shortTooltip: Center hits grant free Lightning Surge cast
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

level16.name: Mocking Strikes
level16.shortTooltip: Reduce cooldowns against disabled Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 3 seconds.

level20.name: Counter-Strike
level20.shortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
level20.fullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

level20.name: Deadly Charge
level20.shortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
level20.fullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

level20.name: Last Laugh
level20.shortTooltip: Cleanse and teleport, but reduce Health
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

level20.name: Hasty Bargain
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to reduce Sadism bonus and reset Basic Ability cooldowns
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

Alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza
Alexstrasza.title: The Life-Binder
Alexstrasza.searchText: Alexstraza Alekstrasza Alekstraza Warcraft 2 WC2 WoW Cataclysm Wrath of the Lich King WotLK dragon elf Queen of Dragons
Alexstrasza.description: A Healer who shares her Health with allies and can transform into a Dragon to empower her Abilities.

basic.name: Gift of Life
basic.shortTooltip: Give a portion of Health to an allied Hero
basic.fullTooltip: Sacrifice 15% of Alexstrasza's current Health, healing an allied Hero for 150% of that amount.  Dragonqueen: Breath of Life Cooldown greatly reduced and does not cost Health.

basic.name: Abundance
basic.shortTooltip: Heal allied Heroes in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 20% of their maximum Health.  Dragonqueen: Preservation Heal area and amount greatly increased.

basic.name: Flame Buffet
basic.shortTooltip: Launch a fireball that ignites enemies and can Slow them
basic.fullTooltip: Launch a fireball, Burning enemies hit for 75 (+4% per level) damage over 5.5 seconds.  Hitting enemies that are already Burning deals 125 (+4% per level) bonus damage upon impact, Slows them by 40% decaying over 2 seconds, and refunds the Mana cost.  Dragonqueen: Wing Buffet Damage and Knockback enemies in an arc.

heroic.name: Life-Binder
heroic.shortTooltip: Link Alexstrasza's Health with an ally
heroic.fullTooltip: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 (+4% per level) Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

heroic.name: Cleansing Flame
heroic.shortTooltip: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

trait.name: Dragonqueen
trait.shortTooltip: Transform into a dragon aspect with empowered Abilities
trait.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, transform into a dragon and gain 500 (+4% per level) Health.  While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Abilities are empowered, and her Basic Attacks deal 143 (+4% per level) damage and heal allied Heroes for 43 (+4% per level) in an arc in front of her. Additionally, the duration of incoming Stuns, Roots, and Slows, is reduced by 50%.  Lasts 15 seconds.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

level1.name: Live and Let Live
level1.shortTooltip: High Health reduces Gift of Life cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

level1.name: Circle of Life
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes empower Abundance
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health.  Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

level1.name: Flames of Fury
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet.  Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

level4.name: Surge of Vitality
level4.fullTooltip: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

level4.name: Heat Exhaustion
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Flame Buffet's initial Slow from 40% to 60%.

level4.name: Exuberance
level4.fullTooltip: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

level7.name: Lifeblossom
level7.shortTooltip: Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at high Health
level7.fullTooltip: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.

level7.name: Verdant Flourish
level7.shortTooltip: Regen Globe and Abundance healing increased
level7.fullTooltip: Alexstrasza receives 30% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.

level7.name: Fire Within
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.

level10.name: Life-Binder
level10.shortTooltip: Link Alexstrasza's Health with an ally
level10.fullTooltip: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 (+4% per level) Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

level10.name: Cleansing Flame
level10.shortTooltip: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky
level10.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

level13.name: Dragon Scales
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 40 Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

level13.name: Pacify
level13.shortTooltip: Slow an enemy Hero and reduce their damage
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.

level13.name: Life Unbound
level13.shortTooltip: Heal an ally and damage enemies
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 15% of their maximum Health and deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.

level16.name: Tough Love
level16.shortTooltip: Gift of Life grants Armor at high Health
level16.fullTooltip: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life grants its target 20 Armor for 2 seconds.

level16.name: Overprotective
level16.shortTooltip: Abundance grants Shields
level16.fullTooltip: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 3 seconds equal to 60% of the amount healed.

level16.name: Draconic Discipline
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Dragonqueen duration
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by 7 seconds.

level20.name: Ritual of Life
level20.fullTooltip: Life-Binder activates 3 times over 6 seconds.

level20.name: On Ruby Wings
level20.fullTooltip: Healing or damaging Heroes 8 or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for 15 seconds upon landing.

level20.name: Ancient Flame
level20.fullTooltip: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet, but her Attack Speed is reduced by 25%.

level20.name: Blessing of the Red
level20.shortTooltip: Grant bonus Health to an ally
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.

basic.shortTooltip: Heal an allied Hero
basic.fullTooltip: Heal an allied Hero for 20% of Alexstrasza's current Health.

basic.name: Preservation

basic.fullTooltip: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 30% of their maximum Health.

basic.name: Wing Buffet

basic.fullTooltip: Deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area, knocking them back and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

trait.shortTooltip: Transform into a dragon aspect with empowered Abilities
trait.fullTooltip: Alexstrasza has transformed into a powerful dragon aspect, gaining 500 (+4% per level) Health, resistance to disabling effects, and empowered Basic Attacks and Abilities.

mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

Amazon.title: Amazon Warmatron
Amazon.searchText: Casia Amazon Javazon D2 Diablo 2 II Diablo2 Human
Amazon.description: An Assassin who specializes against Physical Attackers.

basic.name: Lightning Fury
basic.shortTooltip: Hurl a lightning javelin that splits upon impact
basic.fullTooltip: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 175 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 175 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their path.

basic.name: Blinding Light
basic.shortTooltip: Blind enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, deal 50 (+4% per level) damage and Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds.  Passive: Cassia deals 20% increased damage to Blinded targets.

basic.name: Fend
basic.shortTooltip: Charge at a target and rapidly attack nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving channel for up to 1.5 seconds, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes.

heroic.name: Ball Lightning
heroic.shortTooltip: Throw a bouncing lightning ball
heroic.fullTooltip: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

heroic.name: Valkyrie
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon a Valkyrie to impale enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

trait.name: Avoidance
trait.shortTooltip: Gain Physical Armor while moving
trait.fullTooltip: While moving unmounted, Cassia gains 40 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing the damage taken by 40%.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

trait.name: Avoidance
trait.shortTooltip: Gain Physical Armor while moving
trait.fullTooltip: While moving unmounted, Cassia gains 40 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing the damage taken by 40%.

basic.name: Cancel Fend
basic.fullTooltip: End Fend early.

level1.name: Thunderstroke
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Empower Lightning Fury
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Lightning Fury.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Lightning Fury's damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Lightning Fury gains a 2nd charge and its Mana cost is reduced from 30 to 15.

level1.name: Seraph's Hymn
level1.shortTooltip: Empower Blinding Light, Basic Attacks
level1.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Blinding Light by 33%. Basic Attacks against Blinded enemies deal 100% more damage.

level1.name: Charged Strikes
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to empower Basic Attacks
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 20% and cause Basic Attacks against non-Structures to bounce to nearby enemy Heroes for 8 seconds.

level4.name: Inner Light
level4.shortTooltip: Emit Blinding Light when Stunned or Rooted
level4.fullTooltip: Whenever Cassia is Stunned or Rooted, Blinding Light is cast at her location.  This effect has a 6 second cooldown.  Passive: Blinding Light's radius is increased by 25%.

level4.name: Ring of the Leech
level4.fullTooltip: Cassia heals for 25% of the damage she deals to Blinded enemies.

level4.name: Plate of the Whale
level4.fullTooltip: Regenerate 5 Health per second while Avoidance is active.  Quest: For every 5 Basic Attacks absorbed with Avoidance, it regenerates an additional 1 Health per second.  Reward: After absorbing 75 Basic Attacks, increase Cassia's maximum Health by 10%.

level7.name: Impale
level7.fullTooltip: Enemies below 60% Health take 50% increased damage from Fend.

level7.name: War Traveler
level7.fullTooltip: Cassia gains 8% Movement Speed every 1 second while Avoidance is active, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when Cassia stops moving or uses an Ability.

level7.name: Surge of Light
level7.fullTooltip: After taking 500 (+4% per level) damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 210 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.

level10.name: Ball Lightning
level10.shortTooltip: Throw a bouncing lightning ball
level10.fullTooltip: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

level10.name: Valkyrie
level10.shortTooltip: Summon a Valkyrie to impale enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

level13.name: Grounding Bolt
level13.fullTooltip: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

level13.name: Thundergod's Vigor
level13.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

level13.name: Lunging Strike
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Fend's range and area by 20%, and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

level16.name: Pierce
level16.shortTooltip: Lightning Fury pierces
level16.fullTooltip: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.

level16.name: Penetrate
level16.shortTooltip: Consecutive Fend hits deal increased damage
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies take 3% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.

level16.name: Martial Law
level16.shortTooltip: Disabled Heroes take additional damage
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

level20.name: Infinite Lightning
level20.fullTooltip: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.

level20.name: Imprisoning Light
level20.fullTooltip: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Titan's Revenge
level20.fullTooltip: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2.

Ana.name: Ana
Ana.title: Veteran Sniper
Ana.description: A burst Healer who uses precise skillshots to heal allies and can deny enemy healing.

basic.name: Healing Dart
basic.shortTooltip: Shoot a dart that heals an Ally
basic.fullTooltip: Fire a dart which heals the first allied Hero hit for 195 (+4% per level) Health. Does not affect full Health Heroes.

basic.name: Biotic Grenade
basic.shortTooltip: Toss a grenade that heals allies, prevents enemy healing
basic.fullTooltip: Toss a grenade at the target area. Allied Heroes hit are healed for 152 (+4% per level) Health and receive 25% increased healing from Ana for 4 seconds. Enemies hit take 60 (+4% per level) damage and receive 100% less healing for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Sleep Dart
basic.shortTooltip: Fire a dart that puts enemies to Sleep
basic.fullTooltip: Fire a dart that puts the first enemy Hero hit to Sleep, Stunning them for 3 seconds. Sleep's effects end instantly if the target takes damage after the first 0.5 seconds.  Cannot be used on Vehicles.

heroic.name: Nano Boost
heroic.shortTooltip: Grant ally Spell Power, reduced cooldowns
heroic.fullTooltip: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

heroic.name: Eye of Horus
heroic.shortTooltip: Fire unlimited range healing and damaging rounds
heroic.fullTooltip: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for 225 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 135 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

trait.name: Shrike
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal damage over time
trait.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks apply a Dose to enemies, dealing an additional 40 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds, and stacking up to 5 times. Every 0.5 seconds, Ana is healed for 50% of the damage dealt by Shrike.  Aim Down Sights  Activating Shrike reduces your Movement Speed by 25%, but increases the Range of Healing Dart and Sleep Dart by 25% while also allowing them to pierce one Hero. Lasts until canceled.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

basic.name: High Powered Round
basic.fullTooltip: Fire a specialized round with unlimited range, piercing all allied and enemy Heroes in its path. Allies are healed for 225 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 135 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.

basic.fullTooltip: Cancels Eye of Horus.

level1.fullTooltip: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

level1.name: Slumber Shells
level1.shortTooltip: Sleep Dart Slows
level1.fullTooltip: Upon waking, enemy Heroes are Slowed by 25% for 3 seconds.

level1.name: Vampiric Rounds
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Increase Shrike Healing
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero.  Reward: Increase Shrike's healing by an additional 1.5%.

level4.fullTooltip: Increase the bonus healing duration of Biotic Grenade by 50% and reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds.

level4.name: Overdose
level4.fullTooltip: Sleep Dart applies 4 Doses.  While Aim Down Sights is active, Sleep Dart pierces all enemy Heroes.

level4.name: Debilitating Dart
level4.shortTooltip: Fire a dart that reduces damage and Slows
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to fire a dart which Slows the Movement Speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Anti-Healer
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the area of Biotic Grenade by 25% and the duration of the healing reduction by 25%.

level7.name: Night Terrors
level7.fullTooltip: Upon waking, enemy Heroes take 10% of their Maximum Health in damage. If a Hero is not woken up early, set the cooldown of Sleep Dart to 5 seconds.

level7.name: Mind-Numbing Agent
level7.fullTooltip: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10%.

level10.name: Nano Boost
level10.shortTooltip: Grant ally Spell Power, reduced cooldowns
level10.fullTooltip: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

level13.name: Speed Serum
level13.fullTooltip: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 2 seconds.

level13.name: Purifying Darts
level13.fullTooltip: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.

level13.name: Smelling Salts
level13.fullTooltip: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.

level16.name: Sharpshooter
level16.shortTooltip: Empower consecutive Healing Darts
level16.fullTooltip: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% if it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

level16.name: Concentrated Doses
level16.shortTooltip: Doses empower Healing Dart
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

level16.name: Active Reload
level16.shortTooltip: Gain extra Healing Dart charges
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.

level20.name: Nano Infusion
level20.shortTooltip: Nano Boost heals for damage dealt
level20.fullTooltip: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.

level20.name: Deadeye
level20.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes increases healing and damage
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Eye Of Horus' healing and damage by 4% for every Hero hit. This bonus resets after all shots have been fired.

level20.name: Armored Stance
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Shrike's damage by 50%. While Aim Down Sights is active, gain 25 Armor.

level20.name: Dynamic Optics
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 3 seconds, up to 100%. While Aim Down Sights is active, increase your Basic Attack Range by 4.

Anduin.name: Anduin
Anduin.title: King of Stormwind
Anduin.searchText: Human Wrynn Priest Stormwind Alliance WoW World of Warcraft  Burning Crusade BC Wrath Lich King WotLK Cataclysm Mists of Pandaria MoP Warlords Draenor WoD Legion Hearthstone HS BFA Battle for Azeroth
Anduin.description: A ranged Healer with the ability to pluck an ally from danger.

basic.name: Flash Heal
basic.shortTooltip: Cast a heal on an Ally
basic.fullTooltip: Cast for 0.75 seconds to heal an allied Hero for 260 (+4% per level).

basic.name: Divine Star
basic.shortTooltip: Send a heavenly bolt that damages and heals
basic.fullTooltip: Send light that deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and then returns to Anduin, healing allied Heroes for 130 (+4% per level) in a wider path. Healing increases by 25% per enemy Hero hit.

basic.name: Chastise
basic.shortTooltip: Shove light forward that Roots
basic.fullTooltip: Shove a swell of light forward, dealing 145 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Rooting them for 1.25 seconds.

heroic.name: Holy Word: Salvation
heroic.shortTooltip: Protect and heal allies near Anduin
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.

heroic.name: Lightbomb
heroic.shortTooltip: Stun enemies around an ally
heroic.fullTooltip: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 (+4% per level) damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

trait.name: Leap of Faith
trait.shortTooltip: Pull an allied Hero to your location
trait.fullTooltip: Faith instantly pulls an allied Hero to Anduin's location, granting them Unstoppable while they travel.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Cancel Holy Word: Salvation
heroic.shortTooltip: Cancel Holy Word: Salvation
heroic.fullTooltip: Cancel Holy Word: Salvation.

level1.name: Renew
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks enhance Flash Heal
level1.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes empower the next Flash Heal to also heal for 130 (+4% per level) over 5 seconds.

level1.name: Pursued by Grace
level1.shortTooltip: Damage Heroes to heal nearby allies
level1.fullTooltip: Damaging an enemy Hero heals the lowest Health allied Hero near Anduin for 33 (+4% per level).

level1.name: Bold Strategy
level1.shortTooltip: Weaken Flash Heal to gain extra Talents
level1.fullTooltip: Anduin gains his other level 1 Talents, but Flash Heal's cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

level4.name: Moral Compass
level4.shortTooltip: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at its apex
level4.fullTooltip: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at 2 Heroes close to its apex for 70% damage.

level4.name: Holy Reach
level4.fullTooltip: After hitting an enemy with Chastise, Anduin's next Basic Attack has 50% more range, 75% more damage, and heals allied Heroes near Anduin for 100 (+4% per level).

level4.name: Inner Fire
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Basic Attack range by 15%.

level7.name: Binding Heal
level7.fullTooltip: Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for 104 (+4% per level).

level7.name: Power Word: Shield
level7.shortTooltip: Divine Star can grant Anduin a Shield
level7.fullTooltip: If Divine Star hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield that absorbs 172 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Blessed Recovery
level7.shortTooltip: Recover Health after taking high damage
level7.fullTooltip: If Anduin loses more than 8% of his maximum Health at once, recover 15% Health over 3 seconds.   This effect has a 10 second cooldown.  Current Health required: 133 (+4% per level)

level10.name: Holy Word: Salvation
level10.shortTooltip: Protect and heal allies near Anduin
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.

level10.name: Lightbomb
level10.shortTooltip: Stun enemies around an ally
level10.fullTooltip: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 (+4% per level) damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

level13.name: Speed of the Pious
level13.shortTooltip: Divine Star grants Anduin Move Speed
level13.fullTooltip: While Divine Star is traveling, gain 30% Movement Speed.

level13.name: Enchant Boots - Lion's Speed
level13.shortTooltip: Leap of Faith grants Move Speed while available
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 5% Movement Speed. This bonus is quadrupled while Leap of Faith's cooldown is available.

level13.name: Push Forward!
level13.shortTooltip: Damage Heroes to gain Move Speed
level13.fullTooltip: Damaging an enemy Hero grants 2.5% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 20%.

level16.name: Evenhanded Blessings
level16.shortTooltip: Refund Flash Heal cooldown on new targets
level16.fullTooltip: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, refund 50% of its cooldown.

level16.name: Holy Nova
level16.shortTooltip: Divine Star explodes when caught
level16.fullTooltip: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) and damaging enemies for 105 (+4% per level).

level16.name: Inner Focus
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to reset Flash Heal cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal and its next cast heals for 40% more.  Damaging enemy Heroes with Divine Star reduces this cooldown by 8 seconds.

level16.name: Lightwell
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to summon a healing Lightwell
level16.fullTooltip: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for 75 (+4% per level). The well only fades after healing 10 times or when recast.  This cooldown is reduced by 1 second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.

level20.name: Light of Stormwind
level20.shortTooltip: Holy Word: Salvation grants allies Move Speed
level20.fullTooltip: Holy Word: Salvation healing is increased to up to 30% of maximum Health and upon ending, allied Heroes gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Glyph of Faith
level20.shortTooltip: Leap of Faith gains a charge
level20.fullTooltip: Leap of Faith gains a 2nd charge.

level20.name: Varian's Legacy
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks burn enemies for 87 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds and Anduin heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

level20.name: Desperate Prayer
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to desperately heal an allied Hero
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to desperately heal an allied Hero for 540 (+4% per level), but kneel for 2 seconds, unable to act.  Using Desperate Prayer places Flash Heal on a 10 second cooldown.

level4.fullTooltip: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

level7.name: Leeching Scarabs

level16.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 4 seconds.

level16.name: Beetle, Juiced
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks to Heroes spawn Beetles
level16.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes spawns a Beetle.

level20.name: Hive Master
level20.fullTooltip: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 37 (+4% per level) health.

level20.name: Cryptweave
level20.fullTooltip: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 4 seconds per Cocoon.

level20.name: Hardened Shield

Artanis.name: Artanis

Artanis.searchText: Artanis Protoss Aiur LotV Legacy of the Void StarCraft II 2 SC2 Brood War BW SC 1 SC1 Star2 Starcraft2
Artanis.description: A tough Bruiser that deals high damage if the enemy team is unable to shut him down.

basic.name: Blade Dash

heroic.name: Suppression Pulse
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and Blind enemies in a large area
heroic.fullTooltip: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

trait.name: Shield Overload
trait.shortTooltip: Gain a Shield when attacked at low Health
trait.fullTooltip: After taking damage while below 75% Health, Artanis gains a 375 (+4% per level) Shield for 5 seconds. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone

While they remain near Auriel, 30% of their damage to Heroes and 10% of their damage to non-Heroes is converted to energy. Auriel can only have Bestow Hope on 1 ally at a time.  Auriel can store up to 475 (+4% per level) energy.

level10.shortTooltip: Empower Globe of Annihilation

level13.name: Brutish Vanguard
level13.shortTooltip: Demons have more Health, Warriors Slow
level13.fullTooltip: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%.

level13.name: Cydaea's Kiss
level13.shortTooltip: Reduce All Shall Burn Channel, final damage heals
level13.fullTooltip: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by 0.5 seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for 8% of his maximum Health.

level13.name: Chain of Command
level13.fullTooltip: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by 2 seconds and they grant 25% increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan's summoned Demons.

level16.name: Total Annihilation
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Globe damage to Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 4% of their maximum Health.

level16.name: Hell Rift
level16.shortTooltip: All Shall Burn summons and buffs Demon Warriors
level16.fullTooltip: If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 5 seconds.

level16.name: Sin's Grasp
level16.shortTooltip: All Shall Burn Slows, reduce cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: All Shall Burn Slows the enemy target by 15% during its Channel. If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by 50%, and the enemy is Slowed by 45% for 2 seconds.

level20.name: Siegebreaker
level20.fullTooltip: Azmodan's Demons deal 50% increased damage to Structures.

level20.name: Black Pool
level20.shortTooltip: Tide of Sin damages and reduces Armor over time
level20.fullTooltip: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for 5 seconds. Enemies within the pool lose 8 Armor per second, up to 15, and take 56 (+4% per level) damage per second.

level20.name: Pride
level20.fullTooltip: After gaining 400 Annihilation, the area of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 15% and it deals 100 additional damage.

level20.name: Trample
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by 60% for 1 second.

Barbarian.name: Sonya
Barbarian.title: Wandering Barbarian
Barbarian.searchText: Sonya Sonia Barbarian Nephalem D3 Diablo 3 Diablo3 III Reaper of Souls RoS
Barbarian.description: A Bruiser that's great at capturing Mercenary camps and likes to dive into the enemy team.

basic.name: Ancient Spear
basic.shortTooltip: Throw a spear and pull self to the first enemy hit, stunning and dealing damage
basic.fullTooltip: Throw out a spear that pulls Sonya to the first enemy hit, dealing 173 (+4% per level) damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.

basic.name: Seismic Slam
basic.shortTooltip: Damage an enemy and splash damage behind them
basic.fullTooltip: Deals 176 (+4% per level) damage to the target enemy, and 44 (+4% per level) to enemies behind the target.

basic.name: Whirlwind
basic.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies and heal for a percentage of damage dealt
basic.fullTooltip: Deals 126 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds, healing for 25% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

heroic.name: Leap
heroic.shortTooltip: Jump to a location, deal damage, and stun enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

heroic.name: Wrath of the Berserker
heroic.shortTooltip: Increase damage and reduce disable duration
heroic.fullTooltip: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

trait.name: Fury
trait.shortTooltip: Generate Fury in combat. All Abilities grant Move Speed
trait.fullTooltip: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking damage or dealing Basic Attack damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Cancel Leap
heroic.fullTooltip: Cancels Arreat Crater

basic.name: Cancel Whirlwind
basic.fullTooltip: Cancels the Whirlwind ability

trait.name: Fury
trait.fullTooltip: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking damage or dealing Basic Attack damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

level1.name: Furious Blow
level1.shortTooltip: Empower Seismic Slam
level1.fullTooltip: Every 4th cast of Seismic Slam deals 50% more damage to the primary target and costs no Fury.

level1.name: War Paint
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks heal
level1.fullTooltip: Sonya's Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt.

level1.name: Tough As Nails
level1.shortTooltip: Periodically gain Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Every 16 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%.  Stores up to 3 charges. Charges refresh 200% faster while Fury's Movement Speed bonus is active.

level4.name: Shattered Ground
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the length of Seismic Slam's splash by 66% and increase its splash damage to 100% of its base damage.

level4.name: Hurricane
level4.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Whirlwind by 2 seconds. Casting Whirlwind removes all Slows and Roots from Sonya.

level4.name: Shot Of Fury
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: After casting Seismic Slam, your next Basic Attack deals 40% more damage.

level7.name: Poisoned Spear
level7.shortTooltip: Ancient Spear deals damage over time
level7.fullTooltip: Ancient Spear deals an additional 100% damage over 6 seconds.

level7.name: Life Funnel
level7.fullTooltip: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35% of damage dealt.

level7.name: Battle Rage
level7.shortTooltip: Increase damage to Mercenaries, activate to heal
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to instantly restore 10% of Sonya's maximum Health. Stores up to 2 charges. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: Sonya deals 25% more damage to Mercenaries.

level10.name: Leap
level10.shortTooltip: Jump to a location, deal damage, and stun enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

level10.name: Wrath of the Berserker
level10.shortTooltip: Increase damage and reduce disable duration
level10.fullTooltip: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

level13.name: Mystical Spear
level13.shortTooltip: Ancient Spear always pulls, cooldown reduced
level13.fullTooltip: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. When used this way, Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

level13.name: Ruthless
level13.shortTooltip: Increase Whirlwind damage to low Health targets
level13.fullTooltip: Whirlwind deals an additional 50 (+4% per level) damage per second to Heroes below 33% Health. Does not generate additional healing.

level13.name: No Escape
level13.fullTooltip: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 20%.

level16.name: Giant Slammer
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal bonus damage
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal an additional 1.25% of Heroes' maximum Health as damage and heal Sonya for the damage dealt.

level16.name: Rampage
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Ancient Spear cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack damage by 25%. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 0.5 seconds.

level16.name: Nerves of Steel
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to gain a Shield
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

level20.name: Arreat Crater
level20.shortTooltip: Leap creates a crater and has reduced cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

level20.name: Striding Giant
level20.shortTooltip: Wrath of the Berserker can grant Unstoppable
level20.fullTooltip: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by 10% and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

level20.name: Composite Spear
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Ancient Spear range, grants Armor
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Ancient Spear's range by 50%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Ancient Spear grants 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

level20.name: Ignore Pain
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 60 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 60% less damage. Usable while Whirlwinding.

Butcher.name: The Butcher
Butcher.title: Flesh Carver
Butcher.searchText: The Butcher TheButcher Demon D1 D3 Diablo 1 3 I III Diablo1 Diablo3
Butcher.description: An Assassin who starts slow, but deals extreme damage after collecting enough Meat.

basic.name: Hamstring
basic.shortTooltip: Deals damage in an area and slows enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 110 (+4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.  The Butcher's next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

basic.name: Butcher's Brand
basic.shortTooltip: Brand an enemy, granting Life Steal against them
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 37 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and Brand them for 4 seconds. The Butcher's Basic Attacks against the Branded target heal him for 75% of the damage done.  Basic Attacks against Branded Heroes heal for double and extend the duration of the Brand by 0.5 seconds.

basic.name: Ruthless Onslaught
basic.shortTooltip: Charges at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage
basic.fullTooltip: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If The Butcher reaches the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 119 (+4% per level) damage.

heroic.name: Furnace Blast
heroic.shortTooltip: Deal damage around The Butcher after a delay
heroic.fullTooltip: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

heroic.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
heroic.shortTooltip: Chain an enemy Hero to a post
heroic.fullTooltip: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

trait.name: Fresh Meat
trait.shortTooltip: Gather strength by killing enemies and collecting their meat
trait.fullTooltip: Upon dying, nearby enemy Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and enemy Heroes drop 20 Fresh Meat. Fresh Meat can be picked up to gain 0.5 Attack Damage per Meat. The Butcher loses 15 Fresh Meat upon dying.  Quest: Collect 200 Fresh Meat.  Reward: Gain an additional 125 Attack Damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. Heroes continue to drop 10 Fresh Meat, Minions no longer drop Fresh Meat, and Fresh Meat is no longer lost on death.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

basic.name: Ruthless Onslaught Cancel
basic.fullTooltip: Cancels the Ruthless Onslaught ability.

level1.name: Invigoration
level1.shortTooltip: Reduces Hamstring Mana cost, cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

level1.name: Block
level1.shortTooltip: Periodically gain Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level1.name: Chop Meat
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Hamstring damage to non-Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Hamstring damage by 100% to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

level4.name: Flail Axe
level4.fullTooltip: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

level4.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
level4.shortTooltip: Reduces Ruthless Onslaught cooldown on impact
level4.fullTooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33% upon impact.

level4.name: Cheap Shot
level4.shortTooltip: Increase Hamstring damage to disabled targets
level4.fullTooltip: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.

level7.name: Insatiable Blade
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Move Speed while enemies are branded
level7.fullTooltip: While facing a branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by 25%.

level7.name: Victuals
level7.fullTooltip: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals 5% of his maximum health.

level7.name: Meat Shield
level7.fullTooltip: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

level10.name: Furnace Blast
level10.shortTooltip: Deal damage around The Butcher after a delay
level10.fullTooltip: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

level10.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
level10.shortTooltip: Chain an enemy Hero to a post
level10.fullTooltip: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Cleaver
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

level13.name: Savage Charge
level13.fullTooltip: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

level13.name: Brutal Strike
level13.fullTooltip: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

level16.name: Crippling Slam
level16.shortTooltip: Hamstring slow no longer fades and lasts longer
level16.fullTooltip: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 30%.

level16.name: Enraged
level16.shortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed and Armor at low Health
level16.fullTooltip: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%.  This effect has a 25 second cooldown.

level16.name: Blood Frenzy
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks grant Attack and Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.

level20.name: Fires of Hell
level20.fullTooltip: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

level20.name: Slaughterhouse
level20.shortTooltip: Lamb to the Slaughter chains all enemy Heroes
level20.fullTooltip: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

level20.name: Nexus Blades
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

level20.name: Bolt of the Storm
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Chen.name: Chen
Chen.title: Legendary Brewmaster
Chen.searchText: Chen Shen Stormstout Pandaren WoW World of Warcraft WC3 Warcraft3 Warcraft III 3 War3 Frozen Throne FT Mists of Pandaria MoP
Chen.description: A potent Bruiser that wears downs enemies and is resistant to burst damage.

basic.name: Flying Kick
basic.shortTooltip: Kick through target enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Kick through target enemy, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage.

basic.name: Keg Smash
basic.shortTooltip: Drench enemies in a nearby area with Brew, Slowing them
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage and soak enemies in Brew for 3 seconds, Slowing them by 10%. After 1.25 seconds, the Slow is increased to 40%.  After being used, this ability becomes Breath of Fire.  Breath of Fire Deal damage and Ignite Brew-soaked enemies.

basic.name: Stagger
basic.shortTooltip: Become immune to damage, then convert it to damage over time
basic.fullTooltip: Damage taken over the next 3 seconds is prevented.  Once this effect ends, Chen receives 75% of the damage taken over 5 seconds.  This damage cannot be modified.

heroic.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
heroic.shortTooltip: Split into three elemental spirits
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

heroic.name: Wandering Keg
heroic.shortTooltip: Roll around in the barrel and knock away enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

trait.name: Fortifying Brew
trait.shortTooltip: Gain Brew and a Shield while drinking
trait.fullTooltip: Chen drinks from his keg, gaining 50 Brew and 180 (+4% per level) temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 540 (+4% per level) while drinking. Shields persist for 4 seconds after he stops drinking.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Brew.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

basic.name: Storm
basic.shortTooltip: Gain a Shield
basic.fullTooltip: The spirits gain a Shield for 400 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds.  If this is the final Ability cast, the shield amount is increased to 750 (+4% per level) with no limited duration, and the duration of Storm, Earth, Fire is increased by 5 seconds.

basic.name: Earth
basic.shortTooltip: Leap to a location, damaging and Rooting enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Fire and Earth leap to the target location, dealing 32 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies in a large area by 70% for 1.5 seconds.  If this is the final Ability cast, increase the damage dealt by 300% and instead of Slowing, the leap Roots enemy Heroes hit for 1.75 seconds.

basic.name: Fire
basic.shortTooltip: Increase Attack Speed, damage
basic.fullTooltip: Increase the Attack Speed and Basic Attack damage of the spirits by 50% for 5 seconds.  If this is the final Ability cast, the Attack Speed and damage bonus is increased to 75% and the spirits gain 50% Movement Speed for its duration.

basic.name: Breath of Fire
basic.shortTooltip: Breathe fire in target direction, dealing damage and Igniting drenched enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 85 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies that are soaked in Brew are Ignited, dealing 165 (+4% per level) additional damage over 3 seconds and adding 1.5 seconds to the duration of the Slow from Keg Smash.    After being used or after 6 seconds, this ability becomes Keg Smash.  Keg Smash Damage and Slow enemies.

level1.name: Eye of the Tiger
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage, heal
level1.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Brew-soaked enemy Heroes deal 40% more damage and heal Chen for 40% of the damage done.

level1.name: Freshest Ingredients
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes heal more
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the healing duration of Regeneration Globes by 100%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Reduce Fortifying Brew's cooldown by 1 second, and 50% of its Shield persists indefinitely after drinking.

level1.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Abilities heal Chen
level1.fullTooltip: Chen heals for 3% of his maximum Health when his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

level4.name: Deadly Strike
level4.shortTooltip: Increase Flying Kick damage and remove Brew cost
level4.fullTooltip: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

level4.name: Accumulating Flame
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Ignited damage by 20%.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes who are Ignited increase its duration by 0.75 seconds.

level4.name: Withering Flames
level4.shortTooltip: Igniting Heroes reduces their Spell Power
level4.fullTooltip: Igniting an enemy Hero reduces their Spell Power by 50% for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Gift of the Ox
level7.shortTooltip: Increase Stagger's duration, reduce damage taken
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Stagger's damage prevention by 1 second, and reduce the amount of damage taken over time to 60% of damage taken.

level7.name: Brewmaster's Balance
level7.shortTooltip: Gain bonuses based on current level of Brew
level7.fullTooltip: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

level7.name: Elusive Brawler
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 30% Movement Speed and Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

level10.name: Wandering Keg
level10.shortTooltip: Roll around in the barrel and knock away enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

level10.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
level10.shortTooltip: Split into three elemental spirits
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

level13.name: Pressure Point
level13.fullTooltip: Flying Kick Slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

level13.name: A Touch of Honey
level13.shortTooltip: Increase Keg Smash Slow amount, duration
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the Slows from Keg Smash by 15% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

level13.name: Ring of Fire
level13.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies after Igniting them
level13.fullTooltip: After Igniting an enemy, become bathed in a fiery aura, dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

level13.name: Enough to Share
level13.fullTooltip: Fortifying Brew instantly grants Chen a Shield that absorbs 180 (+4% per level) damage, and each second grants nearby allied Heroes a Shield that absorbs 140 (+4% per level) damage, up to 420 (+4% per level).

level16.name: Flying Leap
level16.shortTooltip: Increased Range, reduce cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Flying Kick's range by 15% and reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds each time an enemy Hero takes damage from being Ignited.

level16.name: Celerity
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Stagger cooldown, grant Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Stagger by 1.5 seconds and grant Chen 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Combo Strikes
level16.shortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed, damage
level16.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals 75% bonus damage.  While Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew and for 2 seconds after, he gains 35% Attack Speed.

level20.name: Untapped Potential
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Wandering Keg's Movement Speed bonus from 70% to 125%, and its Armor bonus to 75 for its duration and 3 seconds afterwards.

level20.name: Elemental Conduit
level20.shortTooltip: All Storm, Earth, Fire Abilities are empowered
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and all of their Abilities are empowered.

level20.name: Purifying Brew
level20.fullTooltip: Casting Fortifying Brew grants Chen Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

level20.name: Energizing Brew
level20.shortTooltip: Fortifying Brew gives maximum Health, damage
level20.fullTooltip: If Chen Channels Fortifying Brew for its full duration, then he gains 20% bonus Health and 20% bonus damage for 25 seconds.
