Cho.name: Cho
Cho.title: Twilight's Hammer Chieftain
Cho.searchText: Cho'gall Chogall gall Ogre Twoheaded Two Headed Two-headed War2 Warcraft2 WC2 Warcraft II 2 Tides of Darkness ToD WoW World of Warcraft Cataclysm Warlords of Draenor WoD Horde
Cho.description: Head 1 of a 2 Headed Hero, Cho controls the body of Cho'gall.

basic.name: Surging Fist
basic.shortTooltip: Dash a direction knocking aside enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.

basic.name: Consuming Blaze
basic.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies and heal Cho
basic.fullTooltip: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for 40 (+4% per level) when an enemy is Ignited.

basic.name: Rune Bomb
basic.shortTooltip: Throw a Rune Bomb down a line. Gall can detonate it to do area damage
basic.fullTooltip: Roll a bomb dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area.

heroic.name: Upheaval
heroic.shortTooltip: Pull enemies in a large area
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

heroic.name: Hammer of Twilight
heroic.shortTooltip: Activate to knockback and Stun enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

trait.name: Ogre Hide
trait.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Armor
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 25 Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by 25%.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

basic.name: Surging Fist
basic.fullTooltip: Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.

trait.name: Ogre Hide
trait.shortTooltip: Increased Armor
trait.fullTooltip: Cho's Armor is increased by 25, but Gall's damage is reduced by 25%.  Gall can activate Ogre Rage to grant himself 25% increased damage, but remove this Armor bonus.

level1.name: Consuming Fire
level1.shortTooltip: Increased healing against Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.

level1.name: Fuel for the Flame
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Kills empower Consuming Blaze
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every Minion killed near Cho increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 0.3%.  Quest: Every Hero Takedown increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 3%.

level1.name: Calloused Hide
level1.shortTooltip: Ogre Hide increases healing received
level1.fullTooltip: Ogre Hide also increases healing received by 15%.

level4.name: Uppercut
level4.fullTooltip: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.

level4.name: Rollback
level4.fullTooltip: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

level4.name: Seared Flesh
level4.shortTooltip: Consecutive Basic Attacks deal bonus damage
level4.fullTooltip: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.

level7.name: Power Surge
level7.shortTooltip: Surging Fist cooldown lowers against Heroes
level7.fullTooltip: Each Hero hit by Surging Fist reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.

level7.name: Firestarter
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

level7.name: Enraged Regeneration
level7.shortTooltip: Gall's Ogre Rage increases Health Regen
level7.fullTooltip: While Gall's Ogre Rage is active, Cho's Health Regeneration is increased by 200%.

level10.name: Hammer of Twilight
level10.shortTooltip: Activate to knockback and Stun enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

level10.name: Upheaval
level10.shortTooltip: Pull enemies in a large area
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

level13.name: Surging Dash
level13.fullTooltip: While Channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.

level13.name: Twilight Veil
level13.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Ogre Hide Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide by 100% for 4 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

level13.name: Molten Block
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.

level16.name: Frenzied Fists
level16.shortTooltip: Surging Fist increases Attack Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

level16.name: Runic Feedback
level16.shortTooltip: Runic Blast reduces Rune Bomb cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 second per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

level16.name: Runed Gauntlet
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic cooldowns
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 5%.

level20.name: C'Thun's Gift
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks are now ranged, Slow targets
level20.fullTooltip: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and Slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

level20.name: Favor of the Old Gods
level20.fullTooltip: Upheaval Roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

level20.name: The Will of Cho
level20.fullTooltip: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by 2, to a max of 50 extra Armor.

level20.name: Hour of Twilight
level20.fullTooltip: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.

Chromie.name: Chromie
Chromie.title: Keeper of Time
Chromie.searchText: Chronormu Bronze Dragon WoW World of Warcraft Wrath of the Lich King WotLK Cataclysm Mists of Pandaria MoP Warlords of Draenor WoD
Chromie.description: A long range, high burst damage Mage, who requires good timing and setup.

basic.name: Sand Blast
basic.shortTooltip: Fire a long range blast that damages an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, fire a missile that deals 305 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. Deals 50% damage to Structures.  Casting Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind that mimics Chromie's Sand Blast and Basic Attack, dealing 40% damage. Maximum of 1 Echo active at a time.

basic.name: Dragons Breath
basic.shortTooltip: Fire a series of blasts in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Launch 3 blasts into the air that land every 0.75 seconds towards the targeted direction, dealing 204 (+4% per level) damage each.

basic.name: Time Trap
basic.shortTooltip: Place a trap that Time Stops Heroes
basic.fullTooltip: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. Chromie's Trait can be activated to detonate the trap, placing all nearby allied or enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 2 seconds. Maximum of 1 trap active at a time.

heroic.name: Temporal Loop
heroic.shortTooltip: Return an enemy Hero to a previous position
heroic.fullTooltip: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.  Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

heroic.name: Slowing Sands
heroic.shortTooltip: Create a Slowing area
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 5% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.

trait.name: Timewalker
trait.shortTooltip: Gain Talents earlier than everyone else
trait.fullTooltip: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!  Detonate Time Trap  Detonates active Time Traps.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Cancel Slowing Sands
heroic.fullTooltip: Cancel Slowing Sands

trait.name: Detonate Time Trap
trait.shortTooltip: Detonate a trap that Time Stops Heroes
trait.fullTooltip: Detonates active Time Traps, placing all nearby allied or enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 2 seconds.

level1.name: Once Again the First Time
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Sand Blast gains another Echo
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 40 Heroes with Sand Blast.  Reward: Increase the maximum number of active Echoes to 2.

level1.name: Deep Breathing
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hitting Heroes empowers Dragon's Breath
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 3, up to 75.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 75 and also increase Chromie's vision radius by 100%.

level1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to reveal an area Quest: Regen Globes increase Spell Power
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.  Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After gathering 15 Globes, Chromie gains 15% Spell Power.

level4.name: Chronic Conditions
level4.shortTooltip: Time Trap affects enemy/allied Move Speed
level4.fullTooltip: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds and allies gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

level4.name: Time Troubles
level4.fullTooltip: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap lose 20 Armor for 3 seconds and allies gain 20 Armor for 3 seconds.

level4.name: Andorhal Anomaly
level4.shortTooltip: Increase Time Trap charges, reduce cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the charges and maximum active Time Traps to 3, and reduce its cooldown by 8 seconds.

level7.name: Bronze Talons
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Sand Blast grants 40% additional Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds.

level7.name: Mobius Loop
level7.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes reduces Dragon's Breath cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Dragon's Breath reduces its cooldown by 1.75 seconds and restores 40 Mana.

level7.name: A Proper Greeting
level7.shortTooltip: Damage disabled Heroes to increase damage
level7.fullTooltip: Damaging a Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Hero grants 25% additional damage for 5 seconds.

level10.name: Slowing Sands
level10.shortTooltip: Create a Slowing area
level10.fullTooltip: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 5% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.

level10.name: Temporal Loop
level10.shortTooltip: Return an enemy Hero to a previous position
level10.fullTooltip: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.  Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

level13.name: Gnome Speed Ahead!
level13.shortTooltip: Sand Blast increases Move Speed and Regen
level13.fullTooltip: After casting Sand Blast, Chromie gains 20% Movement Speed and 200% increased Health Regeneration for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Here and There
level13.shortTooltip: Activate to swap positions with an Echo
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to an area near an Echo, swapping it with Chromie's previous location.

level13.name: Time Out
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

level16.name: Shifting Sands
level16.shortTooltip: Sand Blast grants Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 5% Spell Power for 8 seconds, up to a maximum of 50%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by the primary Sand Blast.

level16.name: Fast Forward
level16.shortTooltip: Long range Sand Blasts reduce its cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: If Sand Blast travels at least 50% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds and it refunds 10 Mana.

level16.name: Quantum Overdrive
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Spell Power by 25% for 8 seconds. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast reduces this cooldown by 3 seconds.

level20.name: Unravelling
level20.fullTooltip: Every 0.25 seconds, enemy Heroes Slowed by Slowing Sands have their Spell Armor reduced by 5 up to 30.

level20.name: Stuck in a Loop
level20.fullTooltip: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first, and Basic Abilities continue recharging for an additional 3 seconds. Increase the cooldown recharge rate from 500% to 700%.

level20.name: Piercing Sands
level20.fullTooltip: Sand Blast now pierces all enemies hit.

level20.name: Blessing of the Bronze
level20.shortTooltip: Increase allied Move Speed and reduce cooldowns
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to cause Chromie and all allied Heroes to gain 20% Movement Speed and their Basic Abilities recharge 35% faster for 8 seconds.  Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes reduces the cooldown of Blessing of the Bronze by 8 seconds.

Crusader.name: Johanna
Crusader.title: Crusader of Zakarum
Crusader.searchText: Johanna Johana Joana Joanna Crusader Nephalem D3 Diablo 3 Diablo3 III Reaper of Souls RoS
Crusader.description: A Tank who shines against Physical Attackers and can effectively clear groups of minions.

basic.name: Punish
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and slow enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Step forward dealing 113 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

basic.name: Condemn
basic.shortTooltip: Pulls and damages nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Johanna pulls nearby enemies toward her, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 58 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 200% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

basic.name: Shield Glare
basic.shortTooltip: Damages and blinds enemies in a cone
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Blind them for 1.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Falling Sword
heroic.shortTooltip: Jump to area, damaging and Slowing enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.   After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Blessed Shield
heroic.shortTooltip: Throw a bouncing shield that Stuns
heroic.fullTooltip: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

trait.name: Iron Skin
trait.shortTooltip: Becomes Unstoppable and gains a Shield
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to grant Johanna a Shield that absorbs 674 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, Johanna is Unstoppable.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

level1.name: Reinforce
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Abilities grant Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Using a Basic Ability grants 60 Physical Armor for 2.5 seconds.

level1.name: Hold Your Ground
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Iron Skin Shield, reduced cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 60% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

level1.name: Laws of Hope
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Health Regen, activate to burst heal
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to heal 30% of Johanna's max Health over 4 seconds.  Passive: Regenerate 1.5 (+4% per level) Health per second.

level4.name: Eternal Retaliation
level4.fullTooltip: Lower the cooldown of Condemn by 0.75 seconds and refund 3 Mana for every enemy hit. Maximum of 8 targets.

level4.name: Conviction
level4.fullTooltip: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

level4.name: Sins Exposed
level4.shortTooltip: Shield Glare makes enemies take bonus damage
level4.fullTooltip: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 90 (+4% per level) extra damage and the mark is removed.

level7.name: Subdue
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the Slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay.  Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish.  Reward: Punish always Slows by 80% and the Slow amount no longer decays.

level7.name: Zealous Glare
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the Blind duration of Shield Glare by 1 second. Johanna's Basic Attacks against Heroes with Shield Glare extend its duration by 1 second, up to a maximum of 3 seconds.

level7.name: Blessed Momentum
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Johanna's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

level10.name: Falling Sword
level10.shortTooltip: Jump to area, damaging and Slowing enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.   After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

level10.name: Blessed Shield
level10.shortTooltip: Throw a bouncing shield that Stuns
level10.fullTooltip: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

level13.name: Roar
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Punish's damage by 25%. This bonus is increased to 150% whenever Punish hits 2 or more Heroes.

level13.name: Holy Fury
level13.fullTooltip: Deal 12 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds.

level13.name: Blessed Hammer
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to create 2 hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing 84 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.

level16.name: Holy Renewal
level16.shortTooltip: Shield Glare heals for each Hero hit
level16.fullTooltip: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare restores 114 (+4% per level) health.

level16.name: Fanaticism
level16.shortTooltip: Damage taken during Iron Skin grants Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Iron Skin by 2 seconds. While Iron Skin is active, Johanna gains 8% Movement Speed each time she takes damage, up to 40%.

level16.name: Imposing Presence
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to Slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

level20.name: Heaven's Fury
level20.shortTooltip: Falling Sword bombards enemies with holy bolts
level20.fullTooltip: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by 3 seconds for each enemy hit.

level20.name: Radiating Faith
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Blessed Shield Stun duration, max targets
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blessed Shield by 2. Its Stun duration is increased to 2 seconds and all targets hit are Stunned for the maximum duration.

level20.name: Indestructible
level20.shortTooltip: Gain a Shield instead of dying
level20.fullTooltip: Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for 4 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

level20.name: Blinded By The Light
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to grant nearby allied Heroes a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.

Deckard.name: Deckard
Deckard.title: The Last Horadrim
Deckard.searchText: Cain D1 D2 D3 Diablo 1 2 3 I II III Diablo1 Diablo2 Diablo3
Deckard.description: A burst Healer who excels at preparing the battlefield before a fight and can cripple enemies with crowd control.

basic.name: Healing Potion
basic.shortTooltip: Throw Potions that heal allies
basic.fullTooltip: Throw a Healing Potion on the ground that heals the first allied Hero that comes in contact with it for 270 (+4% per level).  Limit 5 active Potions.

basic.name: Horadric Cube
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Release the Horadric Cube. After 0.5 seconds it explodes, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area and Slowing them by 35% for 1.75 seconds.

basic.name: Scroll Of Sealing
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and Root enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Unfurl an enchanted scroll over 2.25 seconds, forming a triangle that deals 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies inside and Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
heroic.shortTooltip: Put enemies to Sleep with a fascinating story
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

heroic.name: Lorenado
heroic.shortTooltip: Conjure a lorenado that knocks enemies away
heroic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

trait.name: Fortitude of the Faithful
trait.shortTooltip: Nearby allies grant Armor, cooldown reduction
trait.fullTooltip: When at least 1 other allied Hero is nearby, Deckard gains 10 Armor and his Basic Abilities recharge 50% faster.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Cancel Stay Awhile and Listen
heroic.fullTooltip: Stop Channeling.

trait.name: Fortitude of the Faithful
trait.fullTooltip: When at least 1 other allied Hero is nearby, Deckard gains 10 Armor and his Basic Abilities recharge 50% faster.  Activate to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 (+4% per level) damage in an area and heal for 90 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit.

level1.name: Scroll of Identify
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Scroll of Sealing reveals, reduces Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing reveals them for 8 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 16 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing also reduces Armor of Heroes hit by 15 for 4 seconds and the reveal duration is doubled.

level1.name: Field Study
level1.shortTooltip: Scroll of Sealing can grant Spell Power
level1.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 20% Spell Power for 16 seconds, up to 40%.

level1.name: Sapphire
level1.shortTooltip: Next Horadric Cube Slow increased
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to increase the Slow of the next Horadric Cube by 30%.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

level4.name: Potion of Shielding
level4.fullTooltip: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 122 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

level4.name: Rejuvenation Potion
level4.shortTooltip: Healing Potions restore Mana, heal more
level4.fullTooltip: Healing Potions restore 10 Mana and heal for an additional 108 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

level4.name: Ruby
level4.shortTooltip: Next Horadric Cube creates Lesser Healing Potions
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube spawn 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 250 (+4% per level) when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

level7.name: Cube Mastery
level7.shortTooltip: Horadric Cube reduces Scroll of Sealing cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Scroll of Sealing from 40 to 25.  Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 4 seconds.

level7.name: Kanai's Cube
level7.shortTooltip: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt
level7.fullTooltip: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Emerald
level7.shortTooltip: Next Horadric Cube reduces enemy healing received
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube reduce the healing received of enemy Heroes by 75% for 4 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

level10.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
level10.shortTooltip: Put enemies to Sleep with a fascinating story
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

level10.name: Lorenado
level10.shortTooltip: Conjure a lorenado that knocks enemies away
level10.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

level13.name: Super Healing Potion
level13.shortTooltip: Healing Potions heal more after a duration
level13.fullTooltip: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 120% more.

level13.name: Potion of Revival
level13.shortTooltip: Healing Potions heal in an area
level13.fullTooltip: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 50% of the healing amount.

level13.name: Ancient Blessings
level13.shortTooltip: Activate Fortitude to empower ally Attacks
level13.fullTooltip: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 (+4% per level) damage in an area and heal for 90 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit. This effect can only occur once per second.

level16.name: Scroll of Stone Curse
level16.shortTooltip: Scroll of Sealing can deal more damage
level16.fullTooltip: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.

level16.name: Safety in Numbers
level16.shortTooltip: Additional allies empower Fortitude of the Faithful
level16.fullTooltip: If at least 3 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 15 Armor, 50% Mana Regeneration per second, and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.

level16.name: Horadric Staff
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks periodically Stun Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

level20.name: Respect the Elderly
level20.shortTooltip: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences, Blinds
level20.fullTooltip: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 3 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.

level20.name: Morenados!
level20.fullTooltip: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.

level20.name: Bottomless Flask
level20.fullTooltip: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds.

level20.name: Perfect Gems
level20.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems by 25 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 6 seconds.

Dehaka.name: Dehaka
Dehaka.title: Primal Pack Leader
Dehaka.searchText: Dahaka Deaka Primal Zerg SC 2 SC2 Star2 Starcraft2 StarCraft II Heart of the Swarm HotS
Dehaka.description: A Bruiser with a strong, global presence that can effectively clear groups of minions.

basic.name: Drag
basic.shortTooltip: Deal light damage and drag an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Dehaka lashes out his tongue, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit, Stunning and dragging them with him for 1.75 seconds.  If Dehaka is Stunned or Silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.

basic.name: Dark Swarm
basic.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 47 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds. While active, you are able to move through units. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

basic.name: Burrow
basic.shortTooltip: Gain Stasis by burrowing into the ground
basic.fullTooltip: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.

heroic.name: Isolation
heroic.shortTooltip: Silence, Slow, and reduce vision of an enemy
heroic.fullTooltip: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, Silencing, and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

heroic.name: Adaptation
heroic.shortTooltip: Heal back damage taken
heroic.fullTooltip: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

trait.name: Essence Collection
trait.shortTooltip: Collect and consume enemy Essence to heal
trait.fullTooltip: Heal Dehaka for 29 (+4% per level) Health per stored Essence over 5 seconds. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.  Passive: Gain 10 Essence from Takedowns and 2 Essence from nearby Minions dying. Maximum of 50 Essence.

mount.name: Brushstalker
mount.shortTooltip: Burrow to a bush on the Battleground.
mount.fullTooltip: Activate to burrow to a bush on the Battleground.  Passive: Gain 20% movement speed while in a bush and for 2 seconds after leaving.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

basic.name: Cancel Burrow
basic.shortTooltip: Unburrow
basic.fullTooltip: Cancels Burrow

level1.name: Enduring Swarm
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Dark Swarm duration, grants Spell Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Dark Swarm's duration is increased by 0.5 seconds and grants 50 Spell Armor while active.

level1.name: Tissue Regeneration
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Essence increases Health Regen, max Essence
level1.fullTooltip: Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence.  Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases Health Regeneration by 4, up to 40, and maximum Essence by 1, up to 10.

level1.name: Enhanced Agility
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Essence increases Brushstalker Move Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus now lasts for 5 seconds after leaving a bush.  Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases the Movement Speed bonus of Brushstalker by 2%, up to 20%.

level4.name: Lurker Strain
level4.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Burrow by 4 seconds.  Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for 3 seconds and also knocks nearby enemies back, Slowing them by 30% for 3 seconds.

level4.name: One-Who-Collects
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.

level4.name: Hero Stalker
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 100%, and gain 1 Essence each time an enemy Hero is hit by Dark Swarm.

level7.name: Feeding Frenzy
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Constriction
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Drag duration by 0.5 seconds.

level7.name: Symbiosis
level7.shortTooltip: Reduces Dark Swarm cooldown against Heroes
level7.fullTooltip: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

level10.name: Isolation
level10.shortTooltip: Silence, Slow, and reduce vision of an enemy
level10.fullTooltip: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, Silencing, and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

level10.name: Adaptation
level10.shortTooltip: Heal back damage taken
level10.fullTooltip: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

level13.name: Primal Rage
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 1% increased Attack Damage per Essence stored.

level13.name: Ferocious Stalker
level13.shortTooltip: Brushstalker Slows, increases Dark Swarm damage
level13.fullTooltip: Dark Swarm Slows enemy Heroes by 15% for 0.75 seconds and deals 50% more damage while Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus is active.

level13.name: Primal Swarm
level13.fullTooltip: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to lose 10 Armor for 0.75 seconds, causing them to take 10% extra damage.

level16.name: Paralyzing Enzymes
level16.shortTooltip: Drag Slows
level16.fullTooltip: Drag Slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds after it ends.

level16.name: Elongated Tongue
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Drag range
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Drag range by 20%.

level16.name: Tunneling Claws
level16.shortTooltip: Dehaka can move while Burrowed
level16.fullTooltip: Dehaka can move while Burrowed.

level20.name: Contagion
level20.fullTooltip: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

level20.name: Change Is Survival
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.

level20.name: Apex Predator
level20.fullTooltip: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 35 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.

level20.name: Essence Claws
level20.fullTooltip: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains 5 Essence.

DemonHunter.name: Valla
DemonHunter.title: Demon Hunter
DemonHunter.searchText: Valla Demon Hunter demonhunter DH Nephalem Nephalem D3 Diablo 3 III  Diablo3 Reaper of Souls RoS
DemonHunter.description: A well-rounded Assassin that's mobile and can deal high sustained damage.

basic.name: Hungering Arrow
basic.shortTooltip: Fire an arrow which seeks out and strikes multiple targets
basic.fullTooltip: Fire an arrow that deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies, prioritizing Heroes, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

basic.name: Multishot
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 172 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

basic.name: Vault
basic.shortTooltip: Dash to a location
basic.fullTooltip: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 seconds deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

heroic.name: Strafe
heroic.shortTooltip: Unleashes a flurry of arrows at enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Rain of Vengeance
heroic.shortTooltip: Area attack that stuns enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

trait.name: Hatred
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks grant bonus Attack Damage and Move Speed temporarily
trait.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Lasts 6 seconds.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

level1.name: Monster Hunter

level1.fullTooltip: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

level1.name: Caltrops
level1.shortTooltip: Drop Caltrops while Vaulting  Quest: Maintain Hatred to empower Vault
level1.fullTooltip: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slow enemies by 40% for 1 second.  Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred.  Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and its Mana cost is reduced from 50 to 25.

level1.name: Hot Pursuit
level1.shortTooltip: Max Hatred increases Movement Speed and Mana Regen
level1.fullTooltip: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.

level4.name: Puncturing Arrow

level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100.  Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

level4.name: Punishment
level4.fullTooltip: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

level4.name: Creed of the Hunter
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Attack Speed Quest: Attacking Heroes empowers Hatred
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Attack Speed by 10%.  Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes.  Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

level7.name: Arsenal
level7.fullTooltip: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 120 (+4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Death Dealer
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

level7.name: Repeating Arrow
level7.fullTooltip: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

level10.name: Strafe
level10.shortTooltip: Unleashes a flurry of arrows at enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

level10.name: Rain of Vengeance
level10.shortTooltip: Area attack that stuns enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level13.shortTooltip: Hungering Arrow returns damage as Health
level13.fullTooltip: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

level13.name: Tempered by Discipline
level13.shortTooltip: Max Hatred grants healing on Basic Attacks
level13.fullTooltip: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

level13.name: Gloom
level13.shortTooltip: Consume Hatred to gain Spell Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

level16.name: Frost Shot
level16.shortTooltip: Multishot slows enemies and has increased range
level16.fullTooltip: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

level16.name: Seething Hatred
level16.shortTooltip: Max Hatred grants Spell Power, gain Hatred faster
level16.fullTooltip: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain 15% Spell Power. Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred.

level16.name: Manticore
level16.shortTooltip: Consecutive Basic Attacks against Heroes are empowered
level16.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

level20.name: Death Siphon
level20.fullTooltip: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

level20.name: Storm of Vengeance
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

level20.name: Rancor
level20.fullTooltip: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

level20.name: Farflight Quiver
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

Diablo.name: Diablo
Diablo.title: Lord of Terror
Diablo.searchText: Diablo Demon Lord Terror D1 D2 D3 Diablo 1 2 3 I II III Diablo1 Diablo2 Diablo3 red
Diablo.description: A risky Tank who can devastate an enemy team with his "all-in" combo potential.

basic.name: Shadow Charge
basic.shortTooltip: Charge to a target enemy and push them back
basic.fullTooltip: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 40 (+4% per level) damage and gaining 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. If the enemy hits terrain, they are Stunned for 1 second and take an additional 120 (+4% per level) damage.

basic.name: Fire Stomp

basic.shortTooltip: Grab an enemy and slam them behind Diablo, stunning them and dealing damage
basic.fullTooltip: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning for 0.25 seconds.

heroic.name: Apocalypse
heroic.shortTooltip: Stun all enemy Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

heroic.name: Lightning Breath
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in front of Diablo
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.   Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

hearth.name: Hearthstone

level4.fullTooltip: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.

level7.fullTooltip: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by 1.25 seconds.

level10.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in front of Diablo

Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.   Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

level13.name: Cruelty

level16.fullTooltip: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

level16.name: Debilitating Flames

level16.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 5% for 4 seconds, up to 50%. Heroes Slowed by 25% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.

level16.name: Overpowering Nightmare
level16.shortTooltip: Gain charges of Overpower
level16.fullTooltip: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.

level20.fullTooltip: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

level20.name: Hellstorm

basic.name: Noxious Blossom

basic.fullTooltip: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature's Toxin have its duration increased by 3 seconds and are Slowed by 40% decaying over 3 seconds.

basic.fullTooltip: Moves the Wisp to a new location.

mount.fullTooltip: Lunara moves 20% faster by leaping short distances.

level1.name: Natural Perspective
level1.shortTooltip: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies
level1.fullTooltip: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

level1.name: Hippity Hop

level1.fullTooltip: After not Basic Attacking or taking damage for 4 seconds, increase the Move Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness by 10%.

level4.fullTooltip: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 25% and its radius by 20%.  Hitting an enemy Hero with Noxious Blossom increases Lunara's Movement Speed by 15% for 3 seconds.  This stacks with other Movement Speed bonuses.

level4.fullTooltip: While at least one enemy is afflicted by Nature's Toxin, heal for 9 (+4% per level) per second.  When an enemy Hero has 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin, increase this healing by 19 (+4% per level) per second.

level4.name: Nature's Culling
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Nature's Toxin damage to non-Heroes
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 125% to non-Heroes.

level7.name: Splintered Spear

level7.fullTooltip: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

level20.fullTooltip: Thornwood Vine now applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin.  Increase Thornwood Vine's range by 30% and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

level20.name: Boundless Stride
level20.fullTooltip: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 15 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

level20.name: Intensifying Toxin
level20.fullTooltip: At 3 stacks, Nature's Toxin deals 40% more damage.

level20.name: Galloping Gait
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.

DVa.name: D.Va
DVa.title: MEKA Pilot
DVa.searchText: Dva Diva Hana Song Overwatch OW Human
DVa.description: A hard-to-kill Bruiser that can peel enemies away from her allies with high disruption.

basic.name: Boosters
basic.shortTooltip: Move fast and knockback enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Increase D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 (+4% per level) damage and are knocked away.   D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.

basic.name: Defense Matrix
basic.shortTooltip: Reduce damage of enemy Heroes in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing the damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn.  Damage dealt to the Mech from enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.

basic.name: Self-Destruct
basic.shortTooltip: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct for massive damage
basic.fullTooltip: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 1200 (+4% per level) to 400 (+4% per level) damage in a large area, depending on distance from center. Only deals 50% damage against Structures.  Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent Basic Attacking, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.

heroic.name: Big Shot
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line as a Pilot
heroic.fullTooltip: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

heroic.name: Bunny Hop
heroic.shortTooltip: Become Unstoppable and Slow nearby Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

trait.name: Mech Mode
trait.shortTooltip: D.Va can eject from her Mech and continue to fight
trait.fullTooltip: When D.Va's Mech dies, she is ejected out after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight. D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

mount.name: Mechanized Walker
mount.shortTooltip: While in her Mech, D.Va can shoot while moving, but her Movement Speed is reduced.
mount.fullTooltip: While in her Mech, D.Va can shoot while moving, but her base Movement Speed is reduced by 15%.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

heroic.shortTooltip: Cancel Bunny Hop
heroic.fullTooltip: Cancel Bunny Hop

basic.shortTooltip: Cancel Boosters
basic.fullTooltip: Cancel Boosters

basic.name: Cancel Defense Matrix
basic.shortTooltip: Cancel Defense Matrix
basic.fullTooltip: Cancel Defense Matrix

level1.name: Rush-down
level1.shortTooltip: Reduced Boosters cooldown if used out of combat
level1.fullTooltip: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 7 seconds.

level1.name: Hit the Nitrous
level1.shortTooltip: Boosters give extra immediate speed
level1.fullTooltip: Initial speed bonus of Boosters is increased to 325%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 50% extra damage.

level1.name: Crash Course
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Reduce Boosters cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.

level1.name: Pro Moves
level1.shortTooltip: Taking damage increases Move Speed
level1.fullTooltip: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds every time it takes damage, up to 30%.

level4.name: Diverting Power
level4.shortTooltip: Increase Defense Matrix size, Move Speed reduced
level4.fullTooltip: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by 30% for the duration.

level4.name: Get Through This!

level4.name: Fusion Generator
level4.fullTooltip: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%.  Max of 15% Charge gained per use.

level4.name: Bring It On
level4.fullTooltip: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.

level7.fullTooltip: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.

level7.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.

level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks lower Defense Matrix cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.

level7.name: Nuclear Option
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 70%.  A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.

level10.name: Bunny Hop
level10.shortTooltip: Become Unstoppable and Slow nearby Heroes
level10.fullTooltip: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

level10.name: Big Shot
level10.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line as a Pilot
level10.fullTooltip: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

level13.name: Expensive Plating
level13.shortTooltip: Increase Mech Health and Call Mech cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

level13.name: Emergency Shielding
level13.shortTooltip: Mech gains a Shield instead of dying
level13.fullTooltip: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 210 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

level13.name: Ablative Armor
level13.shortTooltip: Take less damage from weak attacks
level13.fullTooltip: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health is reduced by 50%.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

level16.name: Torpedo Dash
level16.shortTooltip: Dash as a Pilot
level16.fullTooltip: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.  Requires Pilot Mode.

level16.name: GG, WP
level16.shortTooltip: Increased Pilot damage, Takedowns refresh Mech
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

level16.name: Nanoweave Suit
level16.shortTooltip: Faster Call Mech, ejection grants Armor
level16.fullTooltip: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

level16.name: Suppressing Fire
level16.shortTooltip: Pilot Basic Attacks Slow, range increased
level16.fullTooltip: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

level20.name: Stop and Pop
level20.shortTooltip: Bunny Hop damage increased if stationary
level20.fullTooltip: Bunny Hop deals 200% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.

level20.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
level20.fullTooltip: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.

level20.name: Concussive Pulse
level20.fullTooltip: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.  Requires Pilot Mode.

level20.name: MEKAfall
level20.shortTooltip: Call Mech is instant and targetable, damages enemies
level20.fullTooltip: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the impact area.

heroic.fullTooltip: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

trait.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Call Mech by 0.5 seconds. As a Pilot, D.Va only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

basic.fullTooltip: Increase target Hero's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 25 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 25%.

heroic.shortTooltip: Teleport to allies and heal them
heroic.fullTooltip: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.

heroic.name: Emerald Wind
heroic.shortTooltip: Damages and pushes enemies in area
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

trait.fullTooltip: Activate to remove all Stun, Root, Slow, and Silence effects from nearby allied Heroes.  Passive: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) every 4 seconds

level1.fullTooltip: Activate to consume 20 stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured non-Elite Mercenary.  Passive: Gain 1 stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and 5 stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum 80 stacks.

level4.fullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 5 seconds.

level10.name: Blink Heal
level10.shortTooltip: Teleport to allies and heal them

level10.shortTooltip: Damages and pushes enemies in area
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

level13.fullTooltip: Pixie Dust gives 40% bonus Movement Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.

level13.name: Safety Dust
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Brightwing heals allies with an active Pixie Dust for 25% more.

level13.name: Pixie Power
level13.shortTooltip: Reduce Pixie Dust cooldown, increase Spell Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.

level16.shortTooltip: Polymorph lowers enemy's Armor
level16.fullTooltip: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

level16.name: Phase Out
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Stasis
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.

level20.name: Invisible Friends

While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 20 (+4% per level) Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

level20.name: Intensive Winds

Passive: Reduce Lightning Rod's cooldown by 3 seconds.

level4.fullTooltip: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.

level10.fullTooltip: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

level13.name: Dampening Field

level13.name: Rapid Recharge
level13.fullTooltip: Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.

level13.name: Auxiliary Shields
level13.fullTooltip: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 30% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 40%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

level16.name: Offensive Cadence
level16.shortTooltip: Successive Repeater Cannon attacks empowered
level16.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

level16.name: Photonic Weaponry
level16.shortTooltip: Shield Capacitor increases damage dealt
level16.fullTooltip: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

level16.name: Arsenal Overcharge
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Ability cooldowns
level16.fullTooltip: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

level20.name: Secondary Fire

level20.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

level20.name: Singularity Charge
level20.fullTooltip: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1.25 more range.

level20.name: Unconquered Spirit
level20.fullTooltip: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 (+4% per level) Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

Firebat.name: Blaze
Firebat.title: Veteran Firebat
Firebat.searchText: Firebat Terran Heroes of the Storm
Firebat.description: A ranged Tank that specializes in initiating fights and dealing area damage by spreading his flames.

basic.name: Flame Stream
basic.shortTooltip: Fire two streams of flames
basic.fullTooltip: Fire two streams that deal 83 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit. Flame Stream Ignites Oil Spills it comes in contact with.

basic.name: Oil Spill
basic.shortTooltip: Splash oil that Slows and can be Ignited to damage enemies and heal Blaze
basic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Dispense a slick of oil that lasts for 5 seconds and Slows enemies that come in contact with it by 50%.  Oil Spills are Ignited for 2.5 seconds when hit by Flame Stream. Ignited Oil Spills no longer Slow enemies, but instead deal 16 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.3 seconds. Additionally, Blaze is healed for 49 (+4% per level) Health every 0.3 seconds while standing in Ignited Oil Spills.  Stores up to 2 charges.

basic.name: Jet Propulsion
basic.shortTooltip: Charge forward, Stunning and damaging enemy Heroes

heroic.name: Bunker Drop
heroic.shortTooltip: Call down a Bunker
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 (+4% per level) Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.   Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

heroic.name: Combustion
heroic.shortTooltip: Channel to damage and Slow enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.

trait.name: Pyromania
trait.shortTooltip: Gain Armor and damage nearby enemies
trait.fullTooltip: Gain 40 Armor and deal 40 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds.  Each Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces Pyromania's cooldown by 5 seconds.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

level10.name: Dragonblade

level13.fullTooltip: Cyber Agility stores 2 charges.

level16.name: Reflect

level16.shortTooltip: Swift Strike deals extra damage after a delay

level16.name: Steady Blade

level16.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by 20%. This bonus stacks up to 3 times.

level20.name: The Dragon Becomes Me

level20.name: Living Weapon
level20.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

level20.name: Sharpened Stars

level20.name: Zanshin
level20.shortTooltip: Quest: Deflect hits all nearby Heroes

Greymane.name: Greymane
Greymane.title: Lord of the Worgen
Greymane.searchText: Greymane Genn GM Graymane Worgen Gilneas Alliance WoW World of Warcraft War2 WC2 Warcraft2 Tides of Darkness ToD II Cataclysm Legion BFA Battle for Azeroth
Greymane.description: A high damage Assassin that wears down enemies from afar and dives in for the kill.  10 Armor (in Worgen Form)

basic.name: Gilnean Cocktail
basic.shortTooltip: Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them

basic.shortTooltip: Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen

heroic.name: Go for the Throat
heroic.shortTooltip: Eviscerate a Hero, refresh cooldown if they die

basic.fullTooltip: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.  Human: Darkflight Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

level4.fullTooltip: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.

level7.name: Wizened Duelist
level7.shortTooltip: Quest: Basic Attack Heroes to gain damage
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.

level10.name: Go for the Throat
level10.shortTooltip: Eviscerate a Hero, refresh cooldown if they die

Hanzo.name: Hanzo
Hanzo.title: Master Assassin
Hanzo.description: A ranged Assassin who specializes in scouting and taking out enemies from a distance.

basic.name: Storm Bow
basic.shortTooltip: Charge up to fire a deadly arrow
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to charge an arrow that deals 291 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. Storm Bow's range increases the longer it is Channeled.

basic.name: Sonic Arrow
basic.shortTooltip: Reveal a large area
basic.fullTooltip: Fire an arrow that grants vision in a large area for 5 seconds. Enemies inside are revealed for 1 second. If Sonic Arrow lands directly on an enemy, it deals 165 (+4% per level) damage to them and follows them as they move.

heroic.shortTooltip: Fire a global arrow that Stuns, damages

After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.  After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100.

After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds. level1.shortTooltip: Sweeping Strike deals area damage
level1.fullTooltip: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

level1.name: Battered Assault
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Sweeping Strike damage bonus
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

level1.name: Unending Hatred
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Killing enemies grants Basic Attack damage
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage.  Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

level4.name: Rapid Chase
level4.fullTooltip: Dive grants 20% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

level4.name: Friend or Foe
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Dive range and can Dive to allies
level4.fullTooltip: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

level4.name: Unbound
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Sweeping Strike can go over terrain
level4.fullTooltip: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

level7.name: Reflexive Block
level7.fullTooltip: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 3 Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

level7.name: Thirsting Blade
level7.fullTooltip: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

level7.name: Hunter's Onslaught
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Abilities heal for 25% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.

level10.name: Metamorphosis
level10.shortTooltip: Damage area and increase max Health
level10.fullTooltip: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 220 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

level10.name: The Hunt
level10.shortTooltip: Charge a target from a very long range
level10.fullTooltip: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

level13.name: Nimble Defender
level13.fullTooltip: If Sweeping Strike hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

level13.name: Elusive Strike
level13.fullTooltip: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

level13.name: Sixth Sense
level13.fullTooltip: While active, Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

level16.name: Marked for Death
level16.shortTooltip: Repeated Dives deal extra damage
level16.fullTooltip: Dive deals an extra 180 (+4% per level) damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.

level16.name: Fiery Brand
level16.shortTooltip: Consecutive Basic Attacks to Heroes are empowered
level16.fullTooltip: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 8% of their maximum Health as damage.

level16.name: Blades of Azzinoth
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

level20.name: Demonic Form
level20.shortTooltip: Demon form lasts forever, grants Attack Speed
level20.fullTooltip: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

level20.name: Nowhere to Hide
level20.shortTooltip: Increases The Hunt range and reveal low Health Heroes
level20.fullTooltip: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

level20.name: Nexus Blades
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

level20.name: Bolt of the Storm
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Imperius.name: Imperius
Imperius.title: Archangel of Valor
Imperius.searchText: Imperious Impirius Angel Archangel Diablo 3 III D3 Diablo3
Imperius.description: An all-in Bruiser that leads the charge with strong initiation and single target damage.

basic.name: Celestial Charge
basic.shortTooltip: Charge forward and Stun enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Lunge towards a targeted direction and stab, dealing 35 (+4% per level) damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Channel to Stun for 1 second and deal 70 (+4% per level) additional damage when it fully finishes.

basic.name: Solarion's Fire
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in a line
basic.fullTooltip: Release a fiery wave that deals 100 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies hit by the center take 50% bonus damage and are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Molten Armor
basic.shortTooltip: Burn nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Shroud Imperius in flames for 3 seconds, striking a nearby enemy for 19 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. Imperius heals for 50% of the damage dealt, increased to 100% against Heroes.

heroic.name: Angelic Armaments
heroic.shortTooltip: Gain a large Shield, reactivate to damage
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

heroic.name: Wrath of the Angiris
heroic.shortTooltip: Ascend with an enemy into the Heavens
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1 second.

trait.name: Valorous Brand
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Abilities mark enemy Heroes, increasing Basic Attack damage and healing
trait.fullTooltip: Each Basic Ability marks enemy Heroes hit for 10 seconds. Basic Attacks consume the target's marks, dealing 20% bonus damage per mark and healing for 75 (+4% per level) per mark.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

level1.name: Impaling Light
level1.shortTooltip: Empower Celestial Charge with Valorous Brand
level1.fullTooltip: Celestial Charge's final damage is increased by 100% and cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds for each Valorous Brand on the target when the Stun completes.

level1.name: Consuming Flame
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Solarion's Fire Slow, center damage
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the center damage of Solarion's Fire by an additional 125% and its Slow amount by 15%. The first enemy Hero hit with Solarion's Fire restores 30 Mana.

level1.name: Burn the Impure
level1.shortTooltip: Valorous Brand marks deal bonus damage
level1.fullTooltip: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark deals bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

level4.name: Sovereign Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Molten Armor grants 25 Armor for 1.5 seconds. Damaging an enemy Hero with Molten Armor increases the duration of the Armor by 0.5 seconds.

level4.name: Battle Hunger
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the healing of Valorous Brand by 60%.

level4.name: Press Forward
level4.shortTooltip: Damage Heroes to refresh Regen Globes
level4.fullTooltip: Damaging an enemy Hero sets the duration of an active Regeneration Globe on Imperius to 8 seconds (unless it is already higher).

level7.name: Flash of Anger
level7.shortTooltip: Solarion's Fire can deal damage in an area
level7.fullTooltip: Consuming a mark from Celestial Charge deals 180 (+4% per level) damage around the target and grants Imperius 300 (+4% per level) point Shield for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Blaze of Glory
level7.shortTooltip: Solarion's Fire creates a delayed explosion
level7.fullTooltip: Solarion's Fire leaves a line of scorched earth along its center, exploding after 2 seconds and dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage.  This explosion benefits from and consumes Valorous Brand marks.

level7.name: Holy Fervor
level7.shortTooltip: Activate to gain cleaving Basic Attacks
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to cause the next 4 Basic Attacks within 10 seconds to cleave for 30% additional damage.

level10.name: Angelic Armaments
level10.shortTooltip: Gain a large Shield, reactivate to damage
level10.fullTooltip: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

level10.name: Wrath of the Angiris
level10.shortTooltip: Ascend with an enemy into the Heavens
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1 second.

level13.name: Pathetic Mortals
level13.fullTooltip: Stunning enemy Heroes with Celestial Charge reduces their damage by 40% for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Divine Rage
level13.shortTooltip: Valorous Brand reduces Molten Armor cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark reduces the cooldown of Molten Armor by 1 second.

level13.name: Heat of Battle
level13.shortTooltip: Molten Armor heals more against Heroes
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Molten Armor's healing against Heroes by 2% for every 1% Health Imperius is missing.

level16.name: Celestial Swiftness
level16.shortTooltip: Celestial Charge grants Attack and Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds after casting Celestial Charge. Gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds for each Hero stunned with Celestial Charge.

level16.name: Melting Touch
level16.shortTooltip: Molten Armor marks lower Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Consuming a Molten Armor mark reduces the target's Armor by 25 for 4 seconds.

level16.name: Valorous Pursuit
level16.shortTooltip: Teleport to enemies marked by Valorous Brand
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to an enemy that has been marked by Valorous Brand and gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Heavenly Host
level20.shortTooltip: Allied Heroes gain a weaponized Shield
level20.fullTooltip: Nearby allied Heroes gain 600 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, fire a sword at the nearest enemy Hero, dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage.

level20.name: Unrelenting Descent
level20.fullTooltip: Consuming a Valorous Brand reduces the cooldown of Wrath of the Angiris by 5 seconds.

level20.name: Brand of Solarion
level20.fullTooltip: Reduce the duration of Valorous Brand to 3 seconds, but it is no longer consumed when triggered.

level20.name: Impervious
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Unstoppable and Spell Armor
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Hitting Heroes with the center of Solarion's Fire reduces this cooldown by 5 seconds.

Jaina.name: Jaina
Jaina.title: Archmage
Jaina.searchText: Jaina Proudmoore Human Theramore Alliance WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III 3 Reign of Chaos RoC Frozen Throne FT Burning Crusade BC Wrath Lich King WotLK Cataclysm Mists of Pandaria MoP Warlords Draenor WoD Legion Hearthstone HS dreadlord? dread lord? BFA Battle for Azeroth
Jaina.description: A frost Mage that can slow the entire enemy team.

basic.name: Frostbolt
basic.shortTooltip: Shoot a bolt that deals damage and Chills the target
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 184 (+4% per level) damage and Chill the target.

basic.name: Blizzard
basic.shortTooltip: Creates a storm of ice at target location, damaging and slowing enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

basic.name: Cone of Cold
basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage in a cone and Chill targets
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 220 (+4% per level) damage and Chill targets.

heroic.name: Summon Water Elemental
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon a Water Elemental that Chills enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

heroic.name: Ring of Frost
heroic.shortTooltip: Create a ring that damages and Roots enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

trait.name: Frostbite
trait.shortTooltip: Jaina's Abilities Chill targets, slowing them and causing them to take more damage
