trait.fullTooltip: Jaina's Abilities Chill targets, Slowing them by 25% and amplifying damage taken from her Abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Quest: Deal 15,000 Ability damage to Chilled Heroes.  Reward: Unlock the Improved Ice Block Ability, allowing Jaina to become temporarily Invulnerable.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Command Water Elemental
heroic.fullTooltip: Wills the Water Elemental to attack an enemy or move to an area.

activable.name: Improved Ice Block
activable.fullTooltip: Activate to place Jaina in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 2.5 seconds. When this effect expires, nearby enemies are Chilled.

level1.name: Winter's Reach
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Frostbolt range
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

level1.name: Lingering Chill
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Chill duration
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

level1.name: Fingers of Frost
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes increase Mana Regeneration
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second.   Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

level4.name: Frost Shards
level4.fullTooltip: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

level4.name: Arcane Intellect
level4.shortTooltip: Damage to Chilled targets returns Mana
level4.fullTooltip: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.

level4.name: Frost Armor
level4.shortTooltip: Chill attackers and gain Physical Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

level7.name: Ice Lance
level7.shortTooltip: Reduce Frostbolt cooldown on Chilled targets
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and restores 10 Mana.

level7.name: Ice Floes
level7.shortTooltip: Increase Cone of Cold area, reduce cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 6 seconds per use.

level7.name: Icefury Wand
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 100% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 2 seconds.

level10.name: Ring of Frost
level10.shortTooltip: Create a ring that damages and Roots enemies
level10.fullTooltip: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

level10.name: Summon Water Elemental
level10.shortTooltip: Summon a Water Elemental that Chills enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

level13.name: Storm Front
level13.shortTooltip: Increase Blizzard cast range and radius
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the cast range of Blizzard by 75% and its radius by 30%.

level13.name: Ice Barrier
level13.fullTooltip: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.

level13.name: Icy Veins
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

level16.name: Snowstorm
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Blizzard damage
level16.fullTooltip: The damage of the second wave of Blizzard is increased by 20%. The damage of the third wave is increased by 60%.

level16.name: Northern Exposure
level16.shortTooltip: Cone of Cold lowers Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 20 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 20%.

level16.name: Numbing Blast
level16.shortTooltip: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets
level16.fullTooltip: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

level20.name: Cold Snap
level20.shortTooltip: Ring of Frost center deals damage, Roots
level20.fullTooltip: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

level20.name: Wintermute
level20.shortTooltip: Increase cast range and mimics Basic Abilities
level20.fullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

level20.name: Ice Blink
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport and Chill nearby enemies
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

level20.name: Deep Chill
level20.fullTooltip: Frostbite's Chill can now stack a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.

Junkrat.name: Junkrat
Junkrat.title: Junker Demolitionist
Junkrat.searchText: Junker Junkdude Grenademans Human Overwatch OW Jamison Fawkes
Junkrat.description: A mobile Assassin that bombards the enemy from afar, and sows chaos with traps and mines.

basic.name: Frag Launcher
basic.shortTooltip: Launch a bouncing grenade
basic.fullTooltip: Launch a grenade that explodes at the end of its path or upon hitting an enemy, dealing 118 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Grenades can ricochet off of terrain. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Stores up to 4 charges. Frag Launcher's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

basic.name: Concussion Mine
basic.shortTooltip: Place a mine that can be detonated
basic.fullTooltip: Place a mine on the ground. Junkrat's Trait can be activated to detonate the mine, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.  Limit 1 active mine.

basic.name: Steel Trap
basic.shortTooltip: Place a trap that Roots enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Place a trap on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. Deals 130 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy that walks over it and Roots them for 2 seconds.  Limit 1 active trap.

heroic.name: RIP-Tire
heroic.shortTooltip: Create a motorized bomb that explodes
heroic.fullTooltip: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 475 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.

heroic.name: Rocket Ride
heroic.shortTooltip: Launch into the air, damaging enemies upon landing
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 815 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

trait.name: Total Mayhem
trait.shortTooltip: Drop grenades upon death
trait.fullTooltip: Upon dying, drop 5 grenades that explode after 0.75 seconds, each dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals 75% less damage to Structures.  Detonate Mine  Detonate an active Concussion Mine.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 150% Movement Speed.

basic.name: Jump!
basic.shortTooltip: Jump!
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to make the RIP-Tire jump. Can be used to pass over terrain and Structures.

heroic.name: Detonate RIP-Tire
heroic.shortTooltip: Instantly destroy the RIP-Tire
heroic.fullTooltip: Instantly detonate the RIP-Tire, knocking nearby enemies back, and dealing 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 475 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

trait.name: Detonate Mine
trait.shortTooltip: Detonate the Concussion Mine
trait.fullTooltip: Detonate the planted Concussion Mine, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.

level1.name: Tricky Shuffles
level1.shortTooltip: Gain Move Speed while Frag Launcher replenishes
level1.fullTooltip: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, Junkrat gains 10% Movement Speed and his Basic Attacks deal 15% bonus damage.

level1.name: Extra-Wound Timers
level1.shortTooltip: Frag Launcher grenades deal bonus damage
level1.fullTooltip: The final grenade launched from Frag Launcher deals 60% bonus damage, and Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.

level1.name: Blow 'Em Up!
level1.shortTooltip: Concussion Mine and Steel Trap increase damage
level1.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine or Steel Trap causes Junkrat to deal 25% more damage with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities for 6 seconds.

level4.name: Taste For Explosions
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.2%, up to 40%.

level4.name: BOOM POW
level4.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes reduces Concussion Mine cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 8 seconds.

level4.name: Chattering Teeth
level4.fullTooltip: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

level7.name: Bogged Down
level7.fullTooltip: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 40% for 2.5 seconds upon landing.

level7.name: Big As
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50% and enemy Heroes who are hit have their Armor reduced by 10 for 3 seconds.

level7.name: Sticky Wicket
level7.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Steel Trap are Silenced for 2.5 seconds.

level7.name: Dirty Trickster
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the explosion radius of Total Mayhem by 20%.  When Junkrat is Stunned, Rooted, or damaged by an enemy Hero while below 50% Health, he uses Total Mayhem, dropping 5 grenades at his feet that explode.    This effect has a 12 second cooldown.

level10.name: RIP-Tire
level10.shortTooltip: Create a motorized bomb that explodes
level10.fullTooltip: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 475 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.

level10.name: Rocket Ride
level10.shortTooltip: Launch into the air, damaging enemies upon landing
level10.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 815 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

level13.name: Bombs Away
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Junkrat's Basic Attack range by 1.  Frag Launcher grenades fired within 0.5 seconds of using a Basic Attack deal 25% bonus damage.

level13.name: Ripper Air
level13.fullTooltip: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.

level13.name: Gotta Trap 'Em All!
level13.fullTooltip: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 5 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 2.

level16.name: Burst Fire
level16.shortTooltip: Frag Launcher burst fires
level16.fullTooltip: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

level16.name: Endless Nades
level16.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes reduces Frag Launcher cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

level16.name: Spread Volley
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to make Frag Launcher spread
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

level20.name: Extra Oomph
level20.fullTooltip: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

level20.name: Puckish Scamp
level20.fullTooltip: Junkrat also gains the Ability RIP-Tire. Each time he uses his Heroic, it swaps to the alternate ability. Each Heroic has its own separate cooldown.

level20.name: Cannonball!
level20.shortTooltip: Bigger Basic Attack, Frag Launcher explosions
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.

level20.name: I Hate Waiting!
level20.fullTooltip: Junkrat always rides his Rocket Ride Mount, which grants 150% increased Movement Speed, but his Mount cooldown is increased to 12 seconds.

Kaelthas.name: Kael'thas
Kaelthas.title: The Sun King
Kaelthas.searchText: Kael'thas Kaelthas KT Prince Sunstrider Mage Blood Elf WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III 3 Frozen Throne FT Burning Crusade BC
Kaelthas.description: A fire Mage that punishes enemies that stay close together.

basic.name: Flamestrike
basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage in an area
basic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, deal 345 (+4% per level) damage in an area.   Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

basic.name: Living Bomb
basic.shortTooltip: Damage an enemy over time, eventually exploding in an area around them
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 126 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 215 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.  Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread.  Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

basic.name: Gravity Lapse
basic.shortTooltip: Stun an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 second.   Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

heroic.name: Pyroblast
heroic.shortTooltip: Blast an enemy with a big fireball
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

heroic.name: Phoenix
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon a Phoenix to burn enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 39 (+4% per level) damage.

trait.name: Verdant Spheres
trait.shortTooltip: Make Kael'thas's next Basic Ability more powerful
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to make Kael'thas's next Basic Ability more powerful.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Phoenix Retarget
heroic.fullTooltip: Send the Phoenix to a different area.

trait.name: Verdant Spheres Active
trait.fullTooltip: Kael'thas's next Basic Ability is more powerful

level1.name: Convection
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Flamestrike hits increase damage
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death.  Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

level1.name: Fel Infusion
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Spell Power, Verdant Spheres heals
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

level1.name: Mana Addict
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes grant Arcane Barrier
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

level4.name: Nether Wind
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Gravity Lapse range and restores Mana
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

level4.name: Energy Roil
level4.shortTooltip: Reduce Gravity Lapse cooldown on Heroes
level4.fullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by 70.  If Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

level4.name: Mana Tap
level4.fullTooltip: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

level7.name: Burned Flesh
level7.fullTooltip: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.

level7.name: Sun King's Fury
level7.shortTooltip: Living Bomb deals more damage after spreading
level7.fullTooltip: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

level7.name: Sunfire Enchantment
level7.fullTooltip: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage.  If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

level10.name: Phoenix
level10.shortTooltip: Summon a Phoenix to burn enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 39 (+4% per level) damage.

level10.name: Pyroblast
level10.shortTooltip: Blast an enemy with a big fireball
level10.fullTooltip: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

level13.name: Pyromaniac
level13.shortTooltip: Living Bomb reduces Basic Ability cooldowns
level13.fullTooltip: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 seconds.

level13.name: Backdraft
level13.fullTooltip: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

level13.name: Fission Bomb
level13.fullTooltip: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

level16.name: Fury of the Sunwell
level16.shortTooltip: Flamestrike explodes twice
level16.fullTooltip: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

level16.name: Ignite
level16.shortTooltip: Flamestrike applies Living Bomb
level16.fullTooltip: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.

level16.name: Twin Spheres
level16.shortTooltip: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge
level16.fullTooltip: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

level20.name: Rebirth
level20.shortTooltip: Increases Phoenix duration and may retarget
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.

level20.name: Presence Of Mind
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50%. Heroes that are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by 10 seconds.

level20.name: Master of Flames
level20.fullTooltip: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

level20.name: Flamethrower
level20.fullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

KelThuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad
KelThuzad.title: Archlich of Naxxramas
KelThuzad.searchText: KT Kelthuzad Archlich of Naxxramas esteemed Lich Lord of the Plaguelands Commander of the Dread Necropolis Master and Founder of the The Damned Return formerly of the Council of Six Creator of the Abomination Summoner of Archimonde the Defiler Betrayer of Humanity Hearthstone Enthusiast and Majordomo to the Lich King undead WC3 Reign of Chaos Frozen Throne FT WoW Wrath WotLK Wrath of the Lich King Warcraft3 Warcraft III 3 War3
KelThuzad.description: A burst damage Mage that locks down enemies and devastates them with powerful combos.

basic.name: Death and Decay
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies and create a damaging pool
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, launch an orb that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. The explosion leaves behind a pool of decay that lasts 2 seconds, dealing 82 (+2.5% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies.

basic.name: Frost Nova
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and disable enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Create a nova that explodes after 1 second, dealing 180 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies inside and Slowing them by 35% for 2.5 seconds. Enemies in the center are Rooted for 1 second.

basic.name: Chains of Kel'Thuzad
basic.shortTooltip: Pull enemy Heroes together
basic.fullTooltip: Launch a chain, dealing 97 (+2.5% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit. For 3 seconds after hitting an enemy, Chains can be reactivated to launch to an additional enemy, pulling both enemies together and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Frost Blast
heroic.shortTooltip: Root and damage enemies around a target
heroic.fullTooltip: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 2 seconds.

heroic.name: Shadow Fissure
heroic.shortTooltip: Deal high damage in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.

trait.name: Master of the Cold Dark
trait.shortTooltip: Kel'Thuzad becomes increasingly stronger as he disrupts enemies
trait.fullTooltip: Quest: Gain 1 Blight every time a Hero is Rooted by Frost Nova or hit by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.  Reward: After gaining 15 Blight, gain the Glacial Spike Ability.  Reward: After gaining 30 Blight, gain 75% Spell Power.  Blight: 0/30

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

basic.name: Chains of Kel'Thuzad
basic.fullTooltip: Launch a new chain from the currently chained enemy. Deals 97 (+2.5% per level) damage upon impacting a Hero and pulls both enemies together.

activable.name: Glacial Spike
activable.shortTooltip: Create a spike that explodes, deals damage
activable.fullTooltip: Activate to create a spike that detonates after 4 seconds, dealing 60 (+2.5% per level) damage to nearby enemies. The spike can be affected by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.

level1.name: The Plaguelands
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Death and Decay duration, radius
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

level1.name: Blighted Frost
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Frost Nova center damage, duration
level1.fullTooltip: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.

level1.name: Barbed Chains
level1.shortTooltip: Chains deals more damage, reduces Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 10 for 4 seconds.

level4.name: Strip Shields
level4.fullTooltip: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 128 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.

level4.name: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Collect Regen Globes for instant respawn
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery.  Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

level4.name: Armor of the Archlich
level4.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Physical Armor, Slow enemies
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Accelerated Decay
level7.fullTooltip: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 25% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

level7.name: Chilling Touch
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks periodically deal area Spell damage
level7.fullTooltip: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area for 100%  additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

level7.name: Ice Cold
level7.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 8 seconds and increase its damage by 400%.

level10.name: Frost Blast
level10.shortTooltip: Root and damage enemies around a target
level10.fullTooltip: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 2 seconds.

level10.name: Shadow Fissure
level10.shortTooltip: Deal high damage in an area
level10.fullTooltip: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.

level13.name: Icy Grasp
level13.shortTooltip: Increase Frost Nova Slow, reduce cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 15%. Each time Kel'Thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, reduce the cooldown of Frost Nova by 0.4 seconds.

level13.name: Chains of Ice
level13.fullTooltip: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.

level13.name: Chain-Link
level13.fullTooltip: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

level16.name: Arcane Echoes
level16.shortTooltip: Reduce Death and Decay cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds.

level16.name: Hungering Cold
level16.shortTooltip: Deal bonus damage to Rooted enemies
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.

level16.name: Power of Icecrown
level16.shortTooltip: Disabling enemies grants Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

level20.name: Deathchill
level20.shortTooltip: Frost Blast Slows, Takedowns release blasts
level20.fullTooltip: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

level20.name: Might of the Scourge
level20.fullTooltip: If a Hero is hit with Shadow Fissure, a second one is cast below them 1 second later.  This second cast will not duplicate itself.

level20.name: Shifting Malice
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to dash and deal damage
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

level20.name: The Damned Return
level20.shortTooltip: Create Shades that mimic Death and Decay
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

Kerrigan.name: Kerrigan
Kerrigan.title: Queen of Blades
Kerrigan.searchText: Kerrigan Karrigan Kerigan Sarah Swarm Queen Blades Zerg HotS Heart of the Swarm StarCraft II 2 SC2 Brood War BW LotV Legacy Void Wings Liberty WoL SC 1 SC1 Star2 Starcraft2
Kerrigan.description: A combo Assassin who goes all in, diving into the enemy team.

basic.name: Ravage
basic.shortTooltip: Leap to an enemy and deal damage
basic.fullTooltip: Leap to a target, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage. If the enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, restore 1 charge and refund 20 Mana.

basic.name: Impaling Blades
basic.shortTooltip: Stun and damage enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, deal 165 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area, Stunning them for 1 second.

basic.name: Primal Grasp
basic.shortTooltip: Pull and damage enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Pulls enemies within the target area towards Kerrigan, dealing 25 (+4% per level) damage. After 2.5 seconds, an explosion occurs around Kerrigan, dealing 195 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

heroic.name: Summon Ultralisk
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon a commandable Ultralisk
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

heroic.name: Maelstrom
heroic.shortTooltip: Persistently damage nearby enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

trait.name: Assimilation
trait.shortTooltip: Gain a temporary Shield by attacking enemies
trait.fullTooltip: Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.  Current maximum: 1004 (+4% per level)

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Command Ultralisk
heroic.fullTooltip: Order the Ultralisk to attack an enemy or move to an area.

level1.name: Siphoning Impact
level1.shortTooltip: Ravage grants Assimilation Shields
level1.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants 90 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields.

level1.name: Assimilation Mastery
level1.shortTooltip: Globes grant Shields, Assimilation increases regen
level1.fullTooltip: Regeneration Globe healing grants 45 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 150%.

level1.name: Fury of the Swarm
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks grant more Shields, can splash
level1.fullTooltip: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds splashes for 100% damage around the target.

level4.name: Sharpened Blades
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 75.  Minions grant 1 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage.  Reward: After reaching a 75 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.

level4.name: Kinetic Fulmination
level4.shortTooltip: Damage dealt increases Impaling Blades damage
level4.fullTooltip: Damaging an enemy increases the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 10%, up to 100%.

level4.name: Psionic Pulse
level4.fullTooltip: Primal Grasp explodes a second time 2.5 seconds after its first explosion.

level7.name: Queen of Blades
level7.fullTooltip: Damaging a Hero with Primal Grasp reduces Ravage's cooldown by 6 seconds.

level7.name: Boundless Fury
level7.shortTooltip: Ravage can grant a charge of Ravage
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.

level7.name: Bladed Momentum
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by 0.6 seconds.

level10.name: Maelstrom
level10.shortTooltip: Persistently damage nearby enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

level10.name: Summon Ultralisk
level10.shortTooltip: Summon a commandable Ultralisk
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

level13.name: Psionic Barrier
level13.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants 20 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Volatile Power
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by 10%, but reduce duration of Assimilation by 3 seconds.

level13.name: Chrysalis
level13.shortTooltip: Activate to enter Stasis and heal
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 750 (+4% per level) Health for 5 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates 5% of her maximum Health per second.  Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.

level16.name: Mounting Potency
level16.shortTooltip: Ravage grants Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Ravage grants 5% Spell Power for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

level16.name: Painful Spikes
level16.shortTooltip: Impaling Blades grants bonus damage
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies hit by Impaling Blades take an additional 70 (+4% per level) damage the next 6 times Kerrigan damages them within 5 seconds.

level16.name: Unbridled Energy
level16.shortTooltip: Heroic Ability damage grants Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants 35% Spell Power for 4 seconds.

level20.name: Omegastorm
level20.fullTooltip: Maelstrom's duration is increased by 0.25 seconds every time it damages a Hero.

level20.name: Torrasque
level20.shortTooltip: Ultralisk spawns a new Ultralisk on death
level20.fullTooltip: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

level20.name: Assimilation Blades
level20.fullTooltip: Damaging an enemy increases Basic Attack damage by 2% for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

level20.name: Psionic Shift
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance, deal damage
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.

L90ETC.name: E.T.C.
L90ETC.title: Rock God
L90ETC.searchText: E.T.C. Elite Tauren Chieftain ETC etc Level 90 Horde Heroes of the Storm WoW
L90ETC.description: A Tank who supplies his team with a good bit of utility.

basic.name: Powerslide
basic.shortTooltip: Dash to an area, stunning and damaging enemies hit
basic.fullTooltip: Slide to a location dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

basic.name: Face Melt
basic.shortTooltip: Knock back and damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deals 68 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

basic.name: Guitar Solo
basic.shortTooltip: Regenerate Health
basic.fullTooltip: Regenerate 66 (+4% per level) Health per second for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Mosh Pit
heroic.shortTooltip: Nearby enemies must dance
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Stage Dive
heroic.shortTooltip: Dive to a location and deal damage
heroic.fullTooltip: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

trait.name: Rockstar
trait.shortTooltip: After using an ability, E.T.C. gains Armor
trait.fullTooltip: After E.T.C. uses a Basic or Heroic ability, he gains 25 Armor for 2 seconds.  This effect does not stack with itself.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Mosh Pit Cancel
heroic.fullTooltip: Cancels the Mosh Pit ability.

level1.name: Guitar Hero
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks add duration, heal during Guitar Solo
level1.fullTooltip: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 60% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.  Basic Attacks increase the duration of Guitar Solo by 0.25 seconds.

level1.name: Prog Rock
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes empower Guitar Solo
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100  Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

level1.name: Block Party
level1.shortTooltip: Rockstar grants allies Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting 75 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.

level4.name: Crowd Surfer
level4.fullTooltip: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain.

level4.name: Loud Speakers
level4.shortTooltip: Increases range and knockback of Face Melt
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

level4.name: Speed Metal
level4.shortTooltip: Move Speed is added to Rockstar
level4.fullTooltip: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

level7.name: Pinball Wizard
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Face Melt damage after Powerslide
level7.fullTooltip: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

level7.name: Echo Pedal
level7.fullTooltip: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 15 (+4% per level) damage.  This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

level7.name: Hammer-on
level7.fullTooltip: After using an Ability, E.T.C.'s next 2 Basic Attacks deal 40% more damage.

level10.name: Mosh Pit
level10.shortTooltip: Nearby enemies must dance
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

level10.name: Stage Dive
level10.shortTooltip: Dive to a location and deal damage
level10.fullTooltip: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Mic Check
level13.shortTooltip: Reduces Face Melt cooldown when hitting multiple enemies
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

level13.name: Encore
level13.shortTooltip: Face Melt will knock enemies away a second time
level13.fullTooltip: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.

level13.name: Face Smelt
level13.fullTooltip: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.

level16.name: Show Stopper
level16.shortTooltip: Powerslide gives Armor
level16.fullTooltip: After using Powerslide, gain 35 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 35%.

level16.name: Aggressive Shredding
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Guitar Solo cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 seconds.

level16.name: Imposing Presence
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to Slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

level20.name: Tour Bus
level20.shortTooltip: Makes Powerslide usable during Mosh Pit
level20.fullTooltip: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

level20.name: Crowd Pleaser
level20.shortTooltip: Stage Dive impact area bigger, cooldown reduced
level20.fullTooltip: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

level20.name: Death Metal
level20.fullTooltip: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.

level20.name: Storm Shield
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Bolt of the Storm
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Leoric.name: Leoric
Leoric.title: The Skeleton King
Leoric.searchText: Leoric Skeleton King Tristram Undead Diablo Diablo1 Diablo3 D1 I 1 D3 III 3
Leoric.description: A Bruiser that deals high damage against teams with many high Health Heroes.

basic.name: Skeletal Swing
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and slow enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Leoric swings his mace, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, refund 50% of the cooldown and Mana cost. Peasants!

basic.name: Drain Hope
basic.shortTooltip: Drain Health from an enemy Hero while close to them
basic.fullTooltip: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 20% of their maximum Health as damage and healing Leoric for up to 20% of his maximum Health while he is nearby, over 4 seconds. Leoric's Movement Speed is reduced by 20% while this is active.

basic.name: Wraith Walk
basic.shortTooltip: Leoric's ghost separates from his body to move unhindered
basic.fullTooltip: Leoric separates from his body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, his body jumps to his wraith.

heroic.name: Entomb
heroic.shortTooltip: Wall in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: March of the Black King
heroic.shortTooltip: March forward, healing Leoric, damaging enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 (+4% per level) damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

trait.name: Undying
trait.shortTooltip: Leoric haunts his enemies as a ghost while dead
trait.fullTooltip: Leoric becomes a ghost when he dies, and resurrects upon reaching full Health. Leoric deals no damage while dead.  Wrath Of The Bone King  Leoric's first two Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage, and his third Basic Attack deals 200% damage to a single target.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

heroic.name: Entomb (Cancel)
heroic.fullTooltip: Press to destroy Entomb early.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

basic.name: Ghastly Swing
basic.fullTooltip: Slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

basic.name: Drain Essence
basic.fullTooltip: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit, healing Leoric for up to 10% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds as long as the enemy remains close.

basic.name: Cancel Wraith Walk
basic.fullTooltip: End Wraith Walk early.

level1.name: Consume Vitality
level1.shortTooltip: Skeletal Swing heals
level1.fullTooltip: Skeletal Swing's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit heal Leoric for 4% of his maximum Health.

level1.name: Fealty Unto Death
level1.shortTooltip: Gain Health and Mana when Minions die
level1.fullTooltip: When a nearby friendly or enemy Minion dies, Leoric restores 1.25% of his maximum Health and 6 Mana.

level1.name: Ossein Renewal
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to heal
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to heal Leoric for 30% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. Regeneration Globes lower the cooldown of this Ability by 20 seconds.

level4.name: Ghastly Reach
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

level4.name: Paralyzing Rage
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the Slow of Skeletal Swing by 20%.

level4.name: Kneel, Peasants!
level4.shortTooltip: Increase Skeletal Swing damage to non-Heroes
level4.fullTooltip: Skeletal Swing deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

level7.name: Willing Vessel
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the healing from Drain Hope to 25% of Leoric's maximum Health. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, Leoric instantly heals for an additional 5% of his maximum Health.

level7.name: Drain Momentum
level7.fullTooltip: Drain Hope no longer reduces Leoric's Movement Speed. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, gain 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Hopelessness
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Drain Hope by 25%.

level10.name: Entomb
level10.shortTooltip: Wall in an area
level10.fullTooltip: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

level10.name: March of the Black King
level10.shortTooltip: March forward, healing Leoric, damaging enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 (+4% per level) damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

level13.name: Unyielding Despair
level13.fullTooltip: Drain Hope's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds for every 1 second it is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.

level13.name: Ominous Wraith
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Spectral Leech
level13.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal extra damage and heal
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.

level16.name: Crushing Hope
level16.shortTooltip: Full duration Drain Hope deals bonus damage
level16.fullTooltip: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.

level16.name: Royal Focus
level16.shortTooltip: Empower Skeletal Swing and Wraith Walk
level16.fullTooltip: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.

level16.name: Mithril Mace
level16.shortTooltip: Quest: Empower Wrath Of The Bone King
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%.  Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

level20.name: Buried Alive
level20.fullTooltip: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 50 (+4% per level) damage every 1 second.

level20.name: Death March
level20.shortTooltip: March of the Black King applies Drain Hope
level20.fullTooltip: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

level20.name: Hardened Bones
level20.fullTooltip: Gain 50 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 2 seconds.

level20.name: Burning Despair
level20.fullTooltip: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.

level20.name: Shroud of the Dead King
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

LiLi.name: Li Li
LiLi.title: World Wanderer
LiLi.searchText: Li Li LiLi Pandaren WoW World of Warcraft Mists of Pandaria MoP
LiLi.description: A sustained Healer who works well against Physical attackers by Blinding them.

basic.name: Healing Brew
basic.shortTooltip: Heal a nearby ally
basic.fullTooltip: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) within 6 range for 175 (+4% per level) Health.

basic.name: Cloud Serpent
basic.shortTooltip: Summon a serpent to assist an ally
basic.fullTooltip: Summon a Cloud Serpent on an allied Hero that attacks nearby enemies every second. Each attack deals 26 (+4% per level) damage and heals the ally for 20 (+4% per level). Lasts for 8 seconds.

basic.name: Blinding Wind
basic.shortTooltip: Blind and damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Throw a cloud of wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing 133 (+4% per level) damage. Affected targets are Blinded for 1.5 seconds, causing their Basic Attacks to miss and deal no damage.

heroic.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
heroic.shortTooltip: Rapidly heal nearby allies
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 (+4% per level) Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

heroic.name: Water Dragon
heroic.shortTooltip: Damages and heavily slows nearest enemy Hero
heroic.fullTooltip: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

trait.name: Fast Feet
trait.shortTooltip: When struck by enemies, gain Movement Speed
trait.fullTooltip: Upon taking damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns refresh 50% faster and you gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Cancel Jug of 1,000 Cups
heroic.fullTooltip: Stop Channeling Jug of 1,000 Cups.

trait.name: Fast Feet
trait.shortTooltip: When struck by enemies, gain Movement Speed
trait.fullTooltip: Upon taking damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns refresh 50% faster and you gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

level1.name: Free Drinks
level1.shortTooltip: Healing Brew cost reduced on low Health targets
level1.fullTooltip: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health.

level1.name: Wind Serpent
level1.shortTooltip: Cloud Serpent launches Blinding Wind on cast
level1.fullTooltip: Casting Cloud Serpent also launches a Blinding Wind at the nearest enemy to the target (prioritizing Heroes).

level1.name: Eager Adventurer
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Fast Feet duration
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 125% and increase Mana regeneration by 125% while Fast Feet is active.

level4.name: Serpent Sidekick
level4.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes increases Cloud Serpent duration
level4.fullTooltip: Cloud Serpent's duration is increased by 0.6 seconds every time it attacks a Hero.

level4.name: Hindering Winds
level4.fullTooltip: Blinding Wind Slows enemy Hero Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

level4.name: Safety Sprint
level4.shortTooltip: Activate Fast Feet for a burst of speed
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to gain Fast Feet for 3 seconds and increase its Movement Speed bonus to 30% while active.  Passive: Increase the movement speed bonus of Fast Feet to 15%.

level7.name: The Good Stuff
level7.shortTooltip: Healing Brew also heals over time
level7.fullTooltip: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.

level7.name: Lightning Serpent
level7.shortTooltip: Cloud Serpent's attacks bounce to Heroes
level7.fullTooltip: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional Heroes for 13 (+4% per level) damage and 10 (+4% per level) healing.

level7.name: Let's Go!
level7.shortTooltip: Activate to heal ally, make them Unstoppable
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.  Cannot be used on Li Li.

level10.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
level10.shortTooltip: Rapidly heal nearby allies
level10.fullTooltip: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 (+4% per level) Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

level10.name: Water Dragon
level10.shortTooltip: Damages and heavily slows nearest enemy Hero
level10.fullTooltip: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Gale Force
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Blinding Wind's duration by 0.75 seconds. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal 75% increased damage.

level13.name: Surging Winds
level13.shortTooltip: Gain Spell Power from Blinding Wind
level13.fullTooltip: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

level13.name: Mass Vortex
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes.

level16.name: Two For One
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Brew heals twice but longer cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 second.

level16.name: Pick Me Up
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Brew heals more on low Health targets
level16.fullTooltip: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% if they are under 50% Health.

level16.name: Blessings Of Yulon
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Cloud Serpent healing
level16.fullTooltip: Cloud Serpent heals its bearer for an additional 1% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.

level20.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
level20.shortTooltip: Jug of 1,000 cups heals two allies at once
level20.fullTooltip: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.

level20.name: Double Dragon
level20.fullTooltip: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

level20.name: Mistweaver
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149 (+4% per level). Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.

level20.name: Shake It Off
level20.fullTooltip: Gain 8 Armor per second while Fast Feet is active, up to 30 Armor.

LostVikings.name: The Lost Vikings
LostVikings.title: Triple Trouble
LostVikings.searchText: The Lost Vikings TLV LV TheLostVikings Olaf Eric Baleog 2 LV2 Classic
LostVikings.description: Three Heroes in one! Can gather experience from multiple locations.

basic.name: Spin To Win!
basic.shortTooltip: Deals damage around each Viking
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

basic.name: Norse Force!
basic.shortTooltip: All Vikings gain a Shield
basic.fullTooltip: All Vikings gain a 130 (+4% per level) to 260 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

basic.name: Jump!
basic.shortTooltip: Grants temporary Invulnerability
basic.fullTooltip: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

basic.name: Nordic Attack Squad
basic.shortTooltip: Increases Viking Basic Attacks to Heroes
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1.25% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

basic.name: Viking Bribery
basic.shortTooltip: Kill Minions to bribe a Mercenary
basic.fullTooltip: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

heroic.name: Longboat Raid!
heroic.shortTooltip: Load into a Longboat to attack enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

heroic.name: Play Again!
heroic.shortTooltip: Revive and summon Vikings
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.   Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

trait.name: Viking Hoard
trait.shortTooltip: Gather Regen Globes to increase Health Regen
trait.fullTooltip: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.  Current Bonus: 0 Regen per second

mount.name: Go Go Go!
mount.fullTooltip: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

activable.name: Select Olaf
activable.shortTooltip: Olaf has lots of health, regenerates health quickly, and charges to slow enemies
activable.fullTooltip: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown.   Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.

activable.name: Select Baleog
activable.shortTooltip: Baleog deals splash damage to enemies behind his attack target
activable.fullTooltip: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal 50% splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.

activable.name: Select Erik
activable.shortTooltip: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has a longer attack range
activable.fullTooltip: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has increased Basic Attack range.

activable.name: Select All Vikings
activable.fullTooltip: The Lost Vikings can be controlled individually or as a group. Each Viking has particular strengths.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

level1.name: Olaf the Stout
level1.shortTooltip: Olaf gains Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level1.name: Spy Games
level1.shortTooltip: Erik gains Stealth and increases vision if stationary
level1.fullTooltip: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving.

level1.name: Explosive Attacks
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Baleog splash to non-Heroic enemies
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

level1.name: Viking Bribery
level1.shortTooltip: Kill Minions to bribe a Mercenary
level1.fullTooltip: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

level4.name: Pain Don't Hurt
level4.fullTooltip: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

level4.name: Erik the Swift
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Erik's Move Speed and heal while running
level4.fullTooltip: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+4% per level) Health per second.

level4.name: It's a Sabotage!
level4.fullTooltip: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 5 seconds, causing 250 (+4% per level) damage.

level4.name: Mercenary Lord
level4.fullTooltip: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

level7.name: Baleog the Fierce
level7.shortTooltip: Baleog's attacks increase his Attack Speed
level7.fullTooltip: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

level7.name: Spin To Win!
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

level7.name: Norse Force!
level7.fullTooltip: All Vikings gain a 130 (+4% per level) to 260 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

level10.name: Longboat Raid!
level10.shortTooltip: Load into a Longboat to attack enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

level10.name: Play Again!
level10.shortTooltip: Revive and summon Vikings
level10.fullTooltip: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.   Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

level13.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
level13.shortTooltip: Olaf deals damage to nearby enemies
level13.fullTooltip: Olaf deals 34 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.

level13.name: Jump!
level13.fullTooltip: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

level13.name: Nordic Attack Squad
level13.shortTooltip: Increases Viking Basic Attacks to Heroes
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1.25% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

level16.name: Large and In Charge
level16.shortTooltip: Charge stuns enemies
level16.fullTooltip: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

level16.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
level16.shortTooltip: Vikings' attacks reduce cooldowns of all Vikings
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

level16.name: 64 KB Marathon
level16.shortTooltip: Run faster and break slows and roots
level16.fullTooltip: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

level16.name: Executioner
level16.shortTooltip: Attacking disabled Heroes increases damage
level16.fullTooltip: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
level20.fullTooltip: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

level20.name: Checkpoint Reached
level20.fullTooltip: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

level20.name: The Sequel!
level20.shortTooltip: Reduces death timer for all Vikings
level20.fullTooltip: Reduces the Lost Vikings's death timer by 50%.

level20.name: Fury of the Storm
level20.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

basic.fullTooltip: All Vikings gain a 130 (+4% per level) to 260 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

basic.name: Jump!
basic.shortTooltip: Grants temporary Invulnerability
basic.fullTooltip: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

basic.name: Nordic Attack Squad
basic.shortTooltip: Increases Viking Basic Attacks to Heroes
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1.25% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

basic.name: Viking Bribery
basic.shortTooltip: Kill Minions to bribe a Mercenary
basic.fullTooltip: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

heroic.name: Play Again!
heroic.shortTooltip: Revive and summon Vikings
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.   Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

heroic.name: Longboat Raid!
heroic.shortTooltip: Load into a Longboat to attack enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

trait.name: Viking Hoard
trait.shortTooltip: Gather Regen Globes to increase Health Regen
trait.fullTooltip: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.  Current Bonus: 0 Regen per second

mount.name: Go Go Go!
mount.fullTooltip: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

activable.name: Select Erik
activable.shortTooltip: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has a longer attack range
activable.fullTooltip: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has increased Basic Attack range.

activable.name: Select All Vikings
activable.fullTooltip: The Lost Vikings can be controlled individually or as a group. Each Viking has particular strengths.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

basic.name: Mortar
basic.fullTooltip: Fires a mortar at the targeted location, dealing 205 (+4% per level) damage in a large area.

basic.name: Spin To Win!
basic.shortTooltip: Deals damage around each Viking
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

basic.fullTooltip: All Vikings gain a 130 (+4% per level) to 260 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

basic.fullTooltip: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

heroic.fullTooltip: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.   Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

trait.fullTooltip: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.  Current Bonus: 0 Regen per second

mount.name: Go Go Go!
mount.fullTooltip: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

activable.name: Select Olaf
activable.shortTooltip: Olaf has lots of health, regenerates health quickly, and charges to slow enemies
activable.fullTooltip: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown.   Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.

activable.name: Select All Vikings
activable.fullTooltip: The Lost Vikings can be controlled individually or as a group. Each Viking has particular strengths.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
