basic.name: Mortar
basic.fullTooltip: Fires a mortar at the targeted location, dealing 205 (+4% per level) damage in a large area.

Lucio.name: Lcio
Lucio.title: Freedom Fighting DJ
Lucio.description: A sustained Healer who gives his team mobility and peels enemies off allies.

basic.name: Soundwave
basic.shortTooltip: Knockback nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.

basic.name: Crossfade
basic.shortTooltip: Play a Healing Boost or Speed Boost track
basic.fullTooltip: Currently playing Speed Boost, increasing the Movement Speed of Lcio and nearby allied Heroes by 10%.  Toggle to play Healing Boost instead.

basic.name: Amp It Up
basic.shortTooltip: Boost the effect of Lcio's Crossfade track
basic.fullTooltip: Raise Lcio's Crossfade track volume for 3 seconds, amping Healing Boost to 112 (+4% per level) Health per second and Speed Boost to 30% increased Movement Speed.

heroic.name: Sound Barrier
heroic.shortTooltip: Shield nearby allies
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Lcio and nearby allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point Shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

heroic.name: High Five
heroic.shortTooltip: Skate to allies, healing and granting Unstoppable
heroic.fullTooltip: Quickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is granted Unstoppable for 1 second and is healed for 250 (+4% per level).

trait.name: Push Off
trait.shortTooltip: Push off a wall to Slow enemies
trait.fullTooltip: While moving alongside terrain, activate to slide towards a targeted location. Enemies hit take 100 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 75% for 1 second.

mount.name: Wall Ride
mount.shortTooltip: Lcio gains Move Speed near terrain and can move through units
mount.fullTooltip: When moving alongside terrain, Lcio begins to Wall Ride for 2 seconds. While Wall Ride is active, Lcio can walk through units and gains 20% Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

basic.name: Crossfade
basic.shortTooltip: Play a Healing Boost or Speed Boost track
basic.fullTooltip: Currently playing Healing Boost, passively healing Lcio and nearby allied Heroes for 15 (+4% per level) Health per second.  Toggle to play Speed Boost instead.

level1.name: Party Mix
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Playing Crossfade for allies increases range
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Play Lcio's Crossfade tracks to nearby allies for a total of 8 minutes. Multiple allies provide additional time.  Reward: Permanently increase Crossfade's range by 20%.

level1.name: Accelerando
level1.shortTooltip: Wall Ride gradually increases Move Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus gradually increases to 40% over 4 seconds while Lcio maintains its effect.

level1.name: Smooth Moves
level1.shortTooltip: Wall Ride Basic Attacks heal
level1.fullTooltip: While Wall Ride is active, Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt and restore 0.5 Mana.  Passive: Increase Wall Ride duration by 1 second.

level4.name: Subwoofer
level4.fullTooltip: Enemies within the first half of Soundwave's range are knocked back 75% further.  Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Soundwave.  Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50% and its range by 20%.

level4.name: Off the Wall
level4.shortTooltip: Wall Ride Soundwave hits reduce cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave while Wall Ride is active reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

level4.name: Supersonic
level4.shortTooltip: Wall Ride recharges Push Off cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: While Wall Ride is active, Push Off's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

level7.name: Good Vibrations
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave grants Lcio a 35 (+4% per level) Shield for 7 seconds. Hitting enemy Heroes grants 3 times this amount.

level7.name: Reverse Amp
level7.shortTooltip: Amp It Up blasts Crossfade at enemy Heroes
level7.fullTooltip: Blast Lcio's active Crossfade track at enemy Heroes. While Amp It Up is active, Healing Boost deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost Slows by 20%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents.

level7.name: Boombox
level7.shortTooltip: Drop a boombox that plays Crossfade
level7.fullTooltip: Place a boombox that plays Lcio's active Crossfade track for 30 seconds. Its volume adjusts with Amp It Up.  Crossfade tracks do not stack.

level10.name: Sound Barrier
level10.shortTooltip: Shield nearby allies
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Lcio and nearby allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point Shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

level10.name: High Five
level10.shortTooltip: Skate to allies, healing and granting Unstoppable
level10.fullTooltip: Quickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is granted Unstoppable for 1 second and is healed for 250 (+4% per level).

level13.name: All Together
level13.shortTooltip: Gain Move Speed from nearby allies
level13.fullTooltip: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lcio gains 5% Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses.

level13.name: Heavy Casters
level13.shortTooltip: Push Off Stuns, no longer Slows
level13.fullTooltip: Push Off no longer Slows enemies, and instead Stuns them for 0.5 seconds.

level13.name: Slip
level13.shortTooltip: Gain Armor, Move Speed during Wall Ride
level13.fullTooltip: While Wall Ride is active, passing near an enemy Hero increases its Movement Speed bonus to 40% for 1 second.  Passive: Wall Ride grants 20 Armor.

level16.name: Rejuvenescncia
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Boost heals percent Health
level16.fullTooltip: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum Health each second.

level16.name: Up the Frequency
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Amp It Up cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.4 seconds.  Passive: Wall Ride increases Basic Attack range by 2.2.

level16.name: Up To Eleven
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to extend Amp It Up
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to extend the duration of Amp It Up by 2 seconds.

level20.name: Bossa Nova
level20.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the Shield now decays over 4 seconds.

level20.name: Mixing Fire
level20.shortTooltip: High Five damages enemies, reduces their healing
level20.fullTooltip: High Five can now be cast on enemy Heroes, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and reducing all healing received by 50% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increase the duration of Amp It Up by 1 second.

level20.name: House Party
level20.shortTooltip: Gain increased healing from nearby allies
level20.fullTooltip: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lcio gains 8% increased healing.

level20.name: Summer Anthem
level20.shortTooltip: Activate for nearby allies to become Unkillable
level20.fullTooltip: Activate for all other allies affected by Crossfade to become Unkillable for 1.5 seconds.

Maiev.name: Maiev
Maiev.title: The Warden
Maiev.searchText: Shadowsong Warden Watcher Night Elf Alliance WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III 3 Frozen Throne FT Warlords Draenor WoD Legion Hearthstone HS
Maiev.description: A mobile Assassin that excels against clustered enemies and prevents their escape.

basic.name: Fan of Knives
basic.shortTooltip: Throw a volley of knives
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 152 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a crescent area.  Hitting at least 2 enemy Heroes with Fan of Knives reduces its cooldown to 0.5 seconds, and refunds its Mana cost.

basic.name: Umbral Bind
basic.shortTooltip: Tether enemy Heroes to Maiev, pulling those that stray too far
basic.fullTooltip: Maiev's next Basic Attack cleaves and applies a tether to enemy Heroes hit for 2.5 seconds. If a tethered Hero moves too far from Maiev, they are pulled toward her, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage and breaking the tether.

basic.name: Spirit of Vengeance
basic.shortTooltip: Project a shadow of Maiev that she can later Blink to
basic.fullTooltip: Send a shadow of Maiev outward that will return to its cast location, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along both paths. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce the cooldown by 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Containment Disc
heroic.shortTooltip: Time Stop an enemy Hero and remove their vision
heroic.fullTooltip: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

heroic.name: Warden's Cage
heroic.shortTooltip: Trap enemies in a cage of Avatars
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

trait.name: Vault of the Wardens
trait.shortTooltip: Leap into the air, becoming temporarily Immune
trait.fullTooltip: Leap into the air, becoming Immune to all hostile effects for 0.75 seconds.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Contain
heroic.fullTooltip: Activate to remove the target's vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.

basic.name: Blink
basic.fullTooltip: Teleport to the Spirit of Vengeance, consuming it.

basic.name: Umbral Bind
basic.fullTooltip: Maiev's next Basic Attack cleaves and applies a tether to enemy Heroes hit for 2.5 seconds. If a tethered Hero moves too far from Maiev, they are pulled toward her, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage and breaking the tether.

level1.name: Bonds of Justice
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Secondary tethers increase Umbral Bind damage
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15.  Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75.  Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.

level1.name: Pursuit of Vengeance
level1.shortTooltip: Umbral Bind tethers reduce Spirit of Vengeance cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.5 seconds.

level1.name: Naisha's Memento
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to make Basic Attacks bounce
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.  Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.

level4.name: Pin Down
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Hitting multiple Heroes empowers Fan of Knives
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.  Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 25%.  Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 40%.  Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.

level4.name: Blade Dance
level4.shortTooltip: Fan of Knives deals Physical Damage around Maiev
level4.fullTooltip: Using Fan of Knives deals 50 (+4% per level) Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.

level4.name: Sudden Vengeance
level4.fullTooltip: After blinking with Spirit of Vengeance, the shadow explodes, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 6% of their maximum Health.

level7.name: Elune's Wrath
level7.shortTooltip: Fan of Knives deals more damage after hitting multiple Heroes
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 77 (+4% per level) damage when it impacts.

level7.name: Bonds of Corruption
level7.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Armor reduced by 10 for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Ruthless Spirit
level7.shortTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit increase Maiev's damage
level7.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance increases all damage Maiev deals by 15% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

level10.name: Containment Disc
level10.shortTooltip: Time Stop an enemy Hero and remove their vision
level10.fullTooltip: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

level10.name: Warden's Cage
level10.shortTooltip: Trap enemies in a cage of Avatars
level10.fullTooltip: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

level13.name: Bladed Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5 seconds, up to 20 Armor.

level13.name: Chain Gang
level13.shortTooltip: Multiple Umbral Bind tethers grant Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Shadow Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3.5 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.

level16.name: Cruel Chain
level16.shortTooltip: Damage Umbral Bind targets to increase pull damage
level16.fullTooltip: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.

level16.name: Vengeful Knives
level16.shortTooltip: Spirit of Vengeance increases Fan of Knives damage
level16.fullTooltip: For each enemy Hero Spirit of Vengeance hits, Maiev's next Fan of Knives deals 1.5% maximum Health as bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

level16.name: Armored Assault
level16.shortTooltip: Armor increases Physical Damage dealt
level16.fullTooltip: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.

level20.name: Shadow Orb: Vengeance
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to reset Spirit of Vengeance cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.  Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.

level20.name: Shadow Orb: Huntress
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Move Speed, Attack Speed
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

level20.name: Shadow Orb: Shadow Strike
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to deal 75 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

Malfurion.name: Malfurion
Malfurion.title: Archdruid
Malfurion.searchText: Malfurion Stormrage Night Elf Druid Alliance WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 War III 3 Reign of Chaos RoC Frozen Throne FT Cataclysm Warlords Draenor WoD Legion Hearthstone HS
Malfurion.description: A strong sustained Healer who can help lockdown enemies to secure takedowns.

basic.name: Regrowth
basic.shortTooltip: Heal an allied Hero over time
basic.fullTooltip: Heal an allied Hero for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 20 seconds.

basic.name: Moonfire
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in an area, and heal allies with Regrowth
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 90 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and reveal them for 2 seconds.  Allies with an active Regrowth are healed for 130 (+4% per level) Health for each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire.

basic.name: Entangling Roots
basic.shortTooltip: Root and damage Heroes in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Root enemy Heroes in an area for 1.25 seconds, and deal 117 (+4% per level) damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Tranquility
heroic.shortTooltip: Continually heal nearby allies
heroic.fullTooltip: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

heroic.name: Twilight Dream
heroic.shortTooltip: Silence and damage nearby enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

trait.name: Innervate
trait.shortTooltip: Grant Mana to an ally and reduce their cooldowns
trait.fullTooltip: Grant an allied Hero 20% of their maximum Mana over 5 seconds. While affected by Innervate, their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.  Cannot be used on Heroes that do not use Mana.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

level1.name: Rejuvenation
level1.shortTooltip: Regrowths grant Malfurion Health regen
level1.fullTooltip: Malfurion gains 100% base Health regeneration for every active Regrowth.

level1.name: Celestial Alignment
level1.shortTooltip: Moonfire reveals longer, empowers Attacks
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Moonfire's reveal duration by 3 seconds. Malfurion's Basic Attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.

level1.name: Shan'do's Clarity
level1.shortTooltip: Regrowths increase Innvervate cooldown rate
level1.fullTooltip: Innervate's cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.

level4.name: Strangling Vines
level4.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 40% less healing from all sources for 3 seconds.

level4.name: Deep Roots
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Entangling Roots area and duration
level4.fullTooltip: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, and persist on the ground 40% longer.

level4.name: Vengeful Roots
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant
level4.fullTooltip: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 58 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.  Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's Basic Attack damage by 7.

level7.name: Wild Growth
level7.fullTooltip: Each Hero hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by 1 second.

level7.name: Tenacious Roots
level7.shortTooltip: Extend Entangling Roots, Stuns reset cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 25%. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots is instantly reset. This can only occur every 10 seconds.

level7.name: Nature's Cure
level7.shortTooltip: Activate to remove disablers from allies
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.

level10.name: Tranquility
level10.shortTooltip: Continually heal nearby allies
level10.fullTooltip: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

level10.name: Twilight Dream
level10.shortTooltip: Silence and damage nearby enemies
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Nature's Swiftness
level13.fullTooltip: Malfurion gains 6% Movement Speed for every active Regrowth.

level13.name: Hindering Moonfire
level13.fullTooltip: Moonfire Slows Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.

level13.name: Revitalize
level13.fullTooltip: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

level16.name: Ysera's Gift
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Regrowth heal at high Health
level16.fullTooltip: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.

level16.name: Nature's Balance
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Moonfire area, Regrowth duration
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.

level16.name: Moonlit Harmony
level16.shortTooltip: Moonfire heals more per ally affected by Regrowth
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.

level20.name: Serenity
level20.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.

level20.name: Astral Communion
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport and cast Twilight Dream
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.

level20.name: Lifebloom
level20.shortTooltip: Regrowth instantly heals for missing Health
level20.fullTooltip: Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.

level20.name: Lunar Shower
level20.fullTooltip: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.

MalGanis.name: Mal'Ganis
MalGanis.title: Nathrezim Lord
MalGanis.searchText: Malganis Dread Lord dreadlord undead demon Warcraft III War3 WC3 Warcraft3 3 Reign of Chaos WoW WotLK Wrath of the Lich King Legion
MalGanis.description: A self-sustaining Tank that peels for allies and disrupts enemies.

basic.name: Fel Claws
basic.shortTooltip: Swipe forward multiple times to deal damage
basic.fullTooltip: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing 69 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Reactivate to slash up to 2 more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds.

basic.name: Necrotic Embrace
basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage around Mal'Ganis and gain Armor
basic.fullTooltip: Desecrate the air, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and gaining 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Night Rush
basic.shortTooltip: Gain Move Speed and put enemies to Sleep
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, gain 50% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. While active, Mal'Ganis can move through enemy Heroes and put them to Sleep for 2.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Dark Conversion
heroic.shortTooltip: Channel to swap Health with an enemy Hero
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Carrion Swarm
heroic.shortTooltip: Disperse and deal damage in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 126 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

trait.name: Vampiric Touch
trait.shortTooltip: Mal'Ganis heals from damage dealt
trait.fullTooltip: Mal'Ganis heals for 45% of damage dealt to enemy Heroes and 10% of damage dealt to non-Heroes.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

basic.name: Fel Claws
basic.shortTooltip: Swipe forward multiple times to deal damage
basic.fullTooltip: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing 69 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Reactivate to slash up to 2 more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds.

basic.name: Fel Claws
basic.shortTooltip: Swipe forward multiple times to deal damage
basic.fullTooltip: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing 69 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Reactivate to slash up to 2 more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds.

basic.name: Night Rush
basic.fullTooltip: Cancel Night Rush.

level1.name: Winged Guard
level1.shortTooltip: Necrotic Embrace grants extra Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Each time Necrotic Embrace hits an enemy Hero, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack.  If Winged Guard has no charges, Mal'Ganis will gain 1 charge after 6 seconds.

level1.name: Vampiric Aura
level1.shortTooltip: Improve Vampiric Touch and share it with allies
level1.fullTooltip: Mal'Ganis and nearby allied Heroes heal for 15% of Physical Damage dealt.

level1.name: Time to Feed
level1.shortTooltip: Heal when initially damaging enemy Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Mal'Ganis heals for 52 (+4% per level) when damaging a nearby enemy Hero. This can occur once every 6 seconds against each enemy Hero.

level4.name: Fueled by Torment
level4.shortTooltip: Necrotic Embrace heals when damage is taken
level4.fullTooltip: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for 11 (+4% per level) when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts 15% more Hero damage into healing.

level4.name: Might of Sargeras
level4.shortTooltip: Raise Necrotic Embrace Armor, but lower duration
level4.fullTooltip: Necrotic Embrace's Armor is increased to 50, but the duration is reduced to 2.5 seconds.

level4.name: Echo of Doom
level4.fullTooltip: When Necrotic Embrace expires, it explodes again for 50 (+4% per level) damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Mal'Ganis retains 25 Armor for 1 more second.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

level7.name: Black Claws
level7.shortTooltip: Fel Claws increases Basic Attack damage
level7.fullTooltip: After Mal'Ganis hits an enemy Hero with Fel Claws, his next Basic Attack deals 60% more damage.

level7.name: Will of Tichondrius
level7.fullTooltip: The third slash of Fel Claws steals 3% of maximum Health from enemy Heroes.

level7.name: Spreading Plague
level7.shortTooltip: Periodically deal damage after Night Rush
level7.fullTooltip: After Night Rush expires, deal 30 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

level7.name: Nightmare Fuel
level7.fullTooltip: Casting Night Rush while in a bush increases its duration to 2.75 seconds. Basic Attacks deal 200% more damage to Sleeping targets.

level10.name: Carrion Swarm
level10.shortTooltip: Disperse and deal damage in an area
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 126 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

level10.name: Dark Conversion
level10.shortTooltip: Channel to swap Health with an enemy Hero
level10.fullTooltip: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

level13.name: Deep Sleep
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by 0.75 seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by 10%.

level13.name: The Night Beckons
level13.fullTooltip: After Night Rush's Sleep ends, targets are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

level13.name: Blood Rush
level13.fullTooltip: When Mal'Ganis is healed by a Hero, he gains 1% Movement Speed for 8 seconds, up to 15%.

level16.name: Plague Bats
level16.shortTooltip: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats
level16.fullTooltip: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing 81 (+4% per level) damage.

level16.name: Frenzied Assault
level16.shortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed against higher Health Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage grant 50% Attack Speed and 20% increased Physical Damage for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Blind as a Bat
level16.shortTooltip: Remove Fel Claws cooldown, but lose all vision
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts 6 seconds.

level20.name: Seeker Swarm
level20.shortTooltip: Carrion Swarm Sleeps Heroes after expiring
level20.fullTooltip: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage and Sleeping them for 2.5 seconds.

level20.name: Wrath of Nathreza
level20.shortTooltip: Dark Conversion damages Heroes near the target
level20.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer 75% of the transferred Health as damage over 3 seconds.  Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.

level20.name: Vanquish the Weak
level20.shortTooltip: Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slow
level20.fullTooltip: Damage from Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slows enemies by 15% for 1.5 seconds, and Vampiric Touch converts 10% more damage into healing versus Slowed Heroes.

level20.name: Alone in the Dark
level20.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes put to Sleep by Night Rush have their vision greatly reduced during the Sleep and for 2 seconds after.

Malthael.name: Malthael
Malthael.title: Aspect of Death
Malthael.searchText: Malthel Malthiel Angel Archangel Diablo 3 D3 Reaper of Souls RoS
Malthael.description: A Bruiser who marks his enemies, shredding away high Health enemies.

basic.name: Soul Rip
basic.shortTooltip: Damage Marked enemies and heal
basic.fullTooltip: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage and healing Malthael for 25 (+4% per level) per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional 4% of the Hero's maximum Health.

basic.name: Wraith Strike
basic.shortTooltip: Teleport to a Marked target
basic.fullTooltip: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage and refreshing Reaper's Mark.

basic.name: Death Shroud
basic.shortTooltip: Unleash a wave that applies Reaper's Mark
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.25 seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies Reaper's Mark to enemies it hits.

heroic.name: Tormented Souls
heroic.shortTooltip: Apply Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.  When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike.

heroic.name: Last Rites
heroic.shortTooltip: Quest: Damage a Hero based on their missing Health
heroic.fullTooltip: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.  Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

trait.name: Reaper's Mark
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks cleave, apply Reaper's Mark
trait.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks cleave in an area in front of Malthael and afflict non-Structure targets with Reaper's Mark for 4 seconds.  Marked enemies are revealed and take damage equal to 1.75% of their maximum Health every 1 second.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

level1.name: Death's Reach
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Wraith Strike range
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Wraith Strike's range by 35%.

level1.name: On a Pale Horse
level1.shortTooltip: Increase mounted Movement Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted.

level1.name: Fear the Reaper
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Movement Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 25% and pass through other units for 4 seconds.

level4.name: Die Alone
level4.fullTooltip: Soul Rip deals 50% more damage to Heroes if it hits only one Hero.

level4.name: Throwing Shade
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 12 Heroes with Death Shroud.  Reward: Permanently increase Death Shroud's range by 33%, reduce its cooldown by 4 seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from 50 to 25.

level4.name: Black Harvest
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 180 seconds.  Reward: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Cold Hand
level7.fullTooltip: Soul Rip Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

level7.name: Massacre
level7.fullTooltip: Wraith Strike now damages and applies Reaper's Mark to enemies around its target.

level7.name: Touch of Death
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by Reaper's Mark by 50% for 4 seconds.

level10.name: Tormented Souls
level10.shortTooltip: Apply Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.  When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike.

level10.name: Last Rites
level10.shortTooltip: Quest: Damage a Hero based on their missing Health
level10.fullTooltip: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.  Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

level13.name: Soul Siphon
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4.75% of the Hero's maximum Health.

level13.name: Ethereal Existence
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 10 Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by Reaper's Mark, up to a maximum of 30.

level13.name: Inevitable End
level13.shortTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable, remove Marks
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.

level13.name: Shroud of Wisdom
level13.fullTooltip: After 2 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

level16.name: Soul Collector
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Soul Rip range, reduce cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 25%.

level16.name: Mortality
level16.shortTooltip: Wraith Strike deals bonus damage to Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 8% of the Hero's maximum Health.

level16.name: Memento Mori
level16.shortTooltip: Reaper's Mark deals increased damage over time
level16.fullTooltip: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds.

level20.name: Reaper of Souls
level20.shortTooltip: Hero Takedowns extend Tormented Souls duration
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds.  While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.

level20.name: Angel of Death
level20.fullTooltip: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.

level20.name: Final Curtain
level20.fullTooltip: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.

level20.name: No One Can Stop Death
level20.fullTooltip: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.

Medic.name: Lt. Morales
Medic.title: Combat Medic
Medic.searchText: Lt. Morales Medic Lieutenant LtMorales Terran Heroes of the Storm SC Brood War BW UED
Medic.description: A strong, sustained Healer who's unbeatable if left alone by her enemies.

basic.name: Healing Beam
basic.shortTooltip: Heals allies over time
basic.fullTooltip: Heal target allied Hero or Minion for 172 (+4% per level) Health per second as long as they are in range. After not channeling Healing Beam for 2 seconds, regenerate 6 Energy per second.  Reactivate to switch targets, or self-cast to cancel channeling.

basic.name: Safeguard
basic.shortTooltip: Grants Armor to the target
basic.fullTooltip: Grant target ally Hero 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Displacement Grenade
basic.shortTooltip: Damages and knocks enemies away
basic.fullTooltip: Fire a grenade that can be manually detonated, dealing 208 (+4% per level) to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

heroic.name: Stim Drone
heroic.shortTooltip: Grant massive Attack and Movement Speed
heroic.fullTooltip: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

heroic.shortTooltip: Transport allies across long distances
heroic.fullTooltip: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

trait.name: Caduceus Reactor
trait.shortTooltip: Restore Health while channeling Healing Beam
trait.fullTooltip: While channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales regenerates 2% of her maximum Health per second.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

basic.shortTooltip: Heals allies over time
basic.fullTooltip: Redirect Healing Beam to another Hero or Minion. Self-cast to cancel channeling.

trait.name: Cancel Healing Beam
trait.fullTooltip: Stop channeling Healing Beam.

basic.name: Detonate Displacement Grenade
basic.shortTooltip: Damages and knocks enemies away
basic.fullTooltip: Detonate Displacement Grenade, dealing 208 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

level1.name: Caduceus Feedback
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks generate Energy
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Attack Range by 1.1 and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate 4 Energy.

level1.name: Life Support
level1.shortTooltip: Safeguard generates Energy
level1.fullTooltip: Generate 2 Energy each time Safeguard reduces damage, up to a maximum of 20 Energy per use.

level1.name: Clear!
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes to empower Displacement Grenade
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 9 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%.

level4.name: Cellular Reactor
level4.fullTooltip: Consume 30 Energy to heal Lt. Morales for 40% of her maximum Health over 4 seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active.

level4.name: Trauma Trigger
level4.fullTooltip: Taking damage while below 40% Health grants 40 Armor for 3 seconds.  This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

level4.name: Blast Shield
level4.fullTooltip: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade generate 2 Energy and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health, stacking up to 5 times.

level7.name: Physical Therapy
level7.fullTooltip: Safeguard removes all Slows from its target and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Vanadium Plating
level7.shortTooltip: Stuns, Roots increase Safeguard Armor, duration
level7.fullTooltip: While an ally affected by Safeguard is Stunned or Rooted, Safeguard grants an additional 25 Armor and its duration is paused.

level7.name: Prolonged Safeguard
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Safeguard's duration by 50%.

level10.name: Stim Drone
level10.shortTooltip: Grant massive Attack and Movement Speed
level10.fullTooltip: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

level10.name: Medivac Dropship
level10.shortTooltip: Transport allies across long distances
level10.fullTooltip: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

level13.name: EMP Grenade
level13.shortTooltip: Displacement Grenade deals more damage to Shields
level13.fullTooltip: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 96 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds, and up to 400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

level13.name: System Shock
level13.fullTooltip: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal 30% less damage for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Second Opinion
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting 2 or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

level16.name: Extended Care
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Healing Beam range
level16.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 30%.

level16.name: First Responder
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Beam empowered at high Energy
level16.fullTooltip: While above 70 Energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by 25%.

level16.name: Shield Sequencer
level16.shortTooltip: Safeguard gains a second charge
level16.fullTooltip: Safeguard gains a second charge.

level20.name: Hyperactivity
level20.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from 90 seconds to 45 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 25% to 50%.

level20.name: Safe Zone
level20.fullTooltip: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2 seconds.

level20.name: Reinforcements
level20.shortTooltip: Medivac appears at Hall of Storms
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Hall of Storms for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.  Does not require the Medivac Dropship Talent.

level20.name: Caduceus Reactor 2.0
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 6% of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.

Medivh.name: Medivh
Medivh.title: The Last Guardian
Medivh.searchText: Midivh Prophet War1 I WC1 Warcraft1 Warcraft3 Warcraft III WC3 War3 3 Reign of Chaos RoC WoW World of Warcraft Burning Crusade BC Hearthstone HS
Medivh.description: A Support who can negate burst damage and allow his allies to teleport.

basic.name: Arcane Rift
basic.shortTooltip: Launch an arcane bolt that damages enemies in a line
basic.fullTooltip: Launch a rift that deals 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.  Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying.  Reward: Permanently increase the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

basic.name: Force of Will
basic.shortTooltip: Protect an allied Hero from damage
basic.fullTooltip: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.  Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target for 20% of the damage it absorbed.

basic.name: Portal
basic.shortTooltip: Create a portal that allies can pass through
basic.fullTooltip: Create a set of portals between Medivh and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

heroic.name: Poly Bomb
heroic.shortTooltip: Polymorph a Hero that spreads to other Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

heroic.name: Ley Line Seal
heroic.shortTooltip: Unleash a wave that Time Stops enemy Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

trait.name: Raven Form
trait.shortTooltip: Transform into a raven
trait.fullTooltip: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

mount.name: Raven Form
mount.fullTooltip: Transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over terrain and is immune to all effects.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

heroic.name: Redirect Ley Line Seal
heroic.fullTooltip: Redirect the energy wave to a new location.

mount.name: Cancel Raven Form
mount.fullTooltip: Cancel Raven Form.

basic.name: Portal
basic.shortTooltip: Create a portal that allies can pass through
basic.fullTooltip: Create a set of portals between Medivh and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

trait.name: Cancel Portal
trait.fullTooltip: Destroy current Portal.

level1.name: Winds of Celerity
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Raven Form Movement Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

level1.name: Ravens Intellect
level1.shortTooltip: Raven Form increases Health and Mana Regen
level1.fullTooltip: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by 75%.

level1.name: Portal Mastery
level1.shortTooltip: Place both Portal locations
level1.fullTooltip: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form.   Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.

level4.name: Mage Armor
level4.fullTooltip: The first time an ally uses a Portal, they gain 30 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing their damage taken by 30%.

level4.name: Raven Familiar
level4.shortTooltip: Using a Portal grants a Raven Familiar
level4.fullTooltip: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within 5 seconds, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

level4.name: Dust of Appearance
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to greatly increase sight range for 5 seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for 8 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.  Passive: Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by 25%.

level7.name: Mystic Assault
level7.fullTooltip: If Arcane Rift hits an enemy Hero, Medivh's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 50% more damage and heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

level7.name: Arcane Explosion
level7.shortTooltip: Force of Will deals area damage
level7.fullTooltip: When Force of Will expires, it deals 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, plus 50% of the damage it prevented, up to 315 (+4% per level) additional damage.

level7.name: Force of Magic
level7.shortTooltip: Force of Will can grant Spell Power
level7.fullTooltip: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants 30% Spell Power for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.

level10.name: Poly Bomb
level10.shortTooltip: Polymorph a Hero that spreads to other Heroes
level10.fullTooltip: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

level10.name: Ley Line Seal
level10.shortTooltip: Unleash a wave that Time Stops enemy Heroes
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Circle of Protection
level13.shortTooltip: Force of Will applies to allies near target
level13.fullTooltip: Force of Will also applies to allies near the target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

level13.name: Enduring Will
level13.shortTooltip: Preventing damage reduces Force of Will cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to 4 seconds.

level13.name: Reabsorption
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the amount of healing from Force of Will to 70% of the damage it absorbed.

level16.name: Arcane Charge
level16.shortTooltip: Arcane Rift deals more damage after hitting a Hero
level16.fullTooltip: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 15% more damage.

level16.name: Temporal Flux
level16.shortTooltip: Arcane Rift reduces Heroic cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 3%. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 9%.

level16.name: Stable Portal
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Portal uptime
level16.fullTooltip: Decrease Portal cooldown by 25% and increase Portal duration by 50%.

level20.name: Glyph Of Poly Bomb
level20.shortTooltip: Poly Bomb spreads faster and farther
level20.fullTooltip: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

level20.name: Medivh Cheats!
level20.shortTooltip: Ley Line Seal can be redirected while active
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

level20.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
level20.fullTooltip: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

level20.name: Arcane Brilliance
level20.shortTooltip: Grant Spell Power and Mana to allies
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

level20.name: Dust of Disappearance
level20.fullTooltip: Stealth an allied Hero for 40 seconds, they are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Mephisto.name: Mephisto
Mephisto.title: Lord of Hatred
Mephisto.description: A sustained Assassin who thrives in battle against groups of enemies.

basic.name: Skull Missile
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line after a short delay
basic.fullTooltip: Conjure a skull that travels in the target direction after 0.75 seconds, dealing 127 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and Slowing Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Lightning Nova
basic.shortTooltip: Deal increasing damage to nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: A ring of lightning appears around Mephisto for 2.5 seconds. Enemies within the ring take 45 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds.  Each time a cast of Lightning Nova hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 3%, up to 30%.

basic.name: Shade of Mephisto
basic.shortTooltip: Teleport to a location and return after a delay
basic.fullTooltip: Teleport to a location, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and leaving behind a Shade of Mephisto at Mephisto's original location.   After 2.5 seconds, Mephisto is teleported back to the Shade's location.

heroic.name: Consume Souls
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow all enemy Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Durance of Hate
heroic.shortTooltip: Unleash spirits that spread Roots
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

trait.name: Lord Of Hatred
trait.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes with Basic Abilities reduces Mephisto's cooldowns
trait.fullTooltip: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Abilities reduces Mephisto's Basic Ability cooldowns.  Skull Missile and Shade of Mephisto grant 1.5 seconds of cooldown reduction per Hero hit, and Lightning Nova grants 0.3 seconds per Hero hit.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Skull Missile.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Skull Missile's damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Skull Missile's cooldown is permanently reduced to 5 seconds.

level1.name: Furious Spark

level4.name: Spite
level4.shortTooltip: Regen Globes activate Lord of Hatred
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by 125%. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.

level7.name: Ghastly Armor
level7.fullTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants 20 Armor while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.

level7.name: Frost Storm
level7.fullTooltip: Enemies near Shade of Mephisto are Slowed by 50% for 2 seconds. Hitting enemies with Skull Missile while Shade of Mephisto is active increases its Slow to 50%.

level7.name: Trickery
level7.shortTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants Move Speed
level7.fullTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Movement Speed while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends. After Shade of Mephisto expires, all Slows and Roots are removed from Mephisto.

level10.name: Consume Souls
level10.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow all enemy Heroes
level10.fullTooltip: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

level10.name: Durance of Hate
level10.shortTooltip: Unleash spirits that spread Roots
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

level13.name: Abhorred Skull
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants 20% Spell Power for 6 seconds.

level13.name: Hysteria

level13.fullTooltip: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability.

level13.name: Shard of Hate
level13.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks splash and activate Lord of Hatred
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target and activate Lord of Hatred against enemy Heroes, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second per Hero hit.

level16.fullTooltip: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing 138 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

level16.name: Static Field

level16.fullTooltip: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches 30%, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

level16.name: Animosity
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to extend Lightning Nova
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to extend the duration of Lightning Nova by 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks while Lightning Nova is active cause an immediate pulse of Lightning Nova damage.

level20.name: Consumed by Hatred
level20.fullTooltip: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls initial cast kills a Hero it will cast 1 additional time.

level20.name: Unspeakable Horror
level20.fullTooltip: Durance of Hate Silences enemies for 3 seconds after its Root expires.

level20.name: Mimic
level20.shortTooltip: Shade of Mephisto can cast Lightning Nova
level20.fullTooltip: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location.

level20.name: Shade Lord
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to swap with Shade of Mephisto
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.  Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents.

Monk.name: Kharazim
Monk.title: Veradani Monk
Monk.searchText: Karazim Monk Nephalem D3 Diablo 3 III Reaper of Souls RoS Diablo3
Monk.description: A flexible Healer that pairs well with Melee allies who like to dive into the enemy team.

basic.name: Radiant Dash

basic.fullTooltip: Kharazim's next Basic Attack increases his Attack Speed and Attack Range by 100% for 2 seconds.

heroic.name: Seven-Sided Strike
heroic.shortTooltip: Become Invulnerable and strike nearby Heroes

heroic.name: Divine Palm
heroic.shortTooltip: Prevent an ally from death
heroic.fullTooltip: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

trait.name: Pick Your Trait

trait.fullTooltip: Choose between Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight from the Talents panel.

mount.name: Summon Mount

trait.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

trait.name: Insight
trait.fullTooltip: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14 (+4% per level) Mana, grants a stack of Insight, and gives 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 1.75 seconds.

trait.name: Transcendence
trait.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 104 (+4% per level) and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

level1.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 104 (+4% per level) and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

level1.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

level1.name: Insight

level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14 (+4% per level) Mana, grants a stack of Insight, and gives 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 1.75 seconds.

level4.fullTooltip: Place an Air Ally that grants vision and reveals a large area around it. Has 75 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 40 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level7.fullTooltip: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.

level7.fullTooltip: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to 30%.  Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 50% for 3.5 seconds.

level7.name: Blazing Fists
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Deadly Reach cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Deadly Reach by 100%.  Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

level10.name: Divine Palm
level10.shortTooltip: Prevent an ally from death
level10.fullTooltip: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

level20.fullTooltip: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

Muradin.searchText: Muradin Bronzebeard Dwarf Alliance Warcraft III War3 WC3 Warcraft3 3 Reign of Chaos RoC  WoW Wrath of the Lich King WotLK Cataclysm
Muradin.description: A sturdy Tank that can do well in a multitude of situations.

basic.name: Storm Bolt
basic.shortTooltip: Throw a hammer, stunning and damaging the first enemy hit

Reward: Storm Bolt pierces to hit an additional target, and Muradin's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Storm Bolt by 1 second.

trait.fullTooltip: Muradin restores 55 (+4% per level) Health per second when he has not taken damage for 4 seconds. When below 40% Health, increased to 111 (+4% per level) Health per second.

level13.fullTooltip: Deal 20 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies and heal for 75% of the damage dealt this way. Basic Attacks against a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed increase this damage by 100% for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Unstoppable Force

Active: Qhira deals 32 (+4% per level) damage and heals for 85 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero affected. Damage and healing is increased by 50% per each additional stack on that Hero.

Once attached, Qhira becomes Immune to all effects, swinging around the target for 2.75 seconds and dealing 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies between you and the target.  Re-activate to send you to the target's location knocking them away, dealing 108 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

level10.fullTooltip: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

level10.name: Crushing Jaws
level10.shortTooltip: Pull, damage, and Stun enemies in an area
level10.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

level13.name: Determination
level13.shortTooltip: Shadow Waltz grants Spell Armor after dashing
level13.fullTooltip: After dashing with Shadow Waltz, Orphea gains 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, stacking up to 2 times. While Orphea has Determination, her Physical damage is increased by 15%.

level13.name: Abyssal Symbiosis
level13.shortTooltip: Chomp hitting Heroes grants more Chaos
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Chomp instantly grants Orphea maximum Chaos.

level13.name: Invasive Miasma
level13.shortTooltip: Activate Overflowing Chaos to damage, heal
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds. For each Hero hit, heal for 182 (+4% per level) and gain 1 Chaos.

level16.name: Bond of Anguish
level16.shortTooltip: Shadow Waltz steals percent Health
level16.fullTooltip: Shadow Waltz deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 3% of their maximum Health, healing Orphea for 50% of damage dealt.

level16.name: Dead Magic
level16.shortTooltip: Chaos Basic Attacks ignore Armor, area damage
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks that consume Chaos ignore Armor and deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage to all enemies around the target.

level16.name: Lurking Terror
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to cast Chomp from Dread's eruption
level16.fullTooltip: After Dread erupts and for 2 seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area.

level20.name: Monster Within
level20.shortTooltip: Eternal Feast grants Chaos, increases Attack Speed
level20.fullTooltip: Eternal Feast grants 1 Chaos each time it hits a Hero. While Eternal Feast is active, Orphea's Attack Speed is increased by 50%.

level20.name: Engulfing Oblivion
level20.shortTooltip: Crushing Jaws lowers Armor, reduces cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Crushing Jaws reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 25 for 2 seconds. Takedowns set its cooldown to 5 seconds.

level20.name: Eldritch Conduit
level20.fullTooltip: Each Chaos consumed increases Orphea's Spell Power by 3%, up to 30%. After reaching the maximum bonus, the Spell Power is increased by an additional 30%. Lasts 10 seconds.

level20.name: Final Toccata
level20.shortTooltip: Shadow Waltz cooldown resets after dashing
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to instantly reset the cooldown of Shadow Waltz. For the next 6 seconds, dashing with Shadow Waltz resets its cooldown.

Probius.name: Probius
Probius.title: Curious Probe
Probius.searchText: Probe Protoss SC SC1 StarCraft II 2 SC2 Star2 Starcraft2
Probius.description: A high damage Summoner that must stay near Pylons to be effective.

basic.name: Disruption Pulse
basic.shortTooltip: Fire a missile in a line that damages enemies and detonates Warp Rifts
basic.fullTooltip: Fire a burst of energy forward, dealing 142 (+5% per level) damage to all enemies it passes through.  Hitting the center of a Warp Rift will cause it to explode, dealing additional damage.

basic.name: Warp Rift
basic.shortTooltip: Create a rift that slows enemies and can be detonated with Disruption Pulse
basic.fullTooltip: Open an unstable Warp Rift at a location that takes 1.25 seconds to arm, which then slows nearby enemies by 25% lasting 9 seconds.  Armed Warp Rifts explode when hit by Disruption Pulse, dealing 261 (+5% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Stores up to 2 charges.

basic.name: Photon Cannon
basic.shortTooltip: Create a cannon that attacks nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Warp in a Photon Cannon that deals 105 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 13 seconds.  Must be placed within a Pylon's Power Field.  Deactivates if it doesn't have a Pylon powering it.

heroic.name: Pylon Overcharge
heroic.shortTooltip: Weaponize Pylons
heroic.fullTooltip: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

heroic.name: Null Gate
heroic.shortTooltip: Create a Slowing barrier
heroic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are Slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

trait.name: Warp In Pylon
trait.shortTooltip: Summon a Pylon that renergizes Probius and allows the construction of other buildings
trait.fullTooltip: Warp in a Pylon that generates a Power Field and grants vision of the surrounding area. Probius only regenerates mana while inside a Power Field.  Up to 2 Pylons can be active at a time.

mount.name: Worker Rush
mount.shortTooltip: Move faster passively.  Activate to move even faster.
mount.fullTooltip: Activate to gain an additional 60% Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Taking damage ends this effect early.  Worker Rush is always active while at the Hall of Storms.  Passive: Probius moves 10% faster by hovering over the ground.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

level1.name: Echo Pulse
level1.shortTooltip: Disruption Pulse returns to Probius
level1.fullTooltip: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.

level1.name: Warp Resonance
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Detonate Warp Rift on Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions.  Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

level1.name: Gather Minerals
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Collect Minerals to empower Photon Cannons
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560.   Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 35% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

level4.name: Photon Barrier
level4.shortTooltip: Gain Spell Armor while Photon Cannon is Active
level4.fullTooltip: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.

level4.name: Turbo Charged
level4.shortTooltip: Move faster and decrease Worker Rush's cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

level4.name: Shield Capacitor
level4.fullTooltip: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

level7.name: Particle Accelerator
level7.shortTooltip: Increase damage for each target hit
level7.fullTooltip: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.

level7.name: Rift Shock
level7.shortTooltip: Deal more damage to enemies caught in Warp Rift detonations
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.

level7.name: Tower Defense
level7.fullTooltip: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

level10.name: Pylon Overcharge
level10.shortTooltip: Weaponize Pylons
level10.fullTooltip: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

level10.name: Null Gate
level10.shortTooltip: Create a Slowing barrier
level10.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are Slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

level13.name: Aggressive Matrix
level13.fullTooltip: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.

level13.name: Power Overflowing
level13.shortTooltip: Power Fields give Spell Power, Mana
level13.fullTooltip: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2 Mana per second.

level13.name: Shield Battery
level13.fullTooltip: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 28 (+4% per level) Shields per second, up to 112 (+4% per level). Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

level16.name: Quantum Entanglement
level16.shortTooltip: Warp Rift's slow lingers
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

level16.name: Gravity Well
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Warp Rift Slow amount in center
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

level16.name: Repulsor
level16.shortTooltip: Enemies are knocked away from Warp Rift detonations
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.

level16.name: Interference
level16.shortTooltip: Warp Rift explosions reduce enemy Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.

level20.name: Construct Additional Pylons
level20.shortTooltip: Increase max Pylon count and Pylon Overcharge damage
level20.fullTooltip: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

level20.name: Gate Keeper
level20.shortTooltip: Indefinite duration while in Pylon Power
level20.fullTooltip: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.  Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.

level20.name: Shoot 'Em Up
level20.shortTooltip: Hitting a Warp Rift splits Disruption Pulse into several additional pulses
level20.fullTooltip: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.    Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

level20.name: Probius Loop
level20.shortTooltip: Create new Warp Rifts by hitting Heroes with explosions
level20.fullTooltip: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 1 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.

Ragnaros.name: Ragnaros
Ragnaros.title: The Firelord
Ragnaros.searchText: Ragnaros Firelord Molten Core MC Elemental WoW World of Warcraft Cataclysm Hearthstone HS
Ragnaros.description: A Bruiser that can nullify enemy pushes against his Forts and Keeps.

basic.name: Empower Sulfuras
basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage in an area and heal Ragnaros
basic.fullTooltip: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 (+4% per level) Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.  Molten Core: Molten Swing Stun and damage nearby enemies.

basic.name: Living Meteor
basic.shortTooltip: Summon a meteor to damage enemies in a line
basic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Summon a meteor at the target point that deals 68 (+4% per level) damage, then rolls in the target direction dealing 272 (+4% per level) damage per second for 1.75 seconds.  Molten Core: Meteor Shower Drop a line of meteor impacts.

basic.name: Blast Wave
basic.shortTooltip: Cause a delayed explosion around an ally
basic.fullTooltip: Ignite Ragnaros or an ally, granting 25% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds before exploding dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Molten Core: Explosive Rune Cause a delayed explosion in a large area.

heroic.name: Sulfuras Smash
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and Stun enemies in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Lava Wave
heroic.shortTooltip: Send a wave of lava down a lane
heroic.fullTooltip: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

trait.name: Molten Core
trait.shortTooltip: Take over a destroyed or Allied fort to unleash Ragnaros's full power
trait.fullTooltip: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 (+4% per level) Health that burns away over 18 seconds.  Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage in an area and heal Ragnaros
basic.fullTooltip: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 (+4% per level) Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.  Molten Core: Molten Swing Stun and damage nearby enemies.

level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30.  Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.

level1.name: Shifting Meteor

Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.

level1.name: Engulfing Flame
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Blast Wave damage, radius
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75% and its radius by 15%.

level4.name: Slow Burn

level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75.  Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

level7.name: Hand of Ragnaros
level7.fullTooltip: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Molten Power
level7.shortTooltip: After hitting Heroes, next Living Meteor deals increased damage
level7.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.

level7.name: Blistering Attacks
level7.shortTooltip: Periodically empower Basic Attacks against Heroes
level7.fullTooltip: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.

level10.name: Sulfuras Smash
level10.shortTooltip: Damage and Stun enemies in an area
level10.fullTooltip: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

level10.fullTooltip: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

level13.fullTooltip: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

level13.name: Tempered Flame
level13.fullTooltip: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Resilient Flame
level13.fullTooltip: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.   This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

level16.name: Giant Scorcher
level16.shortTooltip: Empower Sulfuras deals extra damage to Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

level16.name: Meteor Bomb
level16.shortTooltip: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path
level16.fullTooltip: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

level16.name: Blast Echo
level16.shortTooltip: A second Blast Wave is created after the first
level16.fullTooltip: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

level20.name: Flames of Sulfuron

level20.shortTooltip: Enhances Molten Core Health, cooldown, damage
level20.fullTooltip: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

level20.name: Submerge
