level20.fullTooltip: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 (+4% per level) Health over 3 seconds.

basic.name: Molten Swing
basic.shortTooltip: Stun and damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Swing Sulfuras in a wide arc, dealing 161 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning enemies for 1 second.  Damage increased by 25% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

basic.name: Meteor Shower
basic.shortTooltip: Summon a line of meteors
basic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Summon 3 meteors at the target point that fall in the target direction. Each meteor deals 151 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.  Damage increased by 25% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

basic.name: Explosive Rune
basic.shortTooltip: Cause a delayed explosion in a large area
basic.fullTooltip: Create a rune that deals 285 (+4% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies after 1.5 seconds.  Damage increased by 25% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

basic.shortTooltip: Activate to heal

basic.name: Mirror Image

Whenever an Image takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes.  Maximum 2 Mirror Images can be active at at time. Using Mirror Image removes most negative effects from Samuro.

While Stealthed, Samuro's Movement Speed is increased by 25% and he can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Samuro is Unrevealable for the first 1 second of Wind Walk.

level20.name: Advanced Lava Strike
level20.fullTooltip: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

level20.name: Shrapnel Mines
level20.fullTooltip: Upon detonating, Spider Mines reduce the armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10, up to 30, for 4 seconds.

level20.name: Ultra Capacitors
level20.shortTooltip: Siege Mode Attacks grant Attack Speed
level20.fullTooltip: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants 5% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

Stitches.name: Stitches
Stitches.title: Terror of Darkshire
Stitches.searchText: Stitches Abomination Undead WoW World of Warcraft hook
Stitches.description: A Tank who wants to isolate distant enemies away from their team.

basic.name: Hook
basic.shortTooltip: Pull the first target hit towards Stitches
basic.fullTooltip: Pull the first enemy hit towards Stitches and deal 91 (+4% per level) damage.

basic.name: Slam
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 104 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area. Enemies in the inner impact area take 40% more damage and are Slowed by 40% for 1.5 seconds.

basic.name: Devour
basic.shortTooltip: Damage an enemy and restore Health
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 319 (+4% per level) damage to non-Heroic units, or 114 (+4% per level) damage to Heroes. Restores 20% of Stitches's maximum Health.

heroic.name: Putrid Bile
heroic.shortTooltip: Emit a Slowing bile trail
heroic.fullTooltip: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

heroic.name: Gorge
heroic.shortTooltip: Completely consume an enemy Hero
heroic.fullTooltip: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

trait.name: Vile Cleaver
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks splash additional damage over time
trait.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks splash Vile Gas, poisoning nearby enemies for 45 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds. Re-applying Vile Gas increases its current duration to a maximum of 10 seconds.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

activable.name: Helping Hand
activable.shortTooltip: Pull the first target hit towards Stitches
activable.fullTooltip: Activate to use Hook that can hit allied Heroes. When used to pull allies, the cooldown of Hook is reduced by 50%.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

trait.name: Vile Cleaver
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks splash additional damage over time
trait.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks splash Vile Gas, poisoning nearby enemies for 45 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds. Re-applying Vile Gas increases its current duration to a maximum of 10 seconds.

level1.name: Savor the Flavor
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Devour heals more, grants Health Regen
level1.fullTooltip: When Devour hits a Hero, Stitches heals for an additional 8% of his maximum Health and Mana over 4 seconds.   Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Devour increases Stitches's Health Regeneration by 1.5.

level1.name: Patchwork Creation
level1.shortTooltip: All healing effects increased, kills restore Health
level1.fullTooltip: Increase regeneration effects and all healing received by 15%. Whenever a nearby enemy Minion dies, restore 30 (+4% per level) Health. Takedowns restore 240 (+4% per level) Health.

level1.name: Hungry for More
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes increase Health, Move Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Stitches's maximum Health by 30.   Reward: Every 15 Globes gathered permanently increases Stitches's Movement Speed by 5%, up to 20%.

level4.name: Serrated Edge
level4.shortTooltip: Hook deals bonus damage, reduces cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook deals bonus damage equal to 5% of their maximum Health, and reduces Hook's cooldown by 3 seconds.

level4.name: Playtime!
level4.shortTooltip: Slam reduces other Basic Ability cooldowns
level4.fullTooltip: Heroes hit by Slam reduce the cooldowns of Stitches's other Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds, increased to 2 seconds for Heroes that are hit by its inner impact area.

level4.name: Chop Chop
level4.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with the inner impact area of Slam grants 50% increased Attack Speed for 6 seconds.

level7.name: Blight
level7.shortTooltip: Vile Gas heals, activate to reduce enemy healing
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to apply Vile Gas to all nearby enemies. Enemy Heroes hit receive 20% less healing for 5 seconds.  Passive: Vile Gas heals Stitches for 33% of the damage dealt.

level7.name: Cannibalize
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks and Slam heals Stitches
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks or the inner impact area of Slam heals Stitches for 2% of his maximum Health.

level7.name: Tenderizer
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks Slow enemies, refresh Slam's Slow
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds and refresh the duration of Slam's inner impact area Slow.

level10.name: Putrid Bile
level10.shortTooltip: Emit a Slowing bile trail
level10.fullTooltip: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

level10.name: Gorge
level10.shortTooltip: Completely consume an enemy Hero
level10.fullTooltip: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

level13.name: Lacerate
level13.shortTooltip: Slam spreads Vile Gas, reduces Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Slam afflicts enemies with Vile Gas, and Heroes hit by Slam have their Armor reduced by 10 for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Digestive Juices
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Devour reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and causes the Hero hit to deal 50% reduced damage for 5 seconds.

level13.name: Gas Flare
level13.fullTooltip: Deals 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook increases this damage by 150% for 8 seconds.

level16.name: Fishing Hook
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Hook range
level16.fullTooltip: Hook has an additional 50% range.

level16.name: Meat Hook
level16.shortTooltip: Hook heals Stitches over time
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook heals Stitches for 20% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. For 4 seconds, Stitches's Basic Attacks against the Hero hit refreshes the healing duration.

level16.name: Pulverize
level16.shortTooltip: Slam Slows all targets, increased Slow
level16.fullTooltip: All enemies hit by Slam are Slowed by 75% for 0.75 seconds.

level20.name: Potent Bile
level20.shortTooltip: Putrid Bile lasts longer and Slows more
level20.fullTooltip: Putrid Bile lasts 6 seconds longer and its Slow is increased from 35% to 45%.

level20.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
level20.fullTooltip: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them.

level20.name: Second Helping
level20.shortTooltip: Devour gains a charge, reduces Heroic cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Devour gains 1 additional charge. Enemy Heroes hit by Devour reduce the cooldown of Stitches's Heroic Ability by 5 seconds.

level20.name: Shambling Horror
level20.shortTooltip: Resilient to Slows, activate to gain Armor
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.  Passive: Stitches cannot have his Movement Speed reduced below 100%.

Stukov.name: Stukov
Stukov.title: Infested Admiral
Stukov.searchText: Stewkov Starcraft Brood War BW SC2 SC Heart of the Swarm HotS Legacy of the Void LotV Zerg Infested Terran UED
Stukov.description: A Healer that brings high amounts of disruption from long range.

basic.name: Healing Pathogen
basic.shortTooltip: Infest allies with a spreading healing Virus
basic.fullTooltip: Infest an allied Hero with a Healing Pathogen that heals the target for 222 (+4% per level) Health over 4.5 seconds. Healing Pathogens can spread to a nearby allied Hero every 0.75 seconds.  Each cast of Healing Pathogen can only spread to each allied Hero 1 time.

basic.name: Weighted Pustule
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies and infest them with a Slowing Virus
basic.fullTooltip: Hurl a pustule that impacts all enemy Heroes in its path, dealing 20 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing by 5%, increasing to 50% over 3 seconds. Deals an additional 80 (+4% per level) damage upon expiring or being removed.

basic.name: Lurking Arm
basic.shortTooltip: Continually damage and Silence enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Channel at a target location, creating an area that deals 136 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies and Silences them. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes.  Does not cost Mana while Channeling, and lasts until canceled or interrupted.

heroic.name: Massive Shove
heroic.shortTooltip: Shove an enemy until they collide with terrain
heroic.fullTooltip: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

heroic.name: Flailing Swipe
heroic.shortTooltip: Knock back enemies in front of Stukov
heroic.fullTooltip: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

trait.name: Bio-Kill Switch
trait.shortTooltip: Detonate Viruses for immediate effects
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to detonate all of Stukov's Viruses. Each Healing Pathogen heals its target for 450 (+4% per level) Health, and each Weighted Pustule does 100 (+4% per level) damage and Slows its target by 70% for 2 seconds.  Can be cast while Channeling Lurking Arm.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

basic.name: Lurking Arm Cancel
basic.fullTooltip: Cancel Lurking Arm.

level1.name: Fetid Touch
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Reduce Weighted Pustule cooldown, cost
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pustule.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds and its Mana cost by 25.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

level1.name: Reactive Ballistospores
level1.shortTooltip: Radiate Weighted Pustule at low Health
level1.fullTooltip: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

level1.name: Low Blow
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Lurking Arm damage to low Health targets
level1.fullTooltip: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 30% Health.

level1.name: Spine Launcher
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks Slow, become ranged
level1.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds, but deal 40% less damage.

level4.name: One Good Spread...
level4.shortTooltip: Reduce Healing Pathogen cooldown after spreading
level4.fullTooltip: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.

level4.name: Biotic Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Healing Pathogen grants 15 Physical Armor to targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus to 75 for 2.5 seconds.

level4.name: Vigorous Reuptake
level4.fullTooltip: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 30% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.

level7.name: The Long Pitch
level7.shortTooltip: Increase Weighted Pustule range, reduce cooldowns
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.

level7.name: Growing Infestation
level7.shortTooltip: Lurking Arm expands, has set duration
level7.fullTooltip: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4 seconds.

level7.name: Targeted Excision
level7.shortTooltip: Detonate single Weighted Pustule to reduce cooldowns
level7.fullTooltip: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds and other Basic Abilities by 1.5 seconds.

level10.name: Flailing Swipe
level10.shortTooltip: Knock back enemies in front of Stukov
level10.fullTooltip: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

level10.name: Massive Shove
level10.shortTooltip: Shove an enemy until they collide with terrain
level10.fullTooltip: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

level13.name: It Hungers
level13.shortTooltip: Lurking Arm cost can be refunded
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 10 times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.

level13.name: Lingering Spines
level13.fullTooltip: Lurking Arm persists for 1.5 seconds after it is canceled.

level13.name: Virulent Reaction
level13.shortTooltip: Detonating Weighted Pustule in Lurking Arm Roots
level13.fullTooltip: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.

level13.name: Poppin' Pustules
level13.shortTooltip: Weighted Pustule can detonate in an area
level13.fullTooltip: Detonating Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.5 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 150% and applies its damage and Slow in an area. Enemy Heroes hit have a Weighted Pustule applied to them.

level16.name: Superstrain
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Pathogen heals when Stunned, Rooted
level16.fullTooltip: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 250 (+4% per level) Health.

level16.name: Universal Carrier
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Pathogen can spread continually
level16.fullTooltip: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 40%.

level16.name: Pox Populi
level16.shortTooltip: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen
level16.fullTooltip: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.

level20.name: Controlled Chaos
level20.shortTooltip: Flailing Swipe only hits once, gains multiple charges
level20.fullTooltip: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range.  Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 25 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 60 to 25.

level20.name: Push Comes To Shove
level20.shortTooltip: Massive Shove Slows, can reduce cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Massive Shove Slows its target by 50% for 4 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

level20.name: Top Off
level20.shortTooltip: Healing Pathogen stronger at high Health
level20.fullTooltip: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.

level20.name: Bio-Explosion Switch
level20.fullTooltip: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, applying a Weighted Pustule to enemy Heroes inside and Silencing them for 2 seconds.

Sylvanas.name: Sylvanas
Sylvanas.title: The Banshee Queen
Sylvanas.searchText: Sylvanas Windrunner Queen Forsaken Undead Elf Horde WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 3 III Reign of Chaos RoC Frozen Throne FT Cataclysm Warlords Draenor WoD Legion warchief BFA Battle for Azeroth
Sylvanas.description: An Assassin who can shut down enemy Forts and Keeps.

basic.name: Withering Fire
basic.shortTooltip: Shoot arrows at the closest enemy. Cooldown is reset on Takedown.
basic.fullTooltip: Shoot the closest enemy up to 5 times over 1.5 seconds for 39 (+4% per level) damage, prioritizing Heroes. Cooldown is reset on getting a Takedown.

basic.name: Shadow Dagger
basic.shortTooltip: Damage an enemy over time, spreading after hit
basic.fullTooltip: Throw a dagger at a target enemy that deals 30 (+4% per level) damage and an additional 150 (+4% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds. Damage dealt by Sylvanas to the initial target spreads Shadow Dagger to all nearby enemies.

basic.name: Haunting Wave
basic.shortTooltip: Deals damage and allows teleportation
basic.fullTooltip: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

heroic.name: Wailing Arrow
heroic.shortTooltip: Fire arrow that damages and Silences
heroic.fullTooltip: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

heroic.name: Mind Control
heroic.shortTooltip: Force an enemy Hero to walk towards Sylvanas
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.

trait.name: Black Arrows
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks apply Banshee's Curse, activate to disable enemies
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to cause all Basic Attacks and Abilities to Stun Minions, non-Elite Mercenaries, and Structures for 3 seconds. Lasts for 10 seconds.    Banshee's Curse  Basic Attacks infect enemies with Banshee's Curse for 3 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Deal 25% more damage to enemies with 3 stacks.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.fullTooltip: Activate to detonate early.

heroic.shortTooltip: Cancel Mind Control
heroic.fullTooltip: Activate to Cancel Mind Control

basic.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to the banshees' location.

basic.name: Haunting Teleport
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to the banshees' location.

basic.shortTooltip: Deals damage and allows teleportation
basic.fullTooltip: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

level1.name: Might of the Banshee Queen
level1.shortTooltip: Withering Fire grants Attack Speed, Spell Power
level1.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Withering Fire increases Sylvanas's Attack Speed and Spell Power by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

level1.name: Unfurling Shadows
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Increase Shadow Dagger damage
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Each time an enemy Hero with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse is hit by Shadow Dagger, its damage is permanently increased by 0.5%.

level1.name: Overwhelming Affliction
level1.shortTooltip: Banshee's Curse Slows, bonus damage to Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse are Slowed by 15%. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against Slowed enemy Heroes deal 1% of their maximum Health as damage.

level4.name: Unstable Poison
level4.shortTooltip: Enemy Minions can explode on death
level4.fullTooltip: Minions that die under the effects of Shadow Dagger or Sylvanas's Traits explode, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons.

level4.name: Mercenary Queen
level4.fullTooltip: Friendly non-Elite Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage. Sylvanas Stuns and deals 30% additional damage to Mercenaries with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

level4.name: Possession
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Catapults require 3 charges. Stores up to 3 charges.

level7.name: Barbed Shot
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting the same enemy with 5 shots of Withering Fire causes the 5th shot to deal 350% bonus damage.

level7.name: Lost Soul
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Shadow Dagger cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse reduce the cooldown of Shadow Dagger by 1.75 seconds.

level7.name: Festering Wounds
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Haunting Wave's damage by 25%. Haunting Wave applies 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

level10.name: Wailing Arrow
level10.shortTooltip: Fire arrow that damages and Silences
level10.fullTooltip: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

level10.name: Mind Control
level10.shortTooltip: Force an enemy Hero to walk towards Sylvanas
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.

level13.name: Cold Embrace
level13.fullTooltip: Shadow Dagger reduces the Armor of the initial target by 25 and any enemy it spreads to by 10 for 2.5 seconds.

level13.name: Windrunner
level13.shortTooltip: Haunting Wave casts twice, resets Withering Fire
level13.fullTooltip: Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting. Teleporting with Haunting Wave resets the cooldown of Withering Fire.

level13.name: Remorseless
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Sylvanas's Basic Attack range by 1. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse shoot an untalented shot of Withering Fire. This shot of Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse.

level16.name: Evasive Fire
level16.shortTooltip: Withering Fire grants Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy with Withering Fire grants 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

level16.name: Life Drain
level16.shortTooltip: Sylvanas heals for damage dealt
level16.fullTooltip: Heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sylvanas to enemies with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

level16.name: Will of the Forsaken
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Unstoppable and Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Deafening Blast
level20.shortTooltip: Increases power of Wailing Arrow center
level20.fullTooltip: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are Silenced for twice as long.

level20.name: Dark Lady's Call
level20.fullTooltip: Heroes hit by Mind Control have their vision radius greatly reduced for 5 seconds. Mind Control's cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

level20.name: Withering Barrage
level20.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Withering Fire reduce its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.

level20.name: Bolt of the Storm
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Tassadar.searchText: Tassadar High Templar hightemplar HT Protoss Aiur SC StarCraft 1 SC1 Star1 Starcraft1

basic.fullTooltip: Deal 82 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies in target area for 3 seconds. Damage increases by 12% for each consecutive instance of damage, up to 60%.

basic.fullTooltip: Tassadar becomes Invulnerable and Unrevealable for 2 seconds. While shifted, he has 25% increased Movement Speed.

level1.name: Psi-Infusion
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Psionic Storm returns Mana per target hit
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm.  Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20%

level1.name: Templar's Will
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Attacking Heroes empowers Distortion Beam
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second.  Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 125%.  Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.

level1.name: Khaydarin Resonance
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Gather Regen Globes to empower Plasma Shield
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Regeneration Globes grant an additional 100% Mana.   Reward: After collecting 10 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 15%.  Reward: After collecting 20 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 30%.

level4.name: Khala's Celerity
level4.fullTooltip: Plasma Shield also grants 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

level4.name: Khala's Embrace
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.

level4.name: Khala's Light
level4.shortTooltip: Plasma Shield grants Armor on expiration
level4.fullTooltip: Plasma Shield grants Heroes 20 Armor for 3 seconds upon breaking or expiring, causing them to take 20% less damage.

level7.name: Psionic Projection
level7.shortTooltip: Increases the range of Plasma Shield, Psionic Storm
level7.fullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.

level7.name: Resonation
level7.fullTooltip: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 60%.

level7.name: Mental Acuity
level7.shortTooltip: Quest: Takedowns reduce the Cooldown of Oracle
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds.  Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.

level10.name: Archon
level10.shortTooltip: Become an Archon
level10.fullTooltip: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 158 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 79 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

level10.name: Force Wall
level10.shortTooltip: Create an unpathable wall
level10.fullTooltip: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.   Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 35%.

level13.name: Deep Shift
level13.fullTooltip: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

level13.name: Adun's Wisdom
level13.fullTooltip: While Oracle is active, Basic Abilities cooldown 75% faster.

level13.name: Nullification
level13.shortTooltip: Greatly lower an enemy Hero's damage
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals by 75% for 4 seconds.

level16.name: Phase Disruption
level16.shortTooltip: Psionic Storm lowers Physical Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes being hit by Psionic Storm have their Physical Armor reduced by 35, causing them to take 35% more damage from Basic Attacks.

level16.name: Psionic Echo
level16.shortTooltip: Psionic Storm may be cast a second time
level16.fullTooltip: A second Psionic Storm can be cast within 2 seconds of casting the first. Enemies can only be affected by one Psionic Storm at a time.

level16.name: Focused Beam
level16.shortTooltip: Oracle increases Basic Attack damage
level16.fullTooltip: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1.5% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

level20.name: Twilight Archon
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

level20.name: Force Barrier
level20.fullTooltip: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

level20.name: Prismatic Link
level20.fullTooltip: Distortion Beam bounces to hit 2 additional targets for 50% damage.

level20.name: Shield Battery
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to grant Plasma Shields to all nearby allies
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.

Thrall.name: Thrall
Thrall.title: Warchief of the Horde
Thrall.searchText: Thrall Trall Go'el Goel Warchief Shaman Orc Horde WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III 3 Reign of Chaos RoC Frozen Throne FT Burning Crusade BC Wrath Lich King WotLK Cataclysm Mists of Pandaria MoP Legion Hearthstone HS
Thrall.description: A Bruiser who can hold his own in a lane of battle.

basic.name: Chain Lightning
basic.shortTooltip: Shock enemies with bouncing lightning
basic.fullTooltip: Shock an enemy with lightning, dealing 162 (+4% per level) damage. The lightning then bounces 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing 81 (+4% per level) damage to each enemy hit.

basic.name: Feral Spirit
basic.shortTooltip: Unleash a wolf spirit to burn enemies and Root Heroes
basic.fullTooltip: Unleash a Feral Spirit that deals 153 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path and Roots Heroes hit for 1 second. Each Hero hit increases the distance traveled by 25%.

basic.name: Windfury
basic.shortTooltip: Increases Attack and Movement Speed
basic.fullTooltip: Increase Thrall's Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. His next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster and generate stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

heroic.name: Sundering
heroic.shortTooltip: Damages, pushes, and Stuns enemies in a line
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

heroic.name: Earthquake
heroic.shortTooltip: Slows enemies in a massive area
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

trait.name: Frostwolf Resilience
trait.shortTooltip: Casting Abilities on enemies grants charges that restore health
trait.fullTooltip: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, Thrall is instantly healed for 223 (+4% per level) Health.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Sundering
heroic.fullTooltip: Cancel Sundering

trait.name: Frostwolf Resilience
trait.shortTooltip: Casting Abilities on enemies grants charges that restore health
trait.fullTooltip: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, Thrall is instantly healed for 223 (+4% per level) Health.

level1.name: Echo of the Elements
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Killing enemies grants Chain Lightning charge
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning.  Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 40 to 25.  Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.

level1.name: Crash Lightning
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Multiple Hero hits empower Chain Lightning
level1.fullTooltip: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 360.  Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.

level1.name: Rolling Thunder
level1.shortTooltip: Chain Lightning restores Health and Mana
level1.fullTooltip: For 10 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them restores 15 Mana and 2.5% of his maximum Health.  Passive: Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by 1.

level4.name: Feral Resilience
level4.shortTooltip: Feral Spirit grants Physical Armor, Frostwolf Resilience
level4.fullTooltip: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

level4.name: Frostwolf Pack
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Reduce Feral Spirit cooldown, cost
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero.  Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

level4.name: Mana Tide
level4.shortTooltip: Frostwolf Resilience restores Mana, lowers cooldowns
level4.fullTooltip: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

level7.name: Maelstrom Weapon
level7.shortTooltip: Quest:  Windfury attacks increase Move Speed
level7.fullTooltip: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1.  Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%.  Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

level7.name: Ancestral Wrath
level7.shortTooltip: Activate to damage and steal Health from a Hero
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

level7.name: Follow Through
level7.fullTooltip: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

level10.name: Sundering
level10.shortTooltip: Damages, pushes, and Stuns enemies in a line
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

level10.name: Earthquake
level10.shortTooltip: Slows enemies in a massive area
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

level13.name: Grace Of Air
level13.fullTooltip: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

level13.name: Frostwolf's Grace
level13.shortTooltip: Activate Frostwolf Resilience to instantly heal
level13.fullTooltip: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.

level13.name: Spirit Shield
level13.fullTooltip: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

level16.name: Tempest Fury
level16.shortTooltip: Windfury's final strike hits 3 times
level16.fullTooltip: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

level16.name: Thunderstorm
level16.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes to make Chain Lightning Slow
level16.fullTooltip: Chain Lightning Slows targets by 8% for 2 seconds.  Quest: Targeting a Hero directly with Chain Lightning increases this Slow by 8%, up to an additional 40%.  Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.  Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.

level16.name: Alpha Wolf
level16.shortTooltip: Feral Spirit has longer Root, empowers Attacks
level16.fullTooltip: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

level20.name: Worldbreaker
level20.fullTooltip: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Earthen Shields
level20.fullTooltip: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

level20.name: Nexus Blades
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

level20.name: Wind Rush
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport and gain Windfury
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

level1.fullTooltip: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown four times as fast for 3 seconds.

level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 1.5 seconds.  Reward: After increasing turret duration by 600 total seconds, reduce the charge cooldown of Rock-It! Turret by 3 seconds.

The bomb explodes after 2 seconds dealing 360 (+6% per level) damage to them and 180 (+6% per level) damage to other nearby enemies.  This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

trait.fullTooltip: Tracer can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times she needs to reload over 0.75 seconds. Tracer can manually reload early by activating Reload.

basic.name: Eviscerate

basic.shortTooltip: High damage finishing move
basic.fullTooltip: Eviscerate an enemy, dealing damage per Combo Point.   1 Point: 85 (+4% per level) 2 Points: 170 (+4% per level) 3 Points: 255 (+4% per level)  Stealth: Garrote Silence and damage an enemy over time.

heroic.name: Cloak of Shadows
heroic.shortTooltip: Become Unstoppable, gain Spell Armor
heroic.fullTooltip: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

heroic.name: Smoke Bomb
heroic.shortTooltip: Create an obscuring cloud of smoke
heroic.fullTooltip: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 30 Armor, reducing damage taken by 30%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

trait.name: Vanish
trait.shortTooltip: Stealth and gain new Abilities
trait.fullTooltip: Vanish from sight, becoming Stealthed, gaining 20% Movement Speed and access to new Abilities. For the first second, Valeera is Unrevealable and can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  After being Stealthed for 3 seconds, Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote have 100% increased range, and cause Valeera to teleport to the target when used.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

basic.name: Ambush
basic.shortTooltip: Damage an enemy and reduce their Armor
basic.fullTooltip: Ambush an enemy, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage and reducing their Armor by 10 for 5 seconds.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Unstealth: Sinister Strike Dash forward, damaging enemies.

basic.name: Cheap Shot
basic.shortTooltip: Stun, Blind, and damage an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 30 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy, Stun them for 0.75 seconds, and Blind them for 2 seconds once Cheap Shot's Stun expires.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Unstealth: Blade Flurry Deal damage in an area around Valeera.

basic.name: Garrote
basic.shortTooltip: Deal high damage over time to an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 20 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage over 7 seconds, and Silence them for 2.5 seconds.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Unstealth: Eviscerate High damage finishing move.

trait.name: Cancel Stealth
trait.fullTooltip: Cancels Stealth.

level1.name: Vigor
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes increase max Energy
level1.fullTooltip: Valeera regenerates an additional 3 Energy per second.  Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

level1.name: Subtlety
level1.shortTooltip: Stealth Abilities increase Energy regeneration
level1.fullTooltip: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

level1.name: Combat Readiness
level1.shortTooltip: Spending Combo Points grants Block
level1.fullTooltip: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

level1.name: Crippling Poison
level1.shortTooltip: Spell Damage Slows enemies
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.

level4.name: Relentless Strikes
level4.fullTooltip: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 15.

level4.name: Hemorrhage
level4.fullTooltip: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 40% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

level4.name: Initiative
level4.shortTooltip: Stealth Abilities award Move Speed, Combo Points
level4.fullTooltip: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote grant 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and award 2 Combo Points.

level4.name: Wound Poison
level4.shortTooltip: Spell Damage reduces enemy healing received
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.

level7.name: Mutilate
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Sinister Strike damage but reduces range
level7.fullTooltip: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

level7.name: Fatal Finesse
level7.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Blade Flurry
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 6, up to 90.  Reward: After damaging 15 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

level7.name: Slice and Dice
level7.fullTooltip: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.

level10.name: Smoke Bomb
level10.shortTooltip: Create an obscuring cloud of smoke
level10.fullTooltip: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 30 Armor, reducing damage taken by 30%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

level10.name: Cloak of Shadows
level10.shortTooltip: Become Unstoppable, gain Spell Armor
level10.fullTooltip: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

level13.name: Death From Above
level13.fullTooltip: Teleporting with Ambush reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 4 seconds.

level13.name: Blind
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's Blind by 2.5 seconds.

level13.name: Strangle
level13.fullTooltip: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 40% for 6 seconds.

level16.name: Seal Fate
level16.shortTooltip: Empower Sinister Strike damage, Combo Points
level16.fullTooltip: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against Silenced, Rooted, or Stunned enemy Heroes.

level16.name: Assassinate
level16.shortTooltip: Ambush deals more damage to isolated Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Ambush deals 50% additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional 10 if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

level16.name: Thistle Tea
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to instantly restore Energy
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.  Activating Thistle Tea does not break Stealth.

level20.name: Adrenaline Rush
level20.fullTooltip: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 40 Energy per second.

level20.name: Enveloping Shadows
level20.fullTooltip: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

level20.name: Rupture
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Garrote's damage over time by 100%. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote.

level20.name: Elusiveness
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 20%.

Varian.name: Varian
Varian.title: High King of the Alliance
Varian.searchText: Varian Wrynn Logosh Lo'Gosh Stormwind Human Alliance WoW World of Warcraft Wrath of the Lich King WotLK Cataclysm Mists of Pandaria MoP Warlords of Draenor WoD Legion
Varian.description: A Bruiser that can flex into dealing damage or protecting his team.

basic.name: Lion's Fang
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in a line and heal Varian
basic.fullTooltip: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Each enemy hit heals Varian for 35 (+4% per level), increased to 140 (+4% per level) against Heroes.

basic.name: Parry
basic.shortTooltip: Block incoming Basic Attacks for a short duration
basic.fullTooltip: Parry all incoming Basic Attacks for 1.25 seconds, reducing their damage by 100%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

basic.name: Charge
basic.shortTooltip: Charge to an enemy and damage them
basic.fullTooltip: Charge to the target enemy, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 75% for 1 second.

heroic.name: Taunt
heroic.shortTooltip: Gain HealthForce a Hero to attack Varian
heroic.fullTooltip: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 30%.

heroic.name: Colossus Smash
heroic.shortTooltip: Gain Damage, Lose HealthSmash enemies and lower their Armor
heroic.fullTooltip: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

heroic.name: Twin Blades of Fury
heroic.shortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed, Lose DamageBasic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike cooldown
heroic.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

trait.name: Heroic Strike
trait.shortTooltip: Deal bonus damage on next Basic Attack
trait.fullTooltip: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 125 (+4% per level) bonus Spell Damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

trait.shortTooltip: Bonus Basic Attack damage
trait.fullTooltip: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 125 (+4% per level) bonus Spell Damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

level1.name: Lion's Maw
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes to empower Lion's Fang
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5, up to 125.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

level1.name: Overpower
level1.shortTooltip: Parrying a Hero's attack will refresh Heroic Strike
level1.fullTooltip: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 30% more damage.

level1.name: High King's Quest
level1.shortTooltip: Quest:  Complete Quests to gain Attack Damage
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 30 Base Attack Damage.

level4.name: Taunt
level4.shortTooltip: Gain HealthForce a Hero to attack Varian
level4.fullTooltip: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 30%.

level4.fullTooltip: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

level4.name: Twin Blades of Fury
level4.shortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed, Lose DamageBasic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

level7.name: Lionheart
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 50%.

level7.name: Second Wind
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks heal, more when low Health
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

level7.name: Victory Rush
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks periodically grant a large heal
level7.fullTooltip: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

level10.name: Shield Wall
level10.shortTooltip: Parry grants Protected
level10.fullTooltip: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.

level10.name: Warbringer
level10.shortTooltip: Reduce Charge cooldown, can be used on allies
level10.fullTooltip: Reduce Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.

level13.name: Juggernaut
level13.fullTooltip: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

level13.name: Mortal Strike
level13.fullTooltip: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Shattering Throw
level13.shortTooltip: Deal massive damage to enemy Shields
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage, and up to 1400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to their Shields.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus Physical Damage to Shields.

level16.name: Banner of Stormwind
level16.shortTooltip: Banner that grants Movement Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

level16.name: Banner of Ironforge
level16.shortTooltip: Banner that grants Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.

level16.name: Banner of Dalaran
level16.shortTooltip: Banner that grants Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

level20.name: Vigilance
level20.fullTooltip: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 seconds.

level20.name: Master at Arms
level20.shortTooltip: Colossus Smash hits enemies near the target
level20.fullTooltip: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

level20.name: Frenzy
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Twin Blades of Fury bonuses
level20.fullTooltip: Twin Blades of Fury increases Varian's Attack Speed by an additional 15%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

level20.name: Glory to the Alliance
level20.fullTooltip: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

level20.name: Demoralizing Shout
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds.

Whitemane.name: Whitemane
Whitemane.title: High Inquisitor
Whitemane.searchText: sally priest human WoW World of Warcraft Mists Pandaria MoP Legion
Whitemane.description: A versatile Healer who heals her allies by smiting her foes.

basic.name: Desperate Plea
basic.shortTooltip: Heal an allied Hero
basic.fullTooltip: Heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and gain Desperation for 4 seconds.  Desperation increases Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 45, and stacks up to 3 times.  Current Mana Cost: 45

basic.name: Inquisition
basic.shortTooltip: Damage or heal Heroes

heroic.fullTooltip: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

heroic.shortTooltip: Consecrate an area
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside. 25% of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.

trait.name: Zeal
trait.shortTooltip: Heal marked allies for damage dealt
trait.fullTooltip: Whitemane's healing Abilities apply Zeal for 8 seconds.  Allies with Zeal are healed for 100% of the damage Whitemane deals to Heroes.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

activable.name: Clemency
activable.fullTooltip: Activate to cast Inquisition on an allied Hero, healing them for up to 329 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds while Channeling.  Shares a cooldown with Inquisition.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

level1.fullTooltip: For every Hero hit with Searing Lash, lower the cooldown of Inquisition by 1 second. Allies below 30% Health receive 25% more healing from Whitemane.

level16.name: Spider Colony

level16.fullTooltip: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

level16.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Health and Spell Power

level20.name: Humongoid

level20.fullTooltip: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

level20.name: Annihilating Spirit
level20.shortTooltip: Increase range and speed of Ravenous Spirit
level20.fullTooltip: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

level20.name: Fury of the Storm
level20.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

level20.name: Vile Infection
level20.fullTooltip: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual.  Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased from 67 (+4% per level) to 167 (+4% per level) over 6 seconds.

Wizard.name: Li-Ming

Wizard.description: A high burst damage Mage who can reset her Abilities upon getting a takedown.

basic.name: Magic Missiles

basic.name: Teleport
basic.shortTooltip: Teleport a short distance
basic.fullTooltip: Teleport a short distance instantly.

heroic.name: Disintegrate
heroic.shortTooltip: Long range channeled beam
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 480 (+5% per level) damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

heroic.name: Wave of Force
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and knock enemies back
heroic.fullTooltip: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

trait.name: Critical Mass
trait.shortTooltip: Takedowns refresh Li-Ming's Ability cooldowns
trait.fullTooltip: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of Li-Ming's Abilities.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Cancel Disintegrate
heroic.fullTooltip: Cancel Archon: Pure Power Disintegrate.

heroic.name: Disintegrate
heroic.shortTooltip: Long range channeled beam
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 192 (+5% per level) damage per second to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

heroic.name: Disintegrate (Cancel)
heroic.fullTooltip: Cancel Disintegrate.

level1.name: Force Armor
level1.shortTooltip: Magic Missiles grants Spell Armor
level1.fullTooltip: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast.  Stores up to 4 charges.

level1.fullTooltip: Teleport costs no Mana.  If Li-Ming hasn't taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Teleport's cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.  Casting Teleport causes Li-Ming's next cast of Magic Missiles to deal 10% bonus damage.

level1.name: Astral Presence
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Mana regen while low Mana
level1.fullTooltip: Li-Ming's Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 35% Mana.

level1.shortTooltip: Regen Globes give Spell Power and more Mana

level4.fullTooltip: Takedowns restore 30% of Li-Ming's missing Health.

level7.name: Calamity
level7.fullTooltip: Teleport does 300 (+3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.

level10.name: Disintegrate
level10.shortTooltip: Long range channeled beam
level10.fullTooltip: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 480 (+5% per level) damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

level10.name: Wave of Force
level10.shortTooltip: Damage and knock enemies back
level10.fullTooltip: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

level13.name: Glass Cannon
level13.shortTooltip: Gain Spell Power but lose max Health

level16.name: Mirrorball
level16.shortTooltip: Fires 2 extra Magic Missiles and increases Mana cost
level16.fullTooltip: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.

level16.name: Arcane Orbit
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Arcane Orb range
level16.fullTooltip: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, increasing its maximum distance damage bonus from 270 (+3% per level) to 371 (+3% per level).

level16.name: Diamond Skin
level16.shortTooltip: Teleport grants a Shield

level20.name: Temporal Flux
level20.fullTooltip: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.

level20.name: Repulsion
level20.shortTooltip: Increases cast range and knockback distance

level20.name: Tal Rasha's Elements

level20.name: Archon: Pure Power
level20.shortTooltip: Use Disintegrate repeatedly, but no other Abilities
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing Li-Ming to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

Yrel.name: Yrel
Yrel.title: Light of Hope
Yrel.searchText: Yerel WoW Draenei Warlords of Draenor WoD Alliance Paladin BFA Battle for Azeroth
Yrel.description: A deliberate melee Bruiser whose heavyweight abilities reward investment and careful timing.

basic.name: Vindication
basic.shortTooltip: Restore Health, damage enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Unleash holy energy around Yrel, dealing 42 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and healing her for 96 (+4% per level).  Charging up this Ability increases its damage up to 140 (+4% per level), and healing up to 320 (+4% per level).

basic.name: Righteous Hammer

basic.name: Avenging Wrath
basic.shortTooltip: Leap to an area to damage, Slow enemies
