level1.fullTooltip: Zarya's Basic Attack deals 50% additional damage to enemies in melee range.

level1.name: Maximum Charge
level1.shortTooltip: Regen Globes grant Energy Quest: Increases maximum Energy
level1.fullTooltip: Regen Globes now instantly grant 20 Energy.  Quest: Spend 150 seconds at or above 50 Energy.  Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

level4.name: I Am the Strongest
level4.fullTooltip: Personal Barrier absorbs an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.

level4.name: Give Me Twenty
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Increases Shield Ally absorb amount and reduces cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently.   Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 2 seconds.

level4.name: Speed Barrier
level4.shortTooltip: Shield Ally increases allied Hero Movement Speed
level4.fullTooltip: Shield Ally increases the allied Hero's Movement Speed by 50% for the duration.

level4.name: Defensive Shielding
level4.shortTooltip: Personal Barrier, Shield Ally grant Physical Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally grant 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 6 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

level7.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
level7.shortTooltip: Particle Grenade deals more damage in center area
level7.fullTooltip: Particle Grenade deals 30 (+4% per level) more damage to enemies hit by the center of the blast.

level7.name: Explosive Barrier
level7.fullTooltip: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

level7.name: To the Limit
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Basic Attack size at high Energy
level7.fullTooltip: While above 50 Energy, Zarya's Basic Attack size is increased by 35%.

level7.name: Hit Me
level7.shortTooltip: Shield damage absorbed contributes more Energy
level7.fullTooltip: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields contributes 15% more Energy.

level10.name: Graviton Surge
level10.shortTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that draws in enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

level10.name: Expulsion Zone
level10.shortTooltip: Launch a bomb that continually pushes enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

level13.name: Unstoppable Competitor
level13.fullTooltip: Personal Barrier makes Zarya Unstoppable for up to 2 seconds.

level13.name: Spell Barrier
level13.fullTooltip: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier grants Zarya 75 Spell Armor for 3 Seconds, reducing the damage taken from Abilities by 75%.

level13.name: Endurance Training
level13.fullTooltip: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya gains 20 Armor, reducing all damage taken by 20%.

level13.name: Pain is Temporary
level13.shortTooltip: Consume Energy to gain a Shield
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to consume all Energy and gain a Shield that absorbs 0.5% of Zarya's maximum Health per Energy consumed and lasts for 3 seconds. Zarya may only have one personal Shield active on herself at a time.

level16.name: Plasma Shock
level16.shortTooltip: Particle Grenade slows enemies near the center
level16.fullTooltip: Particle Grenade slows Movement Speed by 35% for 2 seconds to enemies near the center.

level16.name: Cleansing Shield
level16.shortTooltip: Shield Ally removes all disabling effects
level16.fullTooltip: Causes Shield Ally to remove all disabling effects and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

level16.name: Gain Train
level16.shortTooltip: Shield Ally now affects a second ally
level16.fullTooltip: Shield Ally now grants an untalented Shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

level16.name: Born in Battle
level16.shortTooltip: Reduces cooldowns at high Energy
level16.fullTooltip: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya's cooldowns regenerate 25% faster.

level20.name: Gravity Kills
level20.shortTooltip: Graviton Surge has increased duration and Silences
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by 1 second and it Silences Heroes caught in its area.

level20.name: Clear Out
level20.shortTooltip: Increases Expulsion Zone's duration and radius
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Expulsion Zone's duration by 1.5 seconds and its radius by 15%.

level20.name: Grenadier
level20.shortTooltip: Particle Grenade charges are returned at once
level20.fullTooltip: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

level20.name: Unyielding Defender
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.

Zeratul.name: Zeratul
Zeratul.title: Dark Prelate
Zeratul.searchText: Zeratul ZT Dark Templar DT Prelate Protoss HotS Heart of the Swarm StarCraft II 2 SC2 Brood War BW LotV Legacy Void Wings Liberty WoL SC 1 SC1 Star2 Starcraft2 Star1 Starcraft1
Zeratul.description: A stealthed Assassin who can dart around his enemies.

basic.name: Cleave
basic.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

basic.name: Singularity Spike
basic.shortTooltip: Slow and damage the first enemy hit
basic.fullTooltip: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 240 (+4% per level) damage after 1 second and Slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Blink
basic.shortTooltip: Teleport to a location. Ability does not break cloak
basic.fullTooltip: Teleport to the target location.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

heroic.name: Might Of The Nerazim
heroic.shortTooltip: Recast last Basic Ability
heroic.fullTooltip: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

heroic.name: Void Prison
heroic.shortTooltip: Time Stop targets in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

trait.name: Permanent Cloak
trait.shortTooltip: Become Stealthed while not attacking, using Abilities, or taking damage
trait.fullTooltip: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

activable.name: Vorpal Blade
activable.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to Zeratul's last non-structure Basic Attack target within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

heroic.name: Cleave
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Deal 100 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

heroic.name: Singularity Spike
heroic.shortTooltip: Slow and damage the first enemy hit
heroic.fullTooltip: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 120 (+4% per level) damage after 1 second and slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Blink
heroic.shortTooltip: Teleport to a location. Ability does not break cloak
heroic.fullTooltip: Teleport to the target location.   Using this Ability does not break cloak.

heroic.name: Void Prison Cancel
heroic.fullTooltip: Cancels the Void Prison ability.

basic.name: Seeker in the Dark
basic.fullTooltip: Teleport to the active Singularity Spike target.

basic.name: Wormhole
basic.fullTooltip: Return to the original location.

level1.name: Greater Cleave
level1.shortTooltip: Increases radius of Cleave
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

level1.name: Shadow Hunter
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Gather Regen Globes to empower Blink
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 3, up to 45.  Reward: Upon gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1.5 seconds.

level1.name: Move Unseen
level1.shortTooltip: Gain Stealth faster and Move Speed while Stealthed
level1.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 1 second. Gain 30% Movement Speed while Stealthed.

level4.name: Rending Cleave
level4.shortTooltip: Cleave deals additional damage over time
level4.fullTooltip: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

level4.name: Psionic Strength
level4.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks, Abilities increase damage dealt
level4.fullTooltip: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes increases all damage dealt by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

level4.name: Darkness Descends
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Gain 20% Attack Speed.

level7.name: Wormhole
level7.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from within 4 seconds.

level7.name: Seeker in the Dark
level7.fullTooltip: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

level7.name: Warp Skirmisher
level7.fullTooltip: Vorpal Blade gains a 2nd charge. Teleporting to an enemy with Vorpal Blade or entering Permanent Cloak causes Zeratul's next Basic Attack to deal 50% more damage.

level10.name: Might Of The Nerazim
level10.shortTooltip: Recast last Basic Ability
level10.fullTooltip: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

level10.name: Void Prison
level10.shortTooltip: Time Stop targets in an area
level10.fullTooltip: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

level13.name: Shroud of Adun
level13.shortTooltip: Gain a shield while under Permanent Cloak
level13.fullTooltip: Zeratul gains a Shield equal to 20% of his Maximum Health over 3 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

level13.name: Mending Strikes
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

level13.name: Spell Shield
level13.fullTooltip: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

level16.name: Master Warp-Blade
level16.shortTooltip: Bonus damage every third Basic Attack
level16.fullTooltip: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

level16.name: Void Slash
level16.shortTooltip: Cleave empowered against multiple Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 40% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

level16.name: Sentenced to Death
level16.shortTooltip: Deal bonus damage to marked targets
level16.fullTooltip: Deal 25% increased damage to enemies while they are marked or Slowed by Singularity Spike.

level20.name: Twilight Falls
level20.shortTooltip: Might of the Nerazim resets cooldowns
level20.fullTooltip: Might of the Nerazim resets the cooldown of all Basic Abilities.

level20.name: Gift of the XelNaga
level20.shortTooltip: Allies unaffected by Void Prison, enemies slowed
level20.fullTooltip: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

level20.name: Nexus Blades
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

level20.name: Shadow Mending
level20.shortTooltip: Spell Damage dealt to Heroes heals
level20.fullTooltip: Heal for 60% of Spell Damage dealt to Heroes.

Zuljin.name: Zul'jin
Zuljin.title: Warlord of the Amani
Zuljin.searchText: Zuljin Axethrower Troll Horde War2 WC2 Warcraft2 Warcraft II 2 Tides of Darkness ToD World of Warcraft WoW Burning Crusade BC
Zuljin.description: A Physical Damage Assassin that gains power while losing Health.

basic.name: Grievous Throw
basic.shortTooltip: Throw an Axe, damaging and marking a target, increasing Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage.
basic.fullTooltip: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 6 seconds. Marked enemies take 50% bonus damage from Zul'jin's next 3 Basic Attacks against them.

basic.name: Twin Cleave
basic.shortTooltip: Throw swirling Axes that Slow enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Throw 2 axes in a large, circular arc, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing affected enemies by 15% per axe for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Regeneration
basic.shortTooltip: Zul'jin Channels to regenerate Health over time
basic.fullTooltip: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 30% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.

heroic.name: Taz'dingo!
heroic.shortTooltip: Become unkillable
heroic.fullTooltip: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

heroic.name: Guillotine
heroic.shortTooltip: Deal heavy area damage
heroic.fullTooltip: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

trait.name: Berserker
trait.shortTooltip: Increased Attack Speed as Health gets lower
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.  Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.  You Want Axe?  Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1.  Reward: After attacking Heroes 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.  Reward: After attacking Heroes 150 times, Twin Cleave now revolves twice.

mount.name: Summon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 1 second, gain 30% Movement Speed.

activable.name: Amani Rage
activable.shortTooltip: Activate to lose Health and restore it over time
activable.fullTooltip: Activate to cause Zul'jin to instantly lose 50% of his current Health and heal for that amount over 10 seconds.

hearth.name: Hearthstone
hearth.fullTooltip: After Channeling for 6 seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring 1125 Health and 150 Mana.

spray.name: Quick Spray Expression
spray.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

voice.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
voice.fullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

mount.name: Unsummon Mount
mount.fullTooltip: Dismounts you.

basic.name: Cancel Regeneration
basic.fullTooltip: Cancels Regeneration.

trait.name: Cancel Berserker
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to leave the berserker frenzy, reducing Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage by 25% and no longer consuming 2% of his maximum Health per attack.  Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.  You Want Axe?  Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1.  Reward: After attacking Heroes 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.  Reward: After attacking Heroes 150 times, Twin Cleave now revolves twice.

level1.name: Boneslicer
level1.shortTooltip: Empower Grievous Throw
level1.fullTooltip: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

level1.name: Recklessness
level1.shortTooltip: Low Health increases damage
level1.fullTooltip: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 20%.

level1.name: Headhunter
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Takedowns increase damage
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%.  Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.

level4.name: Troll's Blood
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

level4.name: Voodoo Shuffle
level4.shortTooltip: Activate to remove Roots and Slows
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.  Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.

level4.name: Amani Hide
level4.fullTooltip: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 15 Armor while regenerating Health from it.

level7.name: Vicious Assault
level7.shortTooltip: Increase Grievous Throw duration and damage
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Grievous Throw's mark by 3 seconds and its damage bonus by 35%.

level7.name: Arcanite Axes
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

level7.name: Ferocity
level7.fullTooltip: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

level10.name: Taz'dingo!
level10.shortTooltip: Become unkillable
level10.fullTooltip: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

level10.name: Guillotine
level10.shortTooltip: Deal heavy area damage
level10.fullTooltip: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

level13.name: Lacerate
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10%.

level13.name: Eye of Zul'jin
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

level13.name: Ensnare
level13.shortTooltip: Throw a net that Roots enemies
level13.fullTooltip: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds.

level16.name: No Mercy!
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks ignore Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.

level16.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
level16.shortTooltip: Bonus Twin Cleave damage at apex
level16.fullTooltip: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.

level16.name: Let the Killing Begin
level16.shortTooltip: Killing enemies increases Attack Speed
level16.fullTooltip: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.

level20.name: Amani Resilience
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

level20.name: Buzzsaw
level20.fullTooltip: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

level20.name: Forest Medicine
level20.fullTooltip: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.
